trans-unit.source: We are reasonable and open to new deals. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Somos razonables y abiertos a nuevos acuerdos. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Abre Comercio)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: [I]Hold some precious items out to the screen.[/I] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: [I]Sostén una piedra de un color casi incomprensible.[/I] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Abre Comercio)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Let's see what you think of making some deals. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Veamos qué piensas de hacer algunos tratos. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Abre Comercio)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: No trade happens in my empire without my approval. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: No se realiza ningún comercio en mi imperio sin mi aprobación. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Abre Comercio)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We are open to trade, as long as it benefits the citizens of our empire. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Estamos abiertos al comercio, siempre y cuando beneficie a los ciudadanos de nuestro imperio. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Abre Comercio)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: For the right price we might be willing to trade with you. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Por el precio correcto podríamos estar dispuestos a comerciar contigo. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Abre Comercio)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Through fair trade both of our empires can benefit. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Mediante el comercio justo, nuestros imperios prosperarán. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Inicia Comercio)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Our markets are the envy of the galaxy. Let us see how yours compare. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Nuestros mercados son la envidia de la galaxia. ¿Cómo se comparan los tuyos? [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Inicia el Comercio)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Perhaps we can interest you in some aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's? [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: ¿Tal vez le atraiga un orden estético de 0's y 1's? [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Inicia Comercio)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Another race is nearing [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Ascension[/COLOR]. We do not know what lies beyond mortality, or what it means to follow the path of the precursors. But if they succeed, the prize will be theirs alone to claim. And we will be become little more than dust in the corners of the galaxy they leave us.[BR][BR]If we want to have any chance of ruling the galaxy, their attempt must be stopped.
trans-unit.target: Se avecina una raza a [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Ascensión[/COLOR]. Ignoramos el más allá de la mortalidad y el significado de seguir el camino de los precursores. Pero, si triunfan, el premio será suyo exclusivamente. Nosotros nos convertiremos en poco más que polvo en los rincones de la galaxia que nos dejen. [BR][BR]Si queremos alguna oportunidad de gobernar la galaxia, su intento debe ser detenido.

trans-unit.source: Let's review victory status. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens the Victory screen)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Revisemos el estado de la victoria. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Despliega la pantalla de Victoria)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Another civilization is nearing a [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige Victory[/HS]. When the story of our galaxy is written the scholars will remark that they dominated this age, and we will be little more than a minor footnote.[BR][BR]If we want to have our legacy remembered we must act now.
trans-unit.target: Otra civilización se acerca a una [HS=HS_Prestige]Victoria Prestigiosa[/HS]. Cuando se escriba la historia de nuestra galaxia, resaltarán su dominio sobre esta era, y nosotros seremos poco más que una nota al pie. [BR][BR]Para que nuestro legado sea recordado, debemos actuar ahora.

trans-unit.source: Let's review victory status. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens the Victory screen)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Revisemos el estado de la victoria. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Despliega la pantalla de Victoria)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Warm greetings, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We do not know whether you are friend or foe. Only time can answer that. For now, we bid you peace.
trans-unit.target: Cálidos saludos, {FACTIONJUGADOR:2}. No sabemos si eres amigo o enemigo. Solo el tiempo puede responder a eso. Por ahora, te deseamos paz.

trans-unit.source: So you are the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Rumors have reached us of your kind. We will see soon whether you are a friend or an enemy.
trans-unit.target: Así que eres el {JUGADORFACTION:2}. Los rumores sobre tu especie han llegado a nosotros. Pronto veremos si eres un amigo o un enemigo.

trans-unit.source: I am told that you are called, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. This is very interesting to us. Whether we are destined to cooperate or seek mutual extermination remains to be seen.
trans-unit.target: Me han dicho que te llaman, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Esto es muy interesante para nosotros. Aún queda por ver si estamos destinados a cooperar o buscar la exterminación mutua.

trans-unit.source: Another potential slave race. We are always glad to meet new volunteers.
trans-unit.target: Otra raza esclava potencial. Siempre nos complace encontrar nuevos voluntarios.

trans-unit.source: The galaxy seems to be filled with talking meat, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.
trans-unit.target: La galaxia parece estar llena de carne parlante, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.

trans-unit.source: A pleasure to meet you. I do hope we can get this relationship off to a good start.
trans-unit.target: Un placer conocerte. Espero que nuestra relación inicie bien.

trans-unit.source: Hello preymeat. Have you come to present yourself for consumption by the Festron? Good. Goooood.
trans-unit.target: Hola, presa. ¿Vienes a ofrecerte al Festron? Bien. Muy bien.

trans-unit.source: Salutations, travelers. Please let us proceed with opening conversational maneuvers.
trans-unit.target: Saludos, viajeros. Procedamos a iniciar el diálogo.

trans-unit.source: Hello, hopefully not too villainous alien. We are the Mimot Brotherhood, and we are delighted to see you, and we are not delicious.
trans-unit.target: Hola, extraterrestre no demasiado malévolo. Somos la Hermandad Mimot, encantados de verte, y no somos deliciosos.

trans-unit.source: Another simple-minded alien, I presume. Twisted by your own childish sense of morality. Well. Let's not let that get between us.
trans-unit.target: Presumo, otro extraterrestre ingenuo, corrompido por su moralidad infantil. Pero no permitamos que eso nos separe.

trans-unit.source: Speak openly, alien, so that we might know you friend or foe.
trans-unit.target: Alienígena, habla sin rodeos, para discernir si eres amigo o enemigo.

trans-unit.source: We see hope in your eyes at this encounter. That will pass.
trans-unit.target: Un nuevo ser, ¡qué deleite! Sin temor aún, con fuego en los ojos. Cambiará pronto.

trans-unit.source: Your life, as you know it, is now over. Soon, you will be our slaves.
trans-unit.target: Your life, as you know it, is now over. Soon, you will be our slaves.

trans-unit.source: A new being. What a delight! No fear yet. The fire still in your eyes. Oh how fast that will change.
trans-unit.target: A new being. What a delight! No fear yet. The fire still in your eyes. Oh how fast that will change.

trans-unit.source: Greetings, and welcome. Our civilization has flourished for thousands of years. We know of powers that you cannot even imagine.
trans-unit.target: Saludos, bienvenidos. Milenios de esplendor nos avalan, poseemos saberes inimaginables para vosotros.

trans-unit.source: More fleshlings. I don't understand the concept of how meat can become sentient.
trans-unit.target: Más seres de carne. No comprendo cómo la carne puede cobrar consciencia.

trans-unit.source: Before we begin to speak, stranger, I should tell you that my people will never be slaves again. Let us converse with that fact known.
trans-unit.target: Antes de charlar, forastero, debes saber: mi gente jamás será esclava otra vez. Conversemos con esa realidad presente.

trans-unit.source: You, alien. Are you the ones we fear and hate? The ones who stole our children? Or are you better? Or worse?
trans-unit.target: ¿Eres tú, extraterrestre, objeto de nuestro miedo y odio? ¿El ladrón de nuestros hijos? ¿O eres superior? ¿O acaso peor?

trans-unit.source: It's always a blessing meeting someone who has not yet found the way of the Krynn. It will be my pleasure to watch you come to understand the truth that we do.
trans-unit.target: Siempre es un don encontrar a quien aún no conoce el camino de Krynn. Será un deleite presenciar tu comprensión de nuestra verdad.

trans-unit.source: Alien, know this: we were ancient when the universe was new. But we are now only a dim shadow of what we once were.
trans-unit.target: Extraterrestre, entérate: éramos antiguos cuando el universo era nuevo. Pero ahora somos solo un tenue reflejo de lo que una vez fuimos.

trans-unit.source: We are the true heirs of Altar. You will not stand in our way.
trans-unit.target: Somos los legítimos herederos de Altar. No nos obstaculizarás.

trans-unit.source: A pleasure to make your acquaintance. Let's all do our best to make this a mutually profitable encounter.
trans-unit.target: Un placer conocerle. Procuremos que esta experiencia nos beneficie a todos.

trans-unit.source: Greeting unhived, one. Why do you cross our viewports today?
trans-unit.target: Saludo sin enjambre, uno. ¿Por qué cruzas nuestros visores hoy?

trans-unit.source: Your mind reflects the changing nature of your chaotic form.
trans-unit.target: Tu mente refleja la cambiante naturaleza de tu forma caótica.

trans-unit.source: Are you yet another animal? The galaxy is teaming with you. How interesting.
trans-unit.target: ¿Eres otro animal más? La galaxia rebosa de ti. Qué fascinante.

trans-unit.source: Greetings! The Advance is always happy to make contact with a new group. We are excited to formally connect.[BR][BR]We are all guided by the same stars in the vast expanse of space. Let's chase the light and create a bright future together.
trans-unit.target: ¡Saludos! El Avance celebra la conexión con un nuevo grupo. Todos, guiados por las mismas estrellas en el inmenso espacio, perseguimos la luz para forjar un brillante porvenir juntos.

trans-unit.source: Greetings, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. {LEADERNAME:1}'s primary duty is to wipe you from the galaxy... Oh, and thanks for the Hyperdrive. It will make hunting you down that much easier.
trans-unit.target: Saludos, {JUGADORFACTION:2}. La principal tarea de {LEADERNAME:1} es erradicarte de la galaxia... Ah, y gracias por el Hiperimpulsor. Hará que sea mucho más fácil cazarte.

trans-unit.source: At last we meet the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. We are powerful and you would be wise to respect our power.
trans-unit.target: Por fin nos encontramos con el {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Yo soy {LEADERNAME:1}. Somos poderosos y sería prudente que respetaras nuestro poder.

trans-unit.source: Ah, the fabled {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Greetings from {LEADERNAME:1}. We've heard tales of your kind. Let's see if they hold true.
trans-unit.target: Ah, la famosa {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Saludos de {LEADERNAME:1}. Hemos oído historias sobre tu especie. Veamos si son ciertas.

trans-unit.source: Stars align, and finally we cross paths with the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. Let our futures be intertwined in either harmony or doom.
trans-unit.target: Las estrellas se alinean, y finalmente cruzamos caminos con la {FACTIONJUGADOR:2}. Soy {NOMBREDELIDER:1}. Permitamos que nuestros destinos se entrelacen ya sea en armonía o en fatalidad.

trans-unit.source: Oh, the {PLAYERFACTION:2}! At last, a face to the name. And such a face it is. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. Mind your business and stay out of our territory.
trans-unit.target: ¡Oh, la {JUGADORFACTION:2}! Por fin, un rostro para el nombre. Y vaya rostro es. Soy {LIDERNAME:1}. Ocúpate de tus asuntos y mantente fuera de nuestro territorio.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} have traversed the void to face us. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. Our spores have spread far, and yours is a new scent to us.
trans-unit.target: La {FACCIÓNDEJUGADOR:2} ha atravesado el vacío para enfrentarnos. Yo soy {NOMBREDELLÍDER:1}. Nuestras esporas se han esparcido lejos, y la tuya es un aroma nuevo para nosotros.

trans-unit.source: Gazes from across the galaxy fall upon the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. This is {LEADERNAME:1}. Our tendrils stretch far; intertwine with us wisely.
trans-unit.target: Miradas de toda la galaxia se posan sobre la {FACCIONDEJUGADOR:2}. Este es {NOMBREDELIDER:1}. Nuestros tentáculos se extienden lejos; entrelázate con nosotros sabiamente.

trans-unit.source: The cosmic winds whispered of the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Here you are. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. Our songs vibrate across star clusters; heed our melody or face dissonance.
trans-unit.target: Los vientos cósmicos susurraban acerca de la {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Aquí estás. Yo soy {LEADERNAME:1}. Nuestras canciones vibran a través de los cúmulos estelares; atiende nuestra melodía o enfrenta la disonancia.

trans-unit.source: Through the vast black, the {PLAYERFACTION:2} emerge. I, {LEADERNAME:1}, have waited eons. Our cores pulse with energy; align with us or risk eruption.
trans-unit.target: A través del vasto negro, emerge la {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Yo, {LEADERNAME:1}, he esperado eones. Nuestros núcleos pulsan con energía; alíneate con nosotros o arriesga la erupción.

trans-unit.source: The shimmering void reveals the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. I am known as {LEADERNAME:1}. Our scales have shielded us from cosmic tempests; approach with caution lest you feel our bite.
trans-unit.target: El vacío centelleante revela a la {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Soy conocido como {LEADERNAME:1}. Nuestras escamas nos han protegido de las tempestades cósmicas; acércate con cautela, no sea que sientas nuestro mordisco.

trans-unit.source: Space bends, and the {PLAYERFACTION:2} materialize. Greet {LEADERNAME:1}. Our minds span dimensions; connect with grace or face our disconnection.
trans-unit.target: El espacio se curva, y la {PLAYERFACTION:2} se materializa. Saluda a {LEADERNAME:1}. Nuestras mentes abarcan dimensiones; conéctate con gracia o enfrenta nuestra desconexión.

trans-unit.source: The stars unveil the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Witness {LEADERNAME:1}. Our wings blot out suns; soar with us or plummet into the abyss.
trans-unit.target: Las estrellas revelan la {FACTIONJUGADOR:2}. Observa a {NOMBREDELIDER:1}. Nuestras alas oscurecen soles; vuela con nosotros o cae en el abismo.

trans-unit.source: Galactic ripples announce the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You face {LEADERNAME:1}. Our roots drink from cosmic wells; nourish our bond or wither in the void.
trans-unit.target: Las ondas galácticas anuncian a la {FACCIONDEJUGADOR:2}. Te enfrentas a {NOMBREDELIDER:1}. Nuestras raíces beben de pozos cósmicos; nutren nuestro vínculo o se marchitan en el vacío.

trans-unit.source: The ether trembles, the {PLAYERFACTION:2} approach. Stand before {LEADERNAME:1}. Our maws hunger for new experiences; feed our curiosity or be consumed.
trans-unit.target: El éter tiembla, el {JUGADORFACTION:2} se acerca. Enfrenta a {NOMBREDELIDER:1}. Nuestras fauces ansían nuevas experiencias; alimenta nuestra curiosidad o serás consumido.

trans-unit.source: Celestial bodies align, showing us the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Bow to {LEADERNAME:1}. Our eyes see realms unknown; gaze with us or be blinded by our might.
trans-unit.target: Los cuerpos celestiales se alinean, revelándonos la {FACTIONDEJUGADOR:2}. Inclínate ante {NOMBREDELIDER:1}. Nuestros ojos ven reinos desconocidos; contempla con nosotros o quedarás cegado por nuestro poder.

trans-unit.source: We are the illustrious {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Know us and feel the weight of galaxies in our gaze. I am {LEADERNAME:1}, keeper of stars.
trans-unit.target: Somos la ilustre {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Conócenos y siente el peso de las galaxias en nuestra mirada. Soy {LEADERNAME:1}, guardián de las estrellas.

trans-unit.source: The vast expanse has whispered tales of {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Now, under the watchful eyes of {LEADERNAME:1}, we see if the whispers were true.
trans-unit.target: La vasta extensión ha susurrado historias de {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Ahora, bajo la atenta mirada de {LEADERNAME:1}, veremos si los susurros eran verdaderos.

trans-unit.source: Before you stands {LEADERNAME:1} of the unparalleled {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Our shadow stretches across constellations. Cross us, and you'll feel our cosmic wrath.
trans-unit.target: Ante ti se encuentra {LEADERNAME:1} de la inigualable {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Nuestra sombra se extiende a través de constelaciones. Enfréntanos y sentirás nuestra cósmica ira.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} dare to tread where legends walk. With {LEADERNAME:1} as our beacon, we decide if you'll be ally or another footnote in our story.
trans-unit.target: La {FACTIONDEJUGADOR:2} se atreve a pisar donde caminan las leyendas. Con {NOMBREDELLIDER:1} como nuestro faro, decidimos si serás nuestro aliado o solo otra nota al pie en nuestra historia.

trans-unit.source: Behold the majesty of the {PLAYERFACTION:1}, under the stewardship of {LEADERNAME:1}. The very nebulas pause to honor our grandeur. Will you?
trans-unit.target: Contempla la majestuosidad de la {FACTIONDELJUGADOR:1}, bajo la custodia de {NOMBREDELLIDER:1}. Las propias nebulosas se detienen para honrar nuestra grandeza. ¿Lo harás tú?

trans-unit.source: The universe's heartbeat synchronizes with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. I, {LEADERNAME:1}, bear the rhythm. Match our tempo or be lost in the cosmic cacophony.
trans-unit.target: El latido del universo se sincroniza con la {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Yo, {LEADERNAME:1}, llevo el ritmo. Iguala nuestro tempo o te perderás en la cacofonía cósmica.

trans-unit.source: From black holes to supernovae, nothing shines brighter than {PLAYERFACTION:1}. As {LEADERNAME:1} stands before you, ponder — will you be a beacon with us or merely a flicker?
trans-unit.target: Desde los agujeros negros hasta las supernovas, nada brilla más que {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Mientras {LEADERNAME:1} se encuentra ante ti, reflexiona: ¿serás un faro con nosotros o simplemente un parpadeo?

trans-unit.source: Galaxies have risen and fallen, yet the {PLAYERFACTION:1} remain, steadfast and eternal. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. Challenge our eternity at your peril.
trans-unit.target: Saludos, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. La misión principal de {LEADERNAME:1} es borrar tu existencia en la galaxia... Ah, y gracias por el Hyperdrive. Facilitará tu persecución.

trans-unit.source: The cosmic tapestry weaves tales of {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Under the vigilant gaze of {LEADERNAME:1}, we'll see if your threads strengthen or tangle the narrative.
trans-unit.target: El tapiz cósmico teje historias de {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Bajo la mirada vigilante de {LEADERNAME:1}, veremos si tus hilos fortalecen o enredan la narrativa.

trans-unit.source: Endless cycles, countless civilizations, but none like {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Led by {LEADERNAME:1}, we're the lighthouse in the cosmic void. Sail towards us, or risk the abyss.
trans-unit.target: Ciclos interminables, innumerables civilizaciones, pero ninguna como {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Guiados por {LEADERNAME:1}, somos el faro en el vacío cósmico. Navega hacia nosotros, o arriésgate al abismo.

trans-unit.source: A pleasure to meet you. I do hope we can get this relationship off to a good start.
trans-unit.target: Un placer conocerte. Espero que nuestra relación inicie bien.

trans-unit.source: Jesus Christ, what the hell are you?[BR][BR]You look absolutely monstrous. Sorry, sorry. I was just not expecting something out of my nightmares. Our diplomatic team will clean this up. How are you?
trans-unit.target: ¿Jesucristo, qué diablos eres? Pareces monstruoso. Disculpa, me tomaste por sorpresa. Nuestro equipo diplomático solucionará esto. ¿Cómo estás?

trans-unit.source: It is good to see you again. We hope we can unite the humans again under a single banner.
trans-unit.target: Es un placer verte. Aspiramos a reunir a los humanos bajo un solo estandarte.

trans-unit.source: We welcome you to what we hope will one day be a united galaxy.
trans-unit.target: Anhelamos un día acogerles en una galaxia unida.

trans-unit.source: You are absolutely too cute to be real.
trans-unit.target: Eres absolutamente demasiado encantador para ser real.

trans-unit.source: Based on your looks we must have a common evolutionary ancestor. We should meet and discuss this.
trans-unit.target: Por tu aspecto, debemos compartir un ancestro evolutivo. Deberíamos encontrarnos para discutirlo.

trans-unit.source: We are always happy to meet the Arcean civilization. We hope together we can build a better future.
trans-unit.target: Siempre nos alegra encontrar la civilización Arcean. Juntos, aspiramos a un futuro mejor.

trans-unit.source: The mighty Drengin Empire is once again on the move. Know that we will keeping a close eye on you.
trans-unit.target: El poderoso Imperio Drengin se mueve de nuevo. Ten por seguro que te observamos de cerca.

trans-unit.source: We are delighted to meet what many here believe is a related species. We hope to work together with you for the betterment of the galaxy.
trans-unit.target: Nos alegra conocer a lo que muchos creen es una especie afín. Anhelamos colaborar juntos por el bien de la galaxia.

trans-unit.source: Ah, the robotic species known as {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We hope to work with you. If not, we will dismantle you.
trans-unit.target: Ah, la especie robótica conocida como {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Anhelamos colaborar contigo. De lo contrario, te desmantelaremos.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to have had a small part in freeing you from the malevolent Drengin Empire. Now your destiny is in our hands.
trans-unit.target: Nos alegra contribuir, aunque sea mínimamente, en tu liberación del cruel Imperio Drengin. Ahora, tu destino yace en nuestras manos.

trans-unit.source: You are the first space lobsters we've met.[BR][BR]Do not fear our terminology for it is scientific because I used the word space in front of lobster.
trans-unit.target: Son las primeras langostas espaciales que conocemos. No teman nuestra nomenclatura, es científica, pues incluye la palabra espacio.

trans-unit.source: We have heard much of your civilization. We have studied a great deal of your lore and history.[BR][BR]Let me be the first to say "Live long and prosper."
trans-unit.target: Hemos escuchado mucho de su civilización; hemos estudiado su historia y leyendas. Permítanme ser el primero en decir: "Viva largo y próspero".

trans-unit.source: Wonderful, a new market! The {PLAYERFACTION:1} look forward to serving... whatever you are.
trans-unit.target: ¡Maravilloso, un nuevo mercado! Los {PLAYERFACTION:1} ansían atender... lo que sea que seas.

trans-unit.source: Despite you looking quite menacing, we nevertheless hope that we can work together to build a friendship that will span the galaxy.
trans-unit.target: A pesar de tu amenazante apariencia, aspiramos a cultivar una amistad que abarque la galaxia.

trans-unit.source: Hel-looo. Can you hear me? Hmmm, I don't see any ears.[BR][BR](Why is it always the weird ones we meet?)
trans-unit.target: Hola. ¿Me escuchas? Hmm, no veo orejas. (¿Por qué siempre encontramos a los más extraños?)

trans-unit.source: ...Sorry, I'm not sure which eye I'm supposed to look at. Those are eyes, right?
trans-unit.target: Disculpa, ignoro a cuál ojo debería mirar. Son ojos, ¿verdad?

trans-unit.source: May our eggs find your many orifices
trans-unit.target: Que nuestros huevos hallen tus innumerables orificios".

trans-unit.source: Your worm like bodies will make excellent hosts.
trans-unit.target: Vuestros cuerpos, semejantes a gusanos, serán magníficos anfitriones.

trans-unit.source: Your fur will make excellent hiding places for my eggs.
trans-unit.target: Tu pelaje será excelente refugio para mis huevos.

trans-unit.source: Your form is worthless to us. Only biological entities can store our eggs.
trans-unit.target: Tu forma no nos sirve. Solo entes biológicos pueden albergar nuestros huevos.

trans-unit.source: Worthless species! How can you serve the Festron if there is no biological mass to lay our eegs in?[BR][BR](Hard-bodied waste of my time.)
trans-unit.target: ¡Especies inútiles! ¿Cómo servir al Festron sin masa biológica para nuestros huevos? ¡Desperdicio de tiempo con cuerpo duro!

trans-unit.source: Haven't we used your carcasses before?
Salutations, travelers. Please let us proceed with opening conversational maneuvers. You may have discovered Hyperdrive but we discovered subspace streams.
trans-unit.target: Saludos, viajeros. Procedamos con diálogos iniciales. Quizás hallasteis el Hyperdrive, pero nosotros descubrimos los flujos de subsespacio.

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to meet another species, even one as adorable as you.
trans-unit.target: Nos complace conocer otra especie, incluso una tan adorable como tú.

trans-unit.source: I assume you are the machine servant for an unseen master? Can you send for them?
trans-unit.target: ¿Eres tú el siervo mecánico de un amo invisible? ¿Puedes llamarlo?

trans-unit.source: Of all the timid species of the universe you alone knew the Precursors. It is tragic that you have lost their memory.
trans-unit.target: De todas las especies temerosas del universo, solo tú conocías a los Precursores. Es trágico que haya perdido su recuerdo.

trans-unit.source: We travel the universe as explorers. But we are also traders. We are happy to meet you.
trans-unit.target: Como exploradores, surcamos el universo, también somos comerciantes. Nos alegra conocerte.

trans-unit.source: As explorers of the universe, we are ecstatic to bridge the gap between our sectors.[BR][BR](A good friendship here might give us an advantage in understanding the new sector.)
trans-unit.target: Como exploradores del cosmos, nos emociona unir nuestros sectores. Una buena amistad aquí podría favorecer nuestro entendimiento del nuevo sector.

trans-unit.source: This meeting marks some of the farthest-flung sentient life we've ever encountered. Having explored for so long, we thought we knew all the space-faring races.
trans-unit.target: Esta reunión señala la vida sensible más lejana que hemos encontrado. Tras largo explorar, creímos conocer todas las razas espaciales.

trans-unit.source: Hello, hopefully not too villainous alien. We are the Mimot Brotherhood, and we are delighted to see you, and we are not delicious.
trans-unit.target: Hola, extraterrestre no demasiado malévolo. Somos la Hermandad Mimot, encantados de verte, y no somos deliciosos.
Das auténtico terror con tu apariencia.

trans-unit.source: You look a lot like one of the species that evolved on our world. They were nice. They're dead now.
trans-unit.target: Pareces tanto a una especie de nuestro mundo. Eran agradables. Ahora están muertos.

trans-unit.source: We hope we can be friends.
I have the distinct feeling that things are not going to end well in our dealings.
trans-unit.target: Presiento un desenlace desfavorable en nuestro trato.

trans-unit.source: We remember your civilization well. You were the ones who traded our people to the Drengin for their amusement and food needs.
trans-unit.target: Recordamos bien su civilización. Fueron quienes nos comerciaron con los Drengin por diversión y alimento.

trans-unit.source: How strange! Last I saw something like you, I lost an entire wardrobe and had to fumigate an entire freighter.
trans-unit.target: ¡Qué raro! La última vez que vi algo como tú, perdí un guardarropa y tuve que fumigar un carguero completo.

trans-unit.source: Ah, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} graces us with their presence. No doubt you wish to push your limited morality onto us as well. You will find us a lot more challenging to deal with than the [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS], human.
trans-unit.target: Ah, la {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} nos honra con su presencia. Sin duda deseas imponer tu moralidad limitada también. Nos resultará más desafiante lidiar con nosotros que con los [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS], humano.

trans-unit.source: Well, if it isn't a {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} seeking our audience! Let me guess, you came to polish our boots with your high and mighty morals? Sorry to disappoint, mate, but we're a tougher shell to crack than your [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS] pals.
trans-unit.target: ¡Vaya, si no es un {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} buscando nuestra audiencia! Déjame adivinar, ¿viniste a lustrar nuestras botas con tus altivos y santurrones principios? Siento decepcionarte, amigo, pero somos una concha más dura de romper que tus colegas [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS].

trans-unit.source: Oh, a visitor from the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}. How quaint! Have you arrived to enlighten us with your narrow views of right and wrong? Brace yourself, human. We are not your [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS], and we're not easily swayed.
trans-unit.target: Oh, un visitante de la {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}. ¡Qué pintoresco! ¿Has llegado para iluminarnos con tus limitadas percepciones de lo correcto e incorrecto? Prepárate, humano. No somos tus [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS], y no nos convences fácilmente.

trans-unit.source: Ah, a {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} beacon in our void. Starry-eyed, peddling your flimsy sense of justice? You've met the [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS], now meet your match, human.
trans-unit.target: Ah, una baliza {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} en nuestro vacío. ¿Soñador, promoviendo tu frágil sentido de la justicia? Ya has conocido a los [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS], ahora encuentra tu igual, humano.

trans-unit.source: How unexpected, a {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} emissary! Here to peddle your simplistic sense of good and evil? You've got it all wrong, human. We're not your [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS] playthings.
trans-unit.target: ¡Qué inesperado, un emisario {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}! ¿Aquí para vender tu simplista sentido del bien y del mal? Lo tienes todo mal, humano. No somos tus juguetes [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS].

trans-unit.source: Well, look what the cosmic tide washed in, a {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} representative! Don't tell me, you're here to impose your black and white morality? Against us, human, your usual tricks won't do. We're not the [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS] you've danced with before.
trans-unit.target: Bueno, mira lo que la marea cósmica trajo, ¡un representante de {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}! No me digas, ¿estás aquí para imponer tu moralidad en blanco y negro? Contra nosotros, humano, tus trucos habituales no servirán. No somos los [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS] con los que has bailado antes.

trans-unit.source: A disgusting bug creature. The universe could not be more ironic.
trans-unit.target: Un repugnante insecto. El universo no podría ser más irónico.

trans-unit.source: Space worms. Of course it would be a space worms.
We have pests like you on our home world. They may look cute but they are dangerous and deadly.
trans-unit.target: En nuestro mundo, también existen plagas como tú. Aunque parezcan encantadoras, son peligrosas y mortales.

trans-unit.source: We have droids that look more useful than you.
trans-unit.target: Tenemos droides que parecen más útiles que tú.

trans-unit.source: Ah we are familiar with your species. You may find our way of doing business a little dangerous but in time you will appreciate the margins.
trans-unit.target: Conocemos bien a tu especie. Nuestra forma de negociar puede parecerte arriesgada, pero con tiempo valorarás las ganancias.

trans-unit.source: Praytell, have you moved beyond the petty barriers of 'moral' and 'immoral' in your distant galaxies?[BR][BR](Hmmm, what could I call these rock-made creatures that'd be amusing?)
trans-unit.target: ¿Has trascendido las barreras triviales de lo 'moral' e 'inmoral' en tus lejanas galaxias? (Mmm, ¿qué nombre divertido podría darles a estas criaturas de roca?)

trans-unit.source: Careful, silk-eater, you are playing with fire. Mind your tongue and distance or burn.
trans-unit.target: Ojo, devorador de seda, juegas con fuego. Cuida tu lengua y distancia o arde.

trans-unit.source: We continue to be grateful for your discovery of hyperdrive.
trans-unit.target: Persiste nuestro agradecimiento por tu hallazgo del hiperimpulsor.

trans-unit.source: Ah so the Precursor's minions have returned to our area of space at last.[BR][BR]Something very dark must have driven your kind to cooperate together to this extent.
trans-unit.target: Así que los lacayos del Precursor han regresado a nuestro espacio. Algo oscuro debió impulsar a su especie a cooperar en esta medida.

trans-unit.source: Our old rivals. We look forward to continuing to see who will dominate this galaxy.
trans-unit.target: Nuestros antiguos adversarios. Anhelamos seguir viendo quién dominará esta galaxia.

trans-unit.source: You are the species that nearly wiped out the Iconians after the Precursor war. We respect that.
trans-unit.target: Vos, la especie que casi extingue a los Iconianos tras la guerra Precursora. Respetamos eso.

trans-unit.source: Your civilization has come far over these past centuries. We are glad that we taught you to build a stargate.
trans-unit.target: Vuestra civilización ha avanzado mucho en estos siglos. Nos complace haberles enseñado a construir un portal estelar".

trans-unit.source: So you're a human. The ones who created the Hyperdrive technology. It will be a pleasure to meet you and have you for dinner.
trans-unit.target: Así que eres humano. Creadores del hiperimpulsor. Será un placer encontrarte y tenerte a la cena.

trans-unit.source: We will show you mercy because you have discovered subspace streams.
trans-unit.target: Por descubrir corrientes de subsespacio, te otorgaremos misericordia.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to find your kind out in the wild. The nutty taste of your flesh is not quite the same as the ones grown on our farms.
trans-unit.target: Nos complace hallaros en la naturaleza. El sabor de tu carne, con un toque a nuez, difiere de lo que cultivamos en nuestras granjas.

trans-unit.source: You are practically ready to be cooked.
trans-unit.target: Estás prácticamente listo para ser cocinado.

trans-unit.source: Ahh, you are the race with the same soft skin as the humans. Are you as dangerous as they are, I wonder?
trans-unit.target: Ahh, perteneces a la raza de piel suave como los humanos. ¿Serás tan peligroso como ellos, me pregunto?

trans-unit.source: So the rumors are true. There is a powerful species of murderbots in the universe. We respect that.
trans-unit.target: Los rumores son ciertos. Existe una especie poderosa de robots asesinos en el universo. Lo respetamos.

trans-unit.source: Have you returned to our area of the galaxy in the hopes to become our slaves again?
trans-unit.target: ¿Has vuelto a nuestro rincón galáctico con la esperanza de ser nuevamente nuestros esclavos?

trans-unit.source: So the religious fanatics have made it to our part of space.
trans-unit.target: Así, los fanáticos religiosos han alcanzado nuestro espacio.

trans-unit.source: Ah to meet one of your kind face to face at last.[BR][BR]You no longer hide behind third-party agents. Good. The galactic peddlers will face our wrath if you attempt to swindle us.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, cara a cara con uno de los tuyos. Dejaste de esconderte tras agentes ajenos. Bien. Si intentas engañarnos, los vendedores galácticos enfrentarán nuestra ira.

trans-unit.source: You'd do well to surrender yourselves to our chains. As slaves, your kind would find great purpose in the glory of our empire.[BR][BR](They look harder to break than bone, but they'll break all the same.)
trans-unit.target: Sería prudente rendiros a nuestras cadenas. Como esclavos, hallaréis propósito en la gloria de nuestro imperio. Parecen más fuertes que hueso, pero igualmente se romperán.

trans-unit.source: Our prophecies foretold of this meeting, cousin. The mystery of our similar appearances may soon be unraveled.
trans-unit.target: Nuestros oráculos presagiaron este encuentro, primo. Pronto se desvelará el enigma de nuestras parecidas fisonomías.

trans-unit.source: We will not judge you based on how different you appear but rather on your actions.
trans-unit.target: No juzgaremos tu apariencia distinta, sino tus acciones.

trans-unit.source: You are all together new to us. We have great hope that we can exist together peacefully.
trans-unit.target: Todos ustedes son enteramente nuevos para nosotros. Albergamos la esperanza de coexistir pacíficamente.

trans-unit.source: We hope to learn more about your delightful civilization.
trans-unit.target: Esperamos descubrir más sobre vuestra encantadora civilización.

trans-unit.source: Your reputation precedes you. We wish only for peace, for whatever that's worth to you.
trans-unit.target: Tu fama te precede. Anhelamos solo la paz, valore lo que valore para ti.

trans-unit.source: We value all life, no matter what form it takes.
trans-unit.target: Valoramos toda vida, sin importar su forma.

trans-unit.source: A pleasure to make your acquaintance. We trust you greet us with similarly peaceful intentions.
trans-unit.target: Un placer conocerte. Confiamos que nos saludas con intenciones igualmente pacíficas.

trans-unit.source: We have heard from legends that your race was lost after your service to the Precursors. We are glad to see that those legends were wrong.
trans-unit.target: Leyendas hablaban de tu raza extinta tras servir a los Precursores. Nos alegra que esas historias erraran.

trans-unit.source: It's always a pleasure to meet a potential new friend. We look forward to normalizing relations between our peoples.
trans-unit.target: Siempre es un gozo conocer a un posible nuevo amigo. Anhelamos la normalización de nuestras relaciones.

trans-unit.source: Greetings. I hope your time in this section of space has been peaceful. Please let me know if the Altarian Republic can do anything for you.[BR][BR](They look oddly similar. Perhaps they are an early version of us left by the Precursors.)
trans-unit.target: Saludos. ¿Ha sido su estancia en este rincón espacial tranquila? La República Altariana está a su servicio. (Sospecho que son una versión primitiva nuestra, dejada por los Precursores.)

trans-unit.source: Though I've no reason for this, I suspect there is much we can share and friendships we can forge.
trans-unit.target: Aunque carezco de razón, presiento que tenemos mucho que compartir y amistades por forjar.

trans-unit.source: Another example of talking meat. You actually flap a piece of meat to create sounds. Disgusting.
trans-unit.target: Otro caso de carne parlante. Realmente agitas un trozo de carne para emitir sonidos. Repugnante.

trans-unit.source: Your species may be something we can work with.
trans-unit.target: Quizás podamos colaborar con tu especie.

trans-unit.source: There were rumors that your species had recently organized to form a galactic civilization.[BR][BR]We are skeptical that you did this out of pure chance.
trans-unit.target: Habían rumores de que tu especie organizó recientemente una civilización galáctica. Dudamos que fuera mera casualidad.

trans-unit.source: Nothing could have evolved that appears as you that doesn't have an ulterior motive.
trans-unit.target: Nada que evolucione como tú carece de un móvil oculto.

trans-unit.source: We never expected to see your kind again.
trans-unit.target: Nunca presagiamos volver a ver a los de tu especie.

trans-unit.source: We have little need for a species that exists merely to act as a conduit of goods and services for others.
trans-unit.target: Poca necesidad tenemos de una especie que sólo sirve como conducto de bienes y servicios para otros.

trans-unit.source: Analyzing physical capability to retain and transport a charge as a form of new energy.[BR][BR]([I]No thought can be detected.[/I])
trans-unit.target: Analizando la capacidad física de retener y transportar carga como una nueva forma de energía.[BR][BR]([I]No se puede detectar pensamiento.[/I])

trans-unit.source: Before we begin to speak, stranger, I should tell you that my people will never be slaves again. Let us converse with that fact known. If we find the Drengin, we will have our vengeance.
trans-unit.target: Antes de hablar, forastero, que quede claro: mi pueblo jamás será esclavo otra vez. Si hallamos a los Drengin, vengaremos.

trans-unit.source: We were slaves of the evil Drengin Empire. We hope you are wary of them if you come into contact with them.
trans-unit.target: Éramos esclavos del maligno Imperio Drengin. Si los encuentras, mantén cautela.

trans-unit.source: At last, we have found you. Driving you from our homeworld was only the first step on the road to annihilating you.
trans-unit.target: Por fin, te hemos hallado. Expulsarte de nuestro planeta fue solo el primer paso hacia tu aniquilación.

trans-unit.source: We have not forgotten how you used to sell the processed oils and bone of our people that the Drengin murdered to the minor civilizations in this sector.
trans-unit.target: No olvidamos cómo comerciabas con los aceites procesados y huesos de nuestra gente asesinada por los Drengin, vendiéndolos a las civilizaciones menores de este sector.

trans-unit.source: I wonder -are you friend or foe? Since encountering other species, we've been battered and enslaved, but we have survived. We will not be turned to food, fuel, and labor again.[BR][BR](I've seen enough of my kind imprisoned and tortured. Never again ...never.)
trans-unit.target: ¿Amigo o enemigo, te pregunto? Tras encontrarnos con otras especies, hemos sufrido y sido esclavizados, pero sobrevivimos. No volveremos a ser comida, combustible y mano de obra. He presenciado suficiente tormento y encierro de los míos. Nunca más.

trans-unit.source: Ah, we have heard rumors of the civilization that first invented the FTL device known as hyperdrive. We hope to learn more about you.
trans-unit.target: Ah, rumores hemos escuchado de la civilización que inventó el hiperimpulsor FTL. Anhelamos conocer más de ustedes.

trans-unit.source: We are positively delighted to meet you. We are quickly expanding across the galaxy and hoping to make new friends.
trans-unit.target: Nos deleita conocerte. Expandimos rápidamente por la galaxia, anhelando nuevos amigos.

trans-unit.source: You are a creature unknown to us. We will reserve judgement for now.
trans-unit.target: Eres una criatura desconocida. Reservaremos juicio.

trans-unit.source: You are a new face. An interesting one at that. This sector has taken much from us, and we could use some allies to help find answers.
trans-unit.target: Eres un rostro nuevo, intrigante. Este sector nos ha despojado mucho. Necesitamos aliados para hallar respuestas.

trans-unit.source: Ah, a new alien. Have you embraced THE WAY?
trans-unit.target: Ah, un extraterrestre nuevo. ¿Has acogido EL CAMINO?

trans-unit.source: Your kind can still be uplifted by THE WAY.
trans-unit.target: Tu especie aún puede ser elevada por EL CAMINO.

trans-unit.source: We are a species that believes in a universal harmony. All civilizations will one day see this harmony or else.[BR][BR]We can see in your eyes that you will one day join us.
trans-unit.target: Somos una especie que confía en una armonía universal. Todas las civilizaciones percibirán esta sintonía tarde o temprano. Tus ojos auguran tu futura unión a nosotros.

trans-unit.source: Extreme profit is a sin to our civilization. In time we will teach you THE WAY and you will find salvation.
trans-unit.target: El lucro extremo es pecado para nuestra civilización. Con el tiempo, te guiaremos hacia LA VERDAD y hallarás salvación.

trans-unit.source: Come, seekers of light. Come, harbingers of harmony. Join us in celebrating the bright, the dark, and the divine.
trans-unit.target: Venid, buscadores de luz, heraldos de armonía. Celebrad con nosotros lo luminoso, lo oscuro, lo divino.

trans-unit.source: Human, know this: we were ancient when the universe was new. But we are now only a dim shadow of what we once were. Our own robotic creations known as The Yor, rose up and took our homeworld.
trans-unit.target: Humano, entiende: éramos antiguos cuando el universo era nuevo. Ahora solo somos una tenue sombra de lo que fuimos. Los Yor, nuestras propias creaciones robóticas, se alzaron y tomaron nuestro mundo natal.

trans-unit.source: It has been more than an age since we have encountered your kind. In the days when the Precursors strove the galaxy like giants we remember you with them.[BR][BR]Your kind always worked individually. Never before have you had any interest in gathering like this. We will find the reason.
trans-unit.target: Hace eones cruzamos con los de tu especie. En la era de los Precursores, gigantes cósmicos, estabais con ellos. Siempre obrasteis solos, nunca agrupándose así. Hallaremos la razón.

trans-unit.source: We have learned in the dark years of our exile that things with large eyes cannot be trusted.
trans-unit.target: En los años sombríos de nuestro exilio, comprendimos que no se puede confiar en seres de ojos grandes.

trans-unit.source: Ah the brutal Drengin Empire has returned to this part of space. You will find that we have little patience for species bent on conquest.
trans-unit.target: Ah, el brutal Imperio Drengin retorna a este rincón del espacio. Hallaréis que nuestra paciencia es escasa para especies con ansias de conquista.

trans-unit.source: So at long last we meet again. We will take back our homeworld from you.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente nos reencontramos. Recuperaremos nuestro mundo.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to meet you directly and not through your agents.[BR][BR]Your terraforming technology allowed us to burn out the native inhabitants of New Iconia.
trans-unit.target: Nos complace conocerte sin intermediarios. Gracias a tu tecnología de terraformación, desalojamos a los habitantes nativos de Nueva Iconia.

trans-unit.source: Your kind is not one I recognize. We, who had given rise to the Yor and watched as the worlds around us established space travel after us, have never seen you. Far you have traveled, but to what end, I wonder.
trans-unit.target: No reconocemos a los de tu especie. Nosotros, progenitores del Yor y testigos del nacimiento del viaje espacial, nunca te hemos visto. Has viajado lejos, pero ¿con qué propósito?

trans-unit.source: You -the Precursors never mentioned your kind. How is it now you emerge from distant galaxies with tools of destruction?[BR][BR](Is there more the Precursors hid from us?)
trans-unit.target: Jamás los Precursores hablaron de vosotros. ¿Cómo surgís ahora de galaxias lejanas con instrumentos de destrucción? ¿Acaso los Precursores nos ocultaron algo más?

trans-unit.source: You look like the beings who exiled us from our native planet. We will not suffer the same fate again.
trans-unit.target: Tu semblante evoca a los que nos desterraron de nuestro hogar cósmico. No viviremos tal suerte de nuevo.

trans-unit.source: Our legends tell of a species that traveled with the Arnor when we still lived on our first world. We never thought we would meet.
trans-unit.target: Nuestras leyendas hablan de una especie que viajó con los Arnor en nuestro primer mundo. No pensábamos encontrarnos.

trans-unit.source: Your appearance almost seems like something out of a dream.
So the tainted Altarians have finally made it into the larger galaxy.[BR][BR]Know that we will eventually return to our homeworld that you stole from us.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, los corruptos Altarianos han penetrado la vasta galaxia. Sepan que aspiramos a retornar a nuestro planeta natal, usurpado por ustedes.

trans-unit.source: You look like an abomination of a living thing.

We have longed to meet your civilization. We know you were driven from your homeworld by the wretched machines.[BR][BR]We were exiled from our homeworld by the evil Altarians whose very existence is an abomination.
trans-unit.target: Ansiamos conocer tu civilización. Sabemos que las despreciables máquinas os expulsaron de vuestro mundo. Nosotros, desterrados por los detestables Altarianos, cuya existencia misma es una abominación.

trans-unit.source: At last you operate in the open. Our people sometimes miss acting as your agents when the need came to it.[BR][BR]Perhaps we can again come to an arrangement.
trans-unit.target: Por fin actúas a la vista. A veces, nuestros compatriotas añoran ser tus agentes. Quizás podamos llegar a un arreglo de nuevo.

trans-unit.source: Welcome, welcome. It can be so hard to find pleasant company. Come, let us share in the small talk of our newly connected Sectors.[BR][BR](Hehehe, by the time they hear of our reputation, we'll have pocketed all their most lucrative information.)
trans-unit.target: Bienvenidos. Es arduo hallar compañía agradable. Conversemos sobre nuestros Sectores recién unidos. (Jejeje, cuando sepan de nuestra fama, ya habremos embolsado su información más valiosa.)

trans-unit.source: You humans reportedly are no strangers to driving a hard bargain. We look forward to negotiating many profitable deals with you.
trans-unit.target: No son ajenos, humanos, a las duras negociaciones. Ansiamos acordar lucrativos tratos con ustedes.

trans-unit.source: Ah more humans. Your species is always surprising to us at how cunning you can be when trading.
trans-unit.target: Ah, más humanos. Siempre nos asombra vuestra astucia en el comercio.

trans-unit.source: We are happy and grateful to have met you. Your knowledge of these Subspace streams had vastly expanded our potential markets.
trans-unit.target: Nos alegra y agradecemos haberte conocido. Tu saber sobre los flujos del Subespacio ha multiplicado nuestras posibilidades de mercado.

trans-unit.source: What a pleasure to meet you. We are a civilization that values things that have inherent value.[BR][BR]If you are ever of the mind of selling your own kind onto the open market, know that there is definitely an opportunity by working with us. Your adorable pelts would fetch a compelling price on the market.
trans-unit.target: Un placer conocerte. Valoramos lo intrínsecamente valioso. Si alguna vez consideras vender tu especie, con nosotros hay oportunidad. Tus adorables pieles serían cotizadas en el mercado.

trans-unit.source: Does your kind trade? We are a corporation looking to profit. Is there profit to be had with you?
trans-unit.target: ¿Comercia su especie? Somos una corporación en busca de ganancias. ¿Existe margen de lucro con ustedes?

trans-unit.source: Silicon-based lifeforms? Ah. We can offer many beneficial deals to keep you flush with the resources that help your kind grow.[BR][BR](Hopefully, they're not ignorant enough to try and make do without the market.)
trans-unit.target: ¿Formas de vida basadas en silicio? Ah. Podemos ofertarles innumerables tratos ventajosos para que nunca les falten los recursos que les ayudan a crecer. (Esperemos que no sean tan ignorantes como para intentar subsistir sin el mercado).

trans-unit.source: The hive welcomes the humans to this part of space.
trans-unit.target: La colmena recibe a los humanos en este rincón espacial.

trans-unit.source: Our hive has begun to colonize the stars. We have seen many things. But never something quite as striking as you.
trans-unit.target: Nuestra colmena ha iniciado la colonización estelar. Hemos presenciado maravillas, pero nada tan impactante como tú.

trans-unit.source: You are clearly impressive and distinctive from the other species of the galaxy. Perhaps there is a future for both of us.
trans-unit.target: Eres sin duda impresionante y distinto de las otras especies de la galaxia. Quizás exista un futuro para ambos.

trans-unit.source: Your face looks familiar to us. For many years, our surface world was ruthlessly harvested for precious metals and gems.[BR]We never actually caught the beings who strip-mined our world before we were ready for the stars but you match the description.
trans-unit.target: Tu rostro nos resulta conocido. Durante años, saquearon sin piedad nuestro mundo en busca de metales y gemas preciosas. Nunca atrapamos a los responsables, pero encajas en la descripción.

trans-unit.source: The Hive welcomes you. It's interesting to come across another silicon-based life form. We could have much in common.[BR][BR](They look so frail.)
trans-unit.target: La Colmena te saluda. Es intrigante encontrar otra forma de vida basada en silicio. Podríamos tener mucho en común. (Parecen tan frágiles.)

trans-unit.source: Another animal. We assumed that the vastness of space would result in far more diversity. It is as if the gods were lazy.
trans-unit.target: Otro animal. Presumíamos que la inmensidad del cosmos resultaría en mayor diversidad. Como si los dioses fueran perezosos.

trans-unit.source: You appear different from some of the others. We do not know how to classify your kind.
trans-unit.target: Pareces distinto a otros. No sabemos categorizar tu especie.

trans-unit.source: So the legends are true. Our ancient groves sang of beings such as you that explored worlds.
trans-unit.target: Así son las leyendas. Nuestros antiguos bosques susurraban de seres como tú, exploradores de mundos.

trans-unit.source: We are optimistic that we can grow together.
trans-unit.target: Somos optimistas en nuestro crecimiento conjunto.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to finally meet something that isn't an animal. We are not quite sure what you are.
trans-unit.target: Nos alegra al fin encontrar algo que no es animal. No estamos seguros de qué eres.

trans-unit.source: Your reputation for profit over the wellbeing of others is known to us. You will find no welcome ports with us.
trans-unit.target: Conocemos tu reputación de anteponer el lucro al bienestar ajeno. No encontrarás puertos acogedores con nosotros.

trans-unit.source: Your appearance is brilliant. I hope this first contact can be productive and establish a healthy relationship between our factions.[BR][BR](So help me if the Alliance has soured them to humanity...)
trans-unit.target: Tu presencia resplandece. Anhelo que este primer contacto fructifique en una relación sana entre nuestras facciones. Que Dios me asista si la Alianza los ha amargado contra la humanidad...

trans-unit.source: Forgive me if this question is straightforward but recent events have given us cause to change our first contact protocols.[BR][BR]Are your intentions innately hostile or self-serving?
trans-unit.target: Disculpa la franqueza, pero los sucesos recientes nos obligan a modificar nuestros protocolos iniciales. ¿Tus intenciones son hostiles o egoístas?

trans-unit.source: I'll save you the taste of boot and speak first. I represent the Luxar, and yes, I can read your mind. Please be at least vaguely courteous.
trans-unit.target: Preservaré tu sabor a bota y hablaré primero. Hablo por Luxar, y sí, puedo leer tu mente. Por favor, muestra al menos un vago respeto.

trans-unit.source: Your mind has revealed enough to me. You're a ravaging consumer. Perhaps you can think why I shouldn't consider you an immediate threat.
trans-unit.target: Tu mente lo ha delatado todo. Eres un consumidor voraz. Quizás puedas deducir por qué no debería verte como una amenaza inminente.

trans-unit.source: So that's what's driven your change. Don't worry; your secret is safe with us. All of the other races are far from understanding. It's best not to keep secrets from us; telepathy eventually reveals everything.
trans-unit.target: Eso alimenta tu cambio. Tranquilo, tu secreto está resguardado. Las demás razas están lejos de comprender. Es mejor no ocultarnos nada; la telepatía lo descubre todo.

trans-unit.source: Shiny? That's your only impression of us? No, you didn't say that out loud. We can read your mind.
trans-unit.target: ¿Brillantes? ¿Esa es tu única percepción de nosotros? No, no lo dijiste en voz alta. Leemos tu mente.

trans-unit.source: Save your insults; they're less creative than you think. Ah, you've already deduced we can read your mind.
trans-unit.target: Guarda tus insultos; carecen de ingenio. Ah, ya descubriste que leemos tus pensamientos.

trans-unit.source: Such anger. Hmmm. You should be warned; we can foresee your tactics inside your mind. Think twice before declaring us your enemy.
trans-unit.target: Tal furia. Precaución; percibimos tus estrategias mentales. Reflexiona antes de nombrarnos enemigo.

trans-unit.source: You're almost as pleasant as you'd like others to believe you are.
trans-unit.target: Casi alcanzas la agradable imagen que de ti mismo procuras proyectar.

trans-unit.source: A faction led by Synthetics? Curious.
Your mind is clouded by doctrine. I've telepathically connected with many forms of sentience across the universe, but never anything divine.
trans-unit.target: Tu mente se nubla con doctrina. He conectado telepáticamente con seres del universo, pero jamás con lo divino.

trans-unit.source: Don't dwell on your mistakes. I see you bear tremendous guilt for constructing the Yor, but you'll never be free to thrive till you've rid yourself of that guilt.
trans-unit.target: No te atormentes por tus errores. Veo el enorme remordimiento que llevas por la creación del Yor, pero jamás prosperarás hasta que te deshagas de esa culpa.

trans-unit.source: Yes, we may be open to trade between our factions. We will have no patience for bad deals, though. We can read your mind and will know if you try to gouge a bargain.
trans-unit.target: Sí, podríamos comerciar entre nuestras facciones. No toleraremos malos acuerdos. Podemos leer tu mente y sabremos si intentas estafarnos.

trans-unit.source: Your mind is so chaotic. Do you frequently juggle that many thoughts at a time? Focusing on fewer things may get you better results. Yes, I can read your mind.
trans-unit.target: Tu mente es un caos. ¿Siempre malabareas con tantos pensamientos? Concentrarte en menos podría ser más provechoso. Sí, puedo leer tus pensamientos.

trans-unit.source: We meet again. Hmmm. You've gotten much better at keeping your thoughts hidden. Regardless, we should have expected you to be among the races to explore these new parts of the universe.
trans-unit.target: Nos reencontramos. Hmm. Has mejorado en ocultar tus pensamientos. Aun así, debimos prever que estarías entre las razas exploradoras del universo.

trans-unit.source: Is all you think about death and war?
Searching your mind is like stepping into an echo chamber of chittering children. I always get left with a migraine.
trans-unit.target: Explorar la mente es adentrarse en una cámara de ecos infantiles; siempre deja una migraña.

trans-unit.source: When did your malformed ilk learn to construct and use a communicator? Have you any need of it? Since when did sentient races make deals with oversized diseases?
trans-unit.target: ¿Cuándo aprendió tu estirpe deformada a construir y usar un comunicador? ¿Lo necesitas? ¿Desde cuándo las razas conscientes hacen tratos con enfermedades sobredimensionadas?

trans-unit.source: We are the Korath! We are the Drengin unafraid to rid the galaxy of repulsive species like you. If you serve us, I'll consider delaying your eradication.[BR][BR]([I]All you sense is a rage without words.[/I])
trans-unit.target: ¡Somos los Korath, los Drengin valientes! Extirparemos especies repulsivas como la tuya. Si nos sirves, quizás aplacemos tu exterminio. Sólo percibes una ira sin palabras.

trans-unit.source: Your efficiency and resilience are clear to us. We have no love for efforts of destruction, though, and hope for peace.[BR][BR](Keep the mind clear, keep the mind clear, keep the mind clear...)
trans-unit.target: Nos consta tu eficacia y resistencia. No apreciamos los esfuerzos destructivos, anhelamos paz.

trans-unit.source: We see you. We watch you. We learn. We take to space.[BR][BR](We we we we we See see see see see)
trans-unit.target: Te observamos. Aprendemos. Nos adentramos en el cosmos. Vemos.

trans-unit.source: [I]The many blinking eyes appear vacant but maintain contact through the display.[/I][BR][BR]([I]The mind of the Irradiated lifeform is a chaotic bubble of unintelligible sounds.[/I])
trans-unit.target: Los numerosos ojos parpadean en la pantalla, parecen vacíos pero mantienen contacto. La mente del ser irradiado es una burbuja caótica de sonidos incomprensibles.

trans-unit.source: Our scientists say your day-night cycle last only a handful of hours. That's truly fascinating.
trans-unit.target: Nuestros sabios afirman que tu ciclo día-noche apenas dura unas pocas horas. Fascinante, verdaderamente".

trans-unit.source: Ah! Apologies and greetings. Your physique resembles ancient predators that plagued our kind. Let's hope for a better relationship.
trans-unit.target: ¡Ah! Perdón y saludos. Tu aspecto recuerda a antiguos depredadores. Esperemos una relación más amigable.

trans-unit.source: Early reports indicated you've been long among the stars. There is much we can share.
trans-unit.target: Primeras noticias señalan que has morado largo tiempo entre estrellas. Tenemos mucho por compartir.

trans-unit.source: Your reputation would have us hesitate to offer trust, but we hope to see the good in everyone. How can we help you?
trans-unit.target: Vuestra fama nos hace dudar, pero anhelamos hallar bondad en todos. ¿Cómo podemos asistirles?

trans-unit.source: Oh! Our intelligence indicates you have a dedication to neutrality and balance. We share much common ground (metaphorically) -fertile ash for a strong alliance. Shall we talk more?
trans-unit.target: ¡Oh! Nuestros datos revelan tu compromiso con la neutralidad y equilibrio. Compartimos terreno fértil (metafóricamente) -ceniza próspera para una fuerte alianza. ¿Conversamos más?

trans-unit.source: Greeting. We struggle to see the reason for brutality in this vast expanse filled with light and life. Let's find a brighter future.
trans-unit.target: Saludos. Nos cuesta entender la brutalidad en esta vasta luminosidad llena de vida. Busquemos un futuro más brillante.

trans-unit.source: Greetings. Tales of your tenacity and determination command respect. Let's see what we can share.
trans-unit.target: Saludos. Tus historias de tenacidad y determinación imponen respeto. Veamos qué podemos compartir.

trans-unit.source: Your glowing eyes and shining exoskeleton are genuinely glorious. We hope to form a strong alliance.
trans-unit.target: Tu mirada resplandeciente y exoesqueleto brillante son gloriosos. Anhelamos una alianza sólida.

trans-unit.source: We admire what you've achieved in bringing so many groups together. We remain skeptical of religion but look forward to working together.
trans-unit.target: Admiramos tu logro al unificar tantos grupos. Aunque seguimos dudando de la religión, anhelamos colaborar.

trans-unit.source: We hope that some friendly trade negotiations will lead to much deeper friendships.
trans-unit.target: Anhelamos que negociaciones amistosas desemboquen en amistades profundas.

trans-unit.source: Before taking to the stars, we would have never imagined large complex plants, let alone ones that could negotiate.
trans-unit.target: Antes de volar a las estrellas, ni soñábamos con plantas grandes y complejas, mucho menos con las que pudieran negociar.

trans-unit.source: While we respect your strong will and individuality, no being is a star. We thrive when we work together.
trans-unit.target: Aunque valoramos tu voluntad e individualidad, nadie es una estrella. Florecemos en unión.

trans-unit.source: Your efficiency and resilience are clear to us. We have no love for efforts of destruction, though, and hope for peace.
trans-unit.target: Your efficiency and resilience are clear to us. We have no love for efforts of destruction, though, and hope for peace.

trans-unit.source: While we hold little hope of alliance, we extend it nonetheless. It's always possible to recognize the strength of differences and collaboration.
trans-unit.target: Aun con escasa esperanza, ofrecemos alianza. Reconocer la fortaleza en la diversidad y colaboración siempre es viable.

trans-unit.source: You see more than you tell; this we know. Should you decide to share your insight, we'd be happy to listen.
trans-unit.target: Ves más de lo que revelas; lo sabemos. Si eliges compartir tu perspicacia, escucharemos con gusto.

trans-unit.source: Can you understand us? We have yet to determine if you are a blight or boon to the universe's life.
trans-unit.target: ¿Nos comprendes? Todavía no discernimos si eres plaga o bendición para la vida universal.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to meet you, {LEADERNAME:1}. May our civilizations work together for a better future.
I believe we can work together.
We greet you with a hope to the future.
We hope we can build a mutually beneficial relationship.
trans-unit.target: Catalogaremos tu historia después de aniquilarte.

trans-unit.source: We are going to destroy you.
trans-unit.target: We are going to destroy you.

trans-unit.source: There will never be peace between us.
trans-unit.target: There will never be peace between us.

trans-unit.source: We will catalog your history after we wipe you out.
trans-unit.target: We will catalog your history after we wipe you out.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to have finally met.
trans-unit.target: Nos alegra habernos encontrado, al fin.

trans-unit.source: I think you would find us difficult to digest.
trans-unit.target: Creo que nos encontrarías difíciles de digerir.

trans-unit.source: Very well, same back to you.
You can be assured that we were not planning to eat you.
trans-unit.target: Ten por seguro, no planeábamos devorarte.

trans-unit.source: There is a reasonable chance we were not going to eat you.
trans-unit.target: Existe una probabilidad razonable de que no íbamos a comerte.

trans-unit.source: I think you would give us indigestion.
We hope we are able to work with you.
Oh we love working with criminals.
trans-unit.target: Oh, nos encanta trabajar con criminales.

trans-unit.source: Greetings. Our relationship depends mostly on whether you will respect our territory.
trans-unit.target: Saludos. Nuestro vínculo oscila en tu respeto por nuestro territorio.

trans-unit.source: I suspect we are not going to get along.
trans-unit.target: Presiento que no vamos a congeniar.

trans-unit.source: Are those screams I hear in the background?
trans-unit.target: ¿Son esos gritos los que oigo en el fondo?

trans-unit.source: That is not at all ominous.
We have no problem interacting with a machine intelligence.
trans-unit.target: No tenemos ningún problema interactuando con una inteligencia artificial.

trans-unit.source: You have nothing to fear. We have no intention of making you slaves..today.
trans-unit.target: Sin temor debes estar. No aspiramos a esclavizarte...hoy.

trans-unit.source: I can assure you that we are probably maybe not a threat.
trans-unit.target: Probablemente, tal vez, no representamos una amenaza.

trans-unit.source: That is a shame. We hope to build a better future with you.
trans-unit.target: Lamentable. Aspiramos a forjar un futuro superior contigo.

trans-unit.source: You look like a dragon. Has anyone mentioned that?
trans-unit.target: Pareces un dragón. ¿Te lo han dicho?

trans-unit.source: Well, I do like money. A lot.
trans-unit.target: Bueno, el dinero me agrada. Mucho.

trans-unit.source: We look forward to building a better future with you.
trans-unit.target: Anhelamos construir un futuro superior contigo.

trans-unit.source: We sense no true hostility from you and hope that it remains so.
trans-unit.target: Presumimos ausencia de hostilidad y anhelamos su perdurabilidad.

trans-unit.source: An animal? As opposed to what? A plant or mineral? Right... a plant
trans-unit.target: ¿Un animal? ¿En contraste con qué? ¿Un vegetal o mineral? Cierto... un vegetal.

trans-unit.source: Let's maintain this hopeful and friendly relationship.
trans-unit.target: Mantengamos esta relación amigable y esperanzada.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to finally meet you.
You humans are supposed to be diplomatic. You have failed.
trans-unit.target: Supuestamente diplomáticos, los humanos habéis fracasado.

trans-unit.source: We will unite under my rule.
We are optimistic that we won't need to destroy you.
trans-unit.target: Optamos por la esperanza de no necesitar aniquilarte.

trans-unit.source: Don't let our cuteness fool you. We are also adorable.
trans-unit.target: No te dejes engañar por nuestra ternura. Somos igualmente adorables.

trans-unit.source: I suspect it had more to do with ecomorphism.
trans-unit.target: Sospecho que tenía más que ver con el ecomorfismo.

trans-unit.source: The future remains to be seen, human.
trans-unit.target: Aguarda, humano, el futuro aún es incierto.

trans-unit.source: We shall pluck those cow eyes out of your skull, human.
trans-unit.target: Arrancaremos esos ojos de vaca de tu cráneo, humano.

trans-unit.source: We are a more perfect version of you.
trans-unit.target: Somos una versión más perfecta de ti.

trans-unit.source: The flappings of talking meat are irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: Las palabrerías de la carne parlante son irrelevantes.

trans-unit.source: Our destiny is ours. We shall forge it as we see fit.
trans-unit.target: Nuestro destino nos pertenece. Lo moldearemos a nuestro antojo.

trans-unit.source: We look forward to doing business.
We understand if you need some diplomatic training.
trans-unit.target: Entendemos si requieres cierta formación diplomática.

trans-unit.source: We can hear you just fine, and your thoughts are clear -weird is relative.
trans-unit.target: Nos llega tu voz clara, tus ideas se entienden - lo extraño es relativo.

trans-unit.source: Do not lay eggs in us.
You would do well to speak diplomatically to us.
trans-unit.target: Sería prudente que nos hables con diplomacia.

trans-unit.source: Your nature is unimportant to us.
Crass. In the future, let's find something useful to discuss.
trans-unit.target: Grosero. En el futuro, busquemos algo útil para conversar.

trans-unit.source: You should research more independent ways to reproduce.
trans-unit.target: Debes indagar en modos más autónomos de reproducirte.

trans-unit.source: We have a natural fear of you. Our ancestors were preyed upon by beings like you.
trans-unit.target: Naturalmente, os tememos. Nuestros antepasados fueron presa de seres como vosotros.

trans-unit.source: You are mistaken. We are the ultimate form of life.
trans-unit.target: Erras. Somos la forma de vida definitiva.

trans-unit.source: Our creators, the Iconians, knew them. We inherited their world.
trans-unit.target: Los Iconianos, nuestros creadores, los conocían. Heredamos su mundo.

trans-unit.source: There will be surprises as long as there are stars.

trans-unit.target: Damos la bienvenida cordialmente a los exploradores pacíficos.

trans-unit.source: We can assure you that we are not looking to eat you.
You will find our eggs comforting within your bodies.
trans-unit.target: Encontrarán nuestros huevos un consuelo en sus cuerpos.

trans-unit.source: We hope to show the universe to you.
We will definitely be killing your kind soon.
trans-unit.target: Pronto, sin duda, exterminaremos a los de tu especie.

trans-unit.source: We all have to find a way to make a living.
trans-unit.target: Todos debemos hallar cómo ganarnos la vida.

trans-unit.source: Ha! Truly fascinating how similar forms take different paths throughout the galaxy.
trans-unit.target: ¡Ah! Fascinante, cómo formas similares toman rumbos distintos por la galaxia.

trans-unit.source: Despite your attitude, we are willing to work with you.
trans-unit.target: A pesar de tu postura, estamos dispuestos a colaborar contigo.

trans-unit.source: The green hairless mammal has opinions.
trans-unit.target: El mamífero calvo y verde tiene opiniones.

trans-unit.source: You have us to thank for the subspace streams.
trans-unit.target: Debéis agradecernos por los flujos de subsespacio.

trans-unit.source: It must have been hard for you to say that. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: Debe haber sido difícil pronunciar eso. Gracias.

trans-unit.source: Bold words from a weak fleshling.
trans-unit.target: Osadas palabras de una débil criatura carnal.

trans-unit.source: If we were capable of feeling amusement, your unearned arrogance would merit such a feeling.
trans-unit.target: Si pudiéramos sentir diversión, tu arrogancia inmerecida la merecería.

trans-unit.source: As long as it's technically legal we are always happy to work with others.
trans-unit.target: Siempre complacidos de colaborar, mientras sea legalmente aceptable.

trans-unit.source: This relationship will require some effort.
Morality is more than a philosophical exercise.
trans-unit.target: La moralidad trasciende el mero ejercicio filosófico.

trans-unit.source: Always pleased to speak to another civilized species.
trans-unit.target: Siempre un gusto dialogar con otra especie civilizada.

trans-unit.source: You would do well to learn some respect.
trans-unit.target: Harías bien en aprender algo de respeto.

trans-unit.source: You're not in competition with us. You're not even in the game.
trans-unit.target: No compites con nosotros. Ni siquiera estás en el juego.

trans-unit.source: We don't require respect. Only obedience.
We hope to continue a mutual beneficial relationship with you.
trans-unit.target: Esperamos proseguir nuestra relación beneficiosa mutua.

trans-unit.source: We are not digestible. I'm just going to get that right out there.
trans-unit.target: No somos digeribles. Sólo quería dejar eso claro.

trans-unit.source: There might be a future for you.
trans-unit.target: Podría haber un futuro para ti.

trans-unit.source: I don't think I like you.
It remains to be seen whether we will be friends or adversaries.
trans-unit.target: Aún está por verse si seremos amigos o adversarios.

trans-unit.source: I suspect you say that to everyone.
trans-unit.target: Sospecho que eso se lo dices a todos.

trans-unit.source: Wouldn't you want to at least remove our hair?
trans-unit.target: ¿No querrías al menos despojarnos del cabello?

trans-unit.source: There is more to us than what you can see.
trans-unit.target: Hay en nosotros más de lo visible.

trans-unit.source: You may be something we can work with.
trans-unit.target: Puede que seas algo con lo que podamos trabajar.

trans-unit.source: We will never again serve you.
The Way is not a religion. It is a philosophy that brings many species together.
trans-unit.target: El Camino no es una religión. Es una filosofía que une a muchas especies.

trans-unit.source: We would never dream of swindling one as noble and civilized as, eh, you.
trans-unit.target: Jamás soñaríamos con engañar a alguien tan noble y civilizado como tú.
El sufrimiento sin sentido solo engendra odio.

trans-unit.source: With respect to your "empire," I decline.
I'm not really sure what to say to this.
trans-unit.target: No sé realmente qué responder a esto.

trans-unit.source: We will reserve our judgement on you.
We know of your world from the Hiergemenon.
trans-unit.target: Conocemos tu mundo a través del Hiergemenon.

trans-unit.source: We feel the same about you, your blueness.
There is only one form of life.
trans-unit.target: Sólo existe una forma de vida.

trans-unit.source: Then our future together is bright!
We won't hesitate to reach out.
We have no problem working with robot people.
trans-unit.target: Trabajar con robots no supone problema.

trans-unit.source: Robots make poor hatcheries for our eggs. Perhaps we can work together.
trans-unit.target: Los robots resultan ineficaces incubadoras para nuestros huevos. Quizás podríamos colaborar.

trans-unit.source: You sound like the other 5 sentient species that co-evolved with us.
trans-unit.target: Resuenas como las otras cinco especies sensibles que evolucionaron con nosotros.

trans-unit.source: You drove us from our home world.
trans-unit.target: Nos expulsaste de nuestro mundo natal.

trans-unit.source: I am sure you will need spare parts eventually.
trans-unit.target: Estoy segura que necesitarás repuestos eventualmente.

trans-unit.source: We have no use for slaves. Your damaged eye intrigues us.
trans-unit.target: No necesitamos esclavos. Tu ojo dañado nos intriga.
Pero nos agrada todo el mundo.

trans-unit.source: We left your world because there was nothing left of value.
trans-unit.target: Abandonamos tu mundo, ya desprovisto de valor.

trans-unit.source: You will have to prove you are more than slavelings.
trans-unit.target: Deberán demostrar que son más que simples esclavos.

trans-unit.source: You have to understand that Torian oils are a delicacy. If anything, we are the victims here.
trans-unit.target: Debes comprender, los aceites de Torian son un manjar. Somos víctimas, si acaso.

trans-unit.source: We lost many to other species as well. We may share enemies.
trans-unit.target: También perdimos muchos ante otras especies. Quizás compartimos enemigos.

trans-unit.source: We look forward to exploring the universe together.
You have a friend in us.
My advice to you is that you stay out of our way.
trans-unit.target: Te aconsejo que no te cruzas en nuestro camino.

trans-unit.source: You will be able to judge us on our chara-excellent prices and sales.
trans-unit.target: Juzgadnos por nuestra esencia: precios excelentes y ventas.

trans-unit.source: No one should struggle alone. You may count on us.
trans-unit.target: No debes enfrentar solo las luchas. Cuenta con nosotros.

trans-unit.source: We are open to new ideas.
Our adorable eyes and sharp teeth greet you and your way.
trans-unit.target: Nuestros ojos encantadores y dientes afilados te saludan en tu camino.

trans-unit.source: We have no need for superstition.
We are big supporters of THE WAY. The statue of Kyndras is one of our best sellers.
trans-unit.target: Somos fervientes seguidores del CAMINO. La estatua de Kyndras se cuenta entre nuestros artículos más vendidos.

trans-unit.source: We accept your friendship but not your theology.
trans-unit.target: Aceptamos tu amistad, mas no tu teología.

trans-unit.source: You have nothing to fear from us.
trans-unit.target: De nosotros, nada has de temer.

trans-unit.source: Were those eyes at cute as ours?
trans-unit.target: ¿Acaso esos ojos eran tan adorables como los nuestros?

trans-unit.source: Your civilization is already dead. You just don't know it yet.
trans-unit.target: Tu civilización ya está muerta, solo que aún no lo sabes.

trans-unit.source: We took your homeworld because you were too weak.
trans-unit.target: Arrebatamos tu mundo natal, eras demasiado débil.

trans-unit.source: We are always here to help.
We chase the light, looking for life at every star.
trans-unit.target: Perseguimos la luz, buscando vida en cada estrella.

trans-unit.source: We carry the tools of our own protection. You have yet to encounter the filth we have.
trans-unit.target: Portamos nuestras propias armas de protección. Aún no has enfrentado la mugre que nosotros ya conocemos.

trans-unit.source: You seriously look like a dragon.
We have our own interests to attend to.
You may be a useful ally in what is to come.
trans-unit.target: Podrías ser un aliado útil en lo que vendrá.

trans-unit.source: That seems a little ironic coming from you.
trans-unit.target: Resulta algo irónico, viniendo de ti.

trans-unit.source: We hope we can find a peaceful future together.
trans-unit.target: Albergamos la esperanza de un futuro pacífico compartido.

trans-unit.source: We are more alive than a fleshing ever could be.
trans-unit.target: Somos más vivos que cualquier carnalidad.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps together we can both return to our homeworlds.
