trans-unit.target: Quizás juntos, podamos retornar a nuestros mundos.

trans-unit.source: There is always work for a 3 meter tall dragon.
trans-unit.target: Siempre hay tarea para un dragón de tres metros.

trans-unit.source: We prefer to keep our dealings in the light.
trans-unit.target: Preferimos mantener nuestras relaciones a la luz.

trans-unit.source: Thank you. I'd love to hear so much about your sector first.
trans-unit.target: Gracias. Me encantaría saber más sobre tu sector.

trans-unit.source: I believe you are a species we can do business with.
trans-unit.target: Creo que somos especies con las cuales podemos comerciar.

trans-unit.source: We are hopeful that we can forge a future together.
trans-unit.target: Guardamos la esperanza de forjar un futuro juntos.

trans-unit.source: I'm not sure we are going to get along.
trans-unit.target: No estoy seguro de que nos llevaremos bien.

trans-unit.source: The laws of supply and demand are not bounded by biology.
trans-unit.target: Las leyes de oferta y demanda trascienden la biología.

trans-unit.source: That giant rifle doesn't look very welcoming.
trans-unit.target: El enorme fusil no resulta acogedor.

trans-unit.source: A species that is made of stone is something new to us.
trans-unit.target: Una especie pétrea nos resulta novedosa.

trans-unit.source: I am choosing to take that as a compliment.
trans-unit.target: Opto por tomar eso como un halago.

trans-unit.source: That weapon you hold is impressive.
We deny ever stealing all the Nemandic gems from your sacred shrines.
trans-unit.target: Negamos rotundamente haber robado todas las gemas Nemandic de tus santuarios sagrados.

trans-unit.source: There may be some common ground we can find.
We are different from the others.
We remember the sentient trees of your world when they were saplings.
trans-unit.target: Recordamos a los árboles sensibles de tu mundo cuando eran retoños.

trans-unit.source: That is not as heartwarming as you might have thought it sounded.
trans-unit.target: No es tan conmovedor como podrías haber pensado.

trans-unit.source: We were made to be beyond biology.
trans-unit.target: Fuimos creados para trascender la biología.

trans-unit.source: Our profits are what improves the wellbeing of the the universe.
trans-unit.target: Mejoramos el universo con nuestras ganancias.

trans-unit.source: Prove yourselves worthy of our attention, and we can maintain a positive relationship.
trans-unit.target: Demostrad vuestra valía y mantendremos una relación positiva.

trans-unit.source: We strive to extend kindness to all we meet.
trans-unit.target: Nos esforzamos por desplegar amabilidad a cada ser que encontramos.

trans-unit.source: I'll make it a point to be nicer the next time you violate my privacy.
trans-unit.target: La próxima vez que invadas mi privacidad, seré más amable.

trans-unit.source: Your kind is no good to us without fleshy bits.
trans-unit.target: Sin carne, tu especie no nos sirve.

trans-unit.source: Ha! No remorse over such a violation? Lovely.
I don't need to read minds to tell you're not as special as you think.
trans-unit.target: No necesito leer pensamientos para saber que no eres tan especial como crees.

trans-unit.source: Telepathy? Your kind is curiously blessed.
trans-unit.target: ¿Telepatía? Tu especie posee una bendición curiosa.

trans-unit.source: Why are you making intense eye contact?
Not even your powerful mind can find all the answers.
trans-unit.target: Ni tu mente poderosa halla todas las respuestas.

trans-unit.source: You know this? Oh, I understand -telepathy.
We'd never deal in bad faith.
I'll take your advice into consideration.
They are all that is worth thinking about.
trans-unit.target: Son todo lo que merece pensarse.

trans-unit.source: Pleasant to cross paths, as always.
Your naivety and cleverness are constantly at odds. You continue to surprise me.
trans-unit.target: Tu mente alberga una sinceridad rara.

trans-unit.source: Keep to your section of space, and we'll consider forgiving your ilk.
trans-unit.target: Permanece en tu espacio, podríamos perdonar a los tuyos.

trans-unit.source: We strive to extend kindness to all we meet.
trans-unit.target: We strive to extend kindness to all we meet.

trans-unit.source: There's much we can learn from our differences.
trans-unit.target: Mucho podemos aprender de nuestras diferencias.

trans-unit.source: Did they go extinct from hunger? You seem far too nutrient-deficient to make good hosts.
trans-unit.target: ¿Se extinguieron por hambre? Pareces demasiado desnutrido para ser un buen anfitrión.

trans-unit.source: We are hopeful there is much to share about our sectors.
trans-unit.target: Anhelamos compartir abundantes secretos de nuestros sectores.

trans-unit.source: I've no time for this righteous naivety.
trans-unit.target: No tengo tiempo para esta ingenuidad justa.

trans-unit.source: A stable alliance between us may go a long way for all.
trans-unit.target: Una alianza firme entre nosotros puede ser extensamente beneficiosa.

trans-unit.source: You look like you'd make poor slaves.
trans-unit.target: Pareces destinado a ser un esclavo inútil.

trans-unit.source: Help us find that which was stolen and we can be allies.
trans-unit.target: Ayúdanos a hallar lo sustraído y seremos aliados.

trans-unit.source: Skepticism and healthy debate are the bedrock of faith.
trans-unit.target: El escepticismo y el debate nutren la fe.

trans-unit.source: We look forward to your business.
Maybe our differences can complement each other.
The sincerity I detect in your mind is rare.
trans-unit.target: The sincerity I detect in your mind is rare.

trans-unit.source: The sincerity I detect in your mind is rare.
trans-unit.target: Tu mente alberga una sinceridad rara.

trans-unit.source: Fake smile and nod as if you understand, then proceed to close the Incoming Message.
trans-unit.target: Fingir una sonrisa y asentir como si comprendieras, luego proceder a cerrar el Mensaje Entrante.

trans-unit.source: Space is big. Probably big enough for both of us.
trans-unit.target: El espacio es vasto. Probablemente suficiente para ambos.

trans-unit.source: Do not get in our way.
trans-unit.target: No te interpongas en nuestro camino.

trans-unit.source: We are skeptical about ever becoming friendly.
trans-unit.target: Somos escépticos acerca de llegar a ser amigables alguna vez.

trans-unit.source: Your claims are irrelevant to us.
We always enjoy talking to hairless apes.
trans-unit.target: Siempre nos deleita conversar con simios sin pelo.

trans-unit.source: Be careful or you may find yourself stepped on.
We're going to murder you last.
trans-unit.target: Serás el último al que asesinaremos.

trans-unit.source: Let's be honest, we're probably going to be foes.
We may look gentle on the outside, but don't mistake that for weakness.
trans-unit.target: Podemos parecer suaves por fuera, pero eso no es sinónimo de debilidad.

trans-unit.source: I am pretty sure your grandfather was my chair.
trans-unit.target: Estoy casi seguro de que tu abuelo era mi silla.

trans-unit.source: There is no future for you.
We are the beings who will eventually use your bodies as hosts for our young.
trans-unit.target: Seremos quienes utilicen vuestros cuerpos como anfitriones para nuestra prole.

trans-unit.source: It is doubtful our civilizations will ever reunite.
trans-unit.target: Es incierto que nuestras civilizaciones se reúnan de nuevo.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to have met you.
We are very cute if you ignore the bones and gore.
trans-unit.target: Somos encantadores, ignorando los huesos y la sangre.

trans-unit.source: We have no interest in you or your so-called civilization.
trans-unit.target: Ni tú ni tu supuesta civilización nos interesan.

trans-unit.source: Our past friendships do not affect our future.
trans-unit.target: Nuestro pasado amistoso no influye en nuestro porvenir.

trans-unit.source: We should work together. We have much in common.
Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Tus palabras no significan nada para nosotros.

trans-unit.source: Do not get in our way, human.
I still have hope we can work together.
trans-unit.target: Aún albergo la esperanza de que podamos colaborar.

trans-unit.source: We will bring everyone of your kind, except you, into The Way.
trans-unit.target: Conduciremos a todos de tu especie hacia El Camino, excepto a ti.

trans-unit.source: It appears we have common interests.
Please note for the future that these weird ones can read your mind.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, ten presente que estos extraños pueden leer tus pensamientos.

trans-unit.source: Our time is better spent communicating with others.
trans-unit.target: Es preferible invertir nuestro tiempo en comunicarnos con los demás.

trans-unit.source: You can't lay eggs in us. Well, you probably could but don't.
trans-unit.target: No puedes anidar en nosotros. Aunque probablemente podrías, no lo hagas.

trans-unit.source: We had a species like yours on our planet. They're dead now.
trans-unit.target: En nuestro planeta, existió una especie similar a la suya. Ahora están extintos.

trans-unit.source: We literally eat your kind for breakfast.
trans-unit.target: Literalmente, tu especie es nuestro desayuno.

trans-unit.source: The ramblings of talking bugs amuses us.
trans-unit.target: Nos divierten las divagaciones de los insectos parlantes.

trans-unit.source: Your eggs will become our fuel.
trans-unit.target: Tus huevos se transformarán en nuestro combustible.

trans-unit.source: We have dealt with far worse than you.
We will not hesitate to turn any species that threatens us to glass.
trans-unit.target: Sin dudar, convertiremos en vidrio a cualquier especie que nos amenace.

trans-unit.source: No, but you resemble monsters we've survived before.
trans-unit.target: No, pero recuerdas a monstruos que ya hemos vencido.

trans-unit.source: We exterminated a species that looked similar to you long ago.
trans-unit.target: Hace mucho, aniquilamos una especie semejante a ti.

trans-unit.source: Your pitiful attempts at insults mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Tus débiles insultos nos son indiferentes.

trans-unit.source: We didn't forget the Precursors. They were before our time.
trans-unit.target: No olvidamos a los Precursores. Antecedieron nuestra era.

trans-unit.source: Hopefully we can find something that will serve your kind.
trans-unit.target: Ojalá descubramos algo útil para tu especie.

trans-unit.source: We are not interested in abetting your advantage.
trans-unit.target: No nos interesa favorecer tu ventaja.

trans-unit.source: The stars are many. How can you assume to have explored them all?
trans-unit.target: ¿Cómo pretendes haber explorado la multitud de estrellas?

trans-unit.source: Only time will tell if you are delicious or not.
trans-unit.target: Sólo el tiempo dirá si eres delicioso o no.

trans-unit.source: We will keep your species alive on farms.
trans-unit.target: Mantendremos viva tu especie en granjas.

trans-unit.source: Things that look harmless rarely are.
trans-unit.target: Lo que parece inocuo, rara vez lo es.

trans-unit.source: I wonder how difficult it will be to remove your fur.
trans-unit.target: ¿Qué tan arduo será despojarte de tu pelaje?

trans-unit.source: We will convert you into a more useful biomechanical paste.
trans-unit.target: Te transformaremos en una pasta biomecánica más útil.

trans-unit.source: Are we to blame that your species tastes so good?
trans-unit.target: ¿Acaso es nuestra culpa que tu especie sepa tan bien?

trans-unit.source: Were you larger, I'd consider that a threat.
trans-unit.target: Si fueses mayor, lo consideraría una amenaza.

trans-unit.source: You will find that we are made of stern stuff.
trans-unit.target: Descubrirás que estamos hechos de material férreo.

trans-unit.source: Soft flesh on a hard skeleton is such an ineffective design.
trans-unit.target: Diseño ineficaz: carne suave sobre esqueleto duro.

trans-unit.source: We will uplift your machines to gain mastery over you.
We have little in common with a criminal empire.
trans-unit.target: Poco nos une a un imperio criminal.

trans-unit.source: We prioritize our protection; remember that hair-crowned.
trans-unit.target: Priorizamos nuestra salvaguarda; recuerda eso, coronado de cabellos.

trans-unit.source: Careful yourself -we've survived where others conflagrated.
trans-unit.target: Cuidado - hemos persistido donde otros se consumieron.

trans-unit.source: There are things much worse than Dread Lords in this universe.
trans-unit.target: En este universo, hay entidades peores que los Señores del Terror.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Tus palabras no significan nada para nosotros.

trans-unit.source: We remember you selling a stargate that would allow you to invade our homeworld.
trans-unit.target: Recordamos tu comercio de un portal estelar para invadir nuestro mundo natal.

trans-unit.source: We hope for peace. But we will also crush you if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Anhelamos la paz. Pero te aplastaremos si es imprescindible.

trans-unit.source: If anyone ever needed a good blasting, it's you.
trans-unit.target: Si alguien alguna vez necesitó una buena reprimenda, eres tú.

trans-unit.source: We have very large and pointy teeth.
We do not require you to understand us. Only obey.
We will have our vengeance yet.
Remember that we still have agents. They simply perform a more lethal kind of business.
trans-unit.target: Recordemos que aún poseemos agentes. Solo ejecutan un negocio de naturaleza más letal.

trans-unit.source: A culture of war is one designed to disintegrate.
trans-unit.target: Una cultura bélica está destinada a desintegrarse.

trans-unit.source: Prophecy or crude manipulation you mean.
Our actions involve laying eggs inside of you.
trans-unit.target: Nuestras acciones implican sembrar huevos en tu interior.

trans-unit.source: We know enough about you to be wary of your claims of wanting peace.
trans-unit.target: Conocemos suficiente de ti para desconfiar de tus ansias de paz.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Tus palabras no significan nada para nosotros.

trans-unit.source: We are happy to try and work with anyone.
trans-unit.target: Nos complace intentar colaborar con cualquiera.

trans-unit.source: If there is a relation, we're the perfected form.
trans-unit.target: Si existe una relación, somos la forma perfeccionada.

trans-unit.source: You look like something out of a nightmare.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We know what you did to the Iconians. You will find us a difficult foe if it comes to that.
trans-unit.target: Sabemos lo que hiciste con los Iconianos. Si llega a eso, nos encontrarás un rival difícil.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We will take back what is ours.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos escasa experiencia con formas de vida sintéticas.

trans-unit.source: We bring joy and happiness through our products. Something you obviously don't understand.
trans-unit.target: Traemos alegría con nuestros productos, algo incomprensible para ti.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to discuss who makes the better battery?
trans-unit.target: ¿Deseas debatir realmente sobre quién fabrica la mejor batería?

trans-unit.source: Your freedom or slavery remains to be seen.
trans-unit.target: Aún está por verse si eres libre o esclavo.

trans-unit.source: Ah, Torians. I have a dozen of you frozen for the New Argon feast.
trans-unit.target: Ah, Torianos. Tengo una docena congelada para la fiesta del Nuevo Argón.

trans-unit.source: Your only value is your ability to populate quickly.
trans-unit.target: Tu único valor radica en tu rápida capacidad de proliferación.

trans-unit.source: We suffered from the loss supply of your species.
trans-unit.target: Padecimos la pérdida de suministro de tu especie.

trans-unit.source: We lost many to other species as well. We will go to any lengths to protect ourselves.
trans-unit.target: Perdimos muchos ante otras especies también. Nos protegeremos a cualquier costo.

trans-unit.source: You actually look like what I had for dinner yesterday.
trans-unit.target: Realmente pareces mi cena de ayer.

trans-unit.source: We are definitely the stuff of nightmares.
trans-unit.target: Somos, sin duda, la esencia de las pesadillas.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Tus palabras no significan nada para nosotros.

trans-unit.source: I don't suppose you sell your children as a food commodity.
trans-unit.target: Imagino que no comercias a tus hijos como alimento.

trans-unit.source: Every story has two sides, if not more.
trans-unit.target: Cada relato alberga, si no más, dos vertientes.

trans-unit.source: Eyes are high in fats that our young like.
trans-unit.target: Nuestros jóvenes gustan de los ojos, ricos en grasas.

trans-unit.source: You should just leave us alone.
Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Tus palabras no significan nada para nosotros.

trans-unit.source: Those who claim to be pure of heart are the biggest consumers of our less savory products.
trans-unit.target: Quienes se jactan de pureza son los mayores consumidores de nuestros productos menos apetecibles.

trans-unit.source: We find it hard to accept that which establishes division.
trans-unit.target: Nos cuesta aceptar lo que establece división.

trans-unit.source: You do not want to know what we know.
Are you leaving out the part that those eyes were evil robot eyes you created?
trans-unit.target: ¿Omites el detalle de que creaste esos ojos de robot maligno?

trans-unit.source: I will have your skull in my trophy case soon enough.
trans-unit.target: Pronto, tu cráneo adornará mi vitrina de trofeos.

trans-unit.source: Empty words from a dying species.
trans-unit.target: Palabras vacías de una especie agonizante.

trans-unit.source: We equally support natural and unnatural selection.
trans-unit.target: Apoyamos igualmente la selección natural e innatural.

trans-unit.source: Trusting dead gods is folly; there's always more they've hidden.
trans-unit.target: Confiar en dioses muertos es absurdo; siempre ocultan más.

trans-unit.source: We mean no harm if that is the answer you hope to tease of us.
trans-unit.target: No buscamos causar daño, si es eso lo que esperas descubrir de nosotros.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Tus palabras no significan nada para nosotros.

trans-unit.source: You may find you wished we never met.
trans-unit.target: Quizás anheles que nunca nos encontramos.

trans-unit.source: Your villainous actions led to your exile. Own it.
trans-unit.target: Tus acciones perversas te condujeron al exilio. Acepta tu destino.

trans-unit.source: You are a doomed relic of a dead past.
trans-unit.target: Eres un fatídico vestigio de un pasado extinto.

trans-unit.source: You were exiled because you lost your war of aggression. Our world was stolen. We are not the same.
trans-unit.target: Exiliado, tu belicismo fue tu perdición. Nos arrebataron nuestro mundo. Ya no somos iguales.

trans-unit.source: We miss having you as one of our agents.
trans-unit.target: Nos haces falta como uno de nuestros agentes.

trans-unit.source: You may find us harder to deceive than you think.
trans-unit.target: Podrías hallarnos más difíciles de engañar de lo que imaginas.

trans-unit.source: No good comes from clinging to the dark.
trans-unit.target: Nada bueno surge de aferrarse a la oscuridad.

trans-unit.source: Eyes are high in fats that our young like. We are going to get along well.
trans-unit.target: Nuestros jóvenes disfrutan las grasas de los ojos. Nos llevaremos bien.

trans-unit.source: Your greed won't save you from what is to come.
trans-unit.target: Tu avaricia no te resguardará de lo venidero.

trans-unit.source: We trade only when we can't take by force.
trans-unit.target: Sólo comerciamos cuando la fuerza nos es esquiva.

trans-unit.source: We've survived without your market for eons; we'll be fine without it.
trans-unit.target: Hemos subsistido sin tu mercado por eones; prescindiremos de él.

trans-unit.source: We are both quite different from the others.
trans-unit.target: Somos distintos, ambos, a los demás.

trans-unit.source: I hope we can work together giant gun guy.
trans-unit.target: Espero que podamos colaborar, hombre de la gran pistola.

trans-unit.source: I doubt your species has a future at all.
trans-unit.target: Dudo que tu especie tenga futuro.

trans-unit.source: Let's see who looks frail when your porous bodies are turned to glass.
trans-unit.target: Veamos quién parece frágil cuando sus cuerpos porosos se conviertan en vidrio.

trans-unit.source: Your bodies are useless to us. Be gone.
trans-unit.target: Vuestros cuerpos nos son inútiles. Desapareced.

trans-unit.source: Only time will tell whether you will survive what is coming.
trans-unit.target: Sólo el tiempo dirá si sobrevives a lo que viene.

trans-unit.source: The 5 other species on our world thought the same thing.
trans-unit.target: Las otras cinco especies de nuestro mundo pensaban igual.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Tus palabras no significan nada para nosotros.

trans-unit.source: We are hopeful we can still do business together.
So this is what the Individualism of the Terrans brings -fractured groups.
trans-unit.target: Así es lo que trae el Individualismo de los Terranos: grupos fracturados.

trans-unit.source: We help those willing to help others.
trans-unit.target: Auxiliamos a los dispuestos a auxiliar.
Recuerda siempre, en tu crecimiento, quién te elevó primero.

trans-unit.source: I'll save my breath and let my mind do the talking.
trans-unit.target: Guardaré mi aliento, permitiendo que hable mi mente.

trans-unit.source: We are a threat, even to hostless bodies like yours.
trans-unit.target: Somos una amenaza, incluso para cuerpos sin anfitrión como el tuyo.

trans-unit.source: You can keep your assumptions to yourself.
Read away. I've no shame in our rejection of pitiful laws made by the weak.
trans-unit.target: Lee sin restricciones. No siento vergüenza por nuestro rechazo a leyes patéticas creadas por los débiles.

trans-unit.source: Disgusting! Get in my head again, and I'll rip yours off.
trans-unit.target: ¡Repugnante! Invade nuevamente mi mente y arrancaré la tuya.

trans-unit.source: You'll fit right in with the species of our sector. They refuse to recognize our elevated development as well.
trans-unit.target: Encajarás perfectamente con las especies de nuestro sector. También niegan reconocer nuestro avanzado desarrollo.

trans-unit.source: To find The Way, one must first find humility. We'll be here when you do.
trans-unit.target: Para hallar El Camino, primero se necesita humildad. Aquí estaremos cuando lo logres.

trans-unit.source: I have little patience for your arrogance.
We'll need to trust each other to deal fairly.
trans-unit.target: Debemos confiar en el trato justo mutuo.

trans-unit.source: Warn me next time. I'll give you something more interesting to read.
trans-unit.target: Avísame la próxima. Te daré algo más fascinante para leer.

trans-unit.source: Are you reading my mind? I'll turn you into a mirror!
I hope we can keep this civil.
trans-unit.target: Espero que podamos mantener la cortesía.

trans-unit.source: We've survived worse and uglier than you. Reach out when you're done with your tantrum.
trans-unit.target: Hemos resistido peores y más desagradables que tú. Contáctanos tras tu berrinche.

trans-unit.source: Take a breath before you pass out. You're far from a threat to us.
trans-unit.target: Intenta que tu miedo no grite tan fuerte en tu cabeza.

trans-unit.source: Just remember, as you develop, who elevated you first.
trans-unit.target: Just remember, as you develop, who elevated you first.

trans-unit.source: It's only a matter of time before we can wipe the universe of your blight.
trans-unit.target: Sólo es cuestión de tiempo antes de que podamos erradicar tu plaga del universo.

trans-unit.source: You'd do well to keep us in your nightmares.
trans-unit.target: Sería prudente que nos mantengas en tus pesadillas.

trans-unit.source: There may be something to share if you survive contact with this sector.
trans-unit.target: Si sobrevives al encuentro con este sector, quizás haya algo para compartir.

trans-unit.source: Your quick demise will be helpful enough.
True neutrality is rare; we are skeptical of your intentions.
trans-unit.target: La verdadera neutralidad es escasa; dudamos de tus intenciones.

trans-unit.source: We'll give you plenty of reasons to embrace brutality.
trans-unit.target: Te brindaremos innumerables razones para acoger la brutalidad.

trans-unit.source: We'll share when you have proven yourself beyond suspicion.
trans-unit.target: Compartiremos una vez despejada toda sospecha sobre ti.

trans-unit.source: It's ill-advised to work with those who question The Way.
trans-unit.target: Es imprudente colaborar con quienes cuestionan El Camino.

trans-unit.source: Business has no use for friendship.
Hm. That remains to be seen.
Try not to let your fear scream so loudly in your head.
trans-unit.target: Try not to let your fear scream so loudly in your head.

trans-unit.source: Keep your hope; it's a mistake.
trans-unit.target: Conserva tu esperanza; es un error.

trans-unit.source: Ibbu nesha sigu, wehu![BR][BR](We've just conquered one of your planets.)
trans-unit.target: ¡Ibbu nesha sigu, wehu! Acabamos de conquistar uno de tus planetas.

trans-unit.source: We've just conquered one of your planets.
trans-unit.target: Acabamos de apoderarnos de uno de vuestros planetas.

trans-unit.source: We have liberated one of your worlds.
trans-unit.target: Hemos liberado uno de vuestros mundos.

trans-unit.source: Our eggs have found a new home on one of your former worlds.
trans-unit.target: Nuestros huevos hallaron refugio en uno de tus antiguos mundos.

trans-unit.source: One of your worlds is now under our control.
trans-unit.target: Uno de tus mundos ahora está bajo nuestro dominio.

trans-unit.source: We have freed one of your worlds from your ickiness.
trans-unit.target: Uno de vuestros mundos ha sido liberado de vuestra repugnancia.

trans-unit.source: We have set free the people of one of your planets.
trans-unit.target: Hemos liberado a los habitantes de uno de vuestros planetas.

trans-unit.source: We shall dine well tonight on the fools of your planet that we just conquered.
trans-unit.target: Cenaremos bien esta noche, con los necios de tu planeta recién conquistado.

trans-unit.source: We can now share our wisdom with the people of the world we just took from you.
trans-unit.target: Ahora, compartimos nuestra sabiduría con el pueblo del mundo que acabamos de arrebataros.

trans-unit.source: We have assimilated one of your worlds. Rejoice.
trans-unit.target: Hemos absorbido uno de vuestros mundos. Alegraos.

trans-unit.source: We can now share The Way with the people of your world that we just conquered.
trans-unit.target: Ahora podemos impartir El Camino a la gente de vuestro mundo recién conquistado.

trans-unit.source: Our investment in our military has paid off. Your planet now belongs to us.
trans-unit.target: Nuestra inversión militar ha rendido frutos. Tu planeta ahora nos pertenece.

trans-unit.source: We hope you understand that this planet is now under our care.
trans-unit.target: Esperamos comprendáis que este planeta ahora recae en nuestro cuidado.

trans-unit.source: The people of the world we just took can now know true safety.
trans-unit.target: Los habitantes del mundo que acabamos de tomar ahora conocen la verdadera seguridad.

trans-unit.source: Talotic yopitu mul nesin, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
The time for peace is over, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Prepare for war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Ha concluido la era de la paz, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Se presagia la guerra. [BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](En guerra estamos)[/COLOR].

trans-unit.source: It is time for your worlds to be commanded by a superior civilization. Prepare to die.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Es hora de que una civilización superior gobierne tus mundos. Prepárate para morir. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: A shame it had to end like this. There was so much promise in our relationship. Well. Know that although we do not like starting wars, we are very good at finishing them.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Lástima que concluya así. Tanta promesa en nuestra relación. Aunque reacios a iniciar guerras, somos expertos en terminarlas. (Estamos en guerra).

trans-unit.source: War has come for you, preymeat. Soon you will be filled with sacs of eggs. Mentally prepare yourself.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: La guerra te ha alcanzado, presa. Pronto, estarás repleto de sacos de huevos. Prepárate mentalmente. (Estamos en guerra).

trans-unit.source: We do not run anymore, alien. We confront our enemies now. The time has come for war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Ya no huyamos, extraterrestre. Ahora enfrentamos a nuestros enemigos. Es hora de guerra. (Estamos en guerra)

trans-unit.source: We will not be dominated by anyone, ever again. We will become the dominators. And we will start with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Nunca más seremos sometidos. Nos convertiremos en dominadores, comenzando contigo. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: We are going to destroy you now, alien. Annihilate you utterly. Don't ask why. We don't have to explain our reasons to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Ahora te destruiremos, alienígena, te aniquilaremos sin piedad. No preguntes por qué. No necesitamos justificarnos ante ti. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: We have seen more war than most. We do not seek it, but when it is necessary, we do not shy from it. And we do not shy from war with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Hemos presenciado más guerra que muchos. No la buscamos, pero no la evitamos si es necesaria. Tampoco evitamos la guerra contigo.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We grow tired of the wet, slapping sounds you make when you speak, alien. When we eventually conquer you, we'll have to do something about that.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Nos hastía el sonido húmedo y chapoteante de tu voz, extraterrestre. Cuando finalmente te conquistemos, deberemos solucionarlo. (Estamos en guerra)

trans-unit.source: We declare war. An abhorrent thought for our people, but we're prepared to make an exception for the likes of an abhorrent people like you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Declaramos la guerra, un pensamiento abominable para nuestro pueblo, pero dispuestos a hacer una excepción por una gente como tú. [BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You call it war, we call it sanitizing the universe of vermin. Either way, your time has ended.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Lo llamas guerra, nosotros lo vemos como una desinfección cósmica. De cualquier forma, tu era ha terminado.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: It is time for you to stop terrorizing us. We are done having war brought to us. Now we bring it to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Es tiempo de que ceses tu terror. No más guerras en nuestro hogar. Ahora, te la llevamos a ti. [BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: This galaxy is filled with predators. We never thought we would become one ourselves. But we must, if we can rid the universe of your presence.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Esta galaxia rebosa de depredadores. Jamás nos consideramos uno. Sin embargo, debemos convertirnos, para erradicar tu existencia del universo. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: Ideally, the way of the Krynn is spread by conversation and quiet reflection. Only in the rarest of circumstances must we resort to force. We do so now, alien.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Idealmente, el camino de Krynn se difunde mediante diálogos y reflexiones pausadas. Solo en las circunstancias más raras recurrimos a la fuerza. Ahora lo hacemos, extraterrestre. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: We are not instinctive warmongers. But we have seen enough of it for you to be very worried about what will happen when we bring war to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: No somos belicistas por instinto. Pero hemos presenciado suficiente para que te preocupes por lo que ocurrirá cuando la guerra llegue a ti. (Estamos en guerra)

trans-unit.source: We don't like being seen taking direct action ourselves. That we do so now, to destroy you, should tell you just how much you deserve it.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Desagrada ser vistos en acción directa. Que lo hagamos para destruirte, refleja lo que mereces. [BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: It's normally better to profit from other civilization's wars, rather than your own. But we are willing to take a small loss if it means your death.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Es preferible lucrar de las guerras ajenas, no las propias. Pero aceptamos una mínima pérdida si implica tu muerte. (Estamos en guerra)

trans-unit.source: Your actions have brought us to the steaming caldera of war, surface dweller. And now we take us in. The Onyx Hive will be the end of you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Tus actos nos han arrastrado hacia el caldero hirviente de la guerra, habitante de la superficie. Ahora, nos adentramos y la Colmena Onyx marcará tu fin. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: We will simply wait for your attack, we made that mistake already.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: He explorado las mentes de tu pueblo. No puedo ignorar más sus inclinaciones contra el Dominio Luxar. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: You have soiled the galaxy long enough, animal. We will stop you. All right-thinking plants will thank us.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Basta ya, bestia, de ensuciar la galaxia. Te detendremos. Las plantas sensatas nos agradecerán. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: Despite our best efforts, the time has come to admit diplomacy is no longer of service between us. We do not revel in this decision, but we must do our part to promote security -even if it means going to war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: A pesar de intentos nobles, reconocemos la inutilidad de la diplomacia. Sin regocijo, pero por seguridad, preparamos para la guerra. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: I have peered into the mind of you and your people. No longer can I ignore your inclinations against the interest of the Luxar Dominion.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: I have peered into the mind of you and your people. No longer can I ignore your inclinations against the interest of the Luxar Dominion.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We cannot leave the galaxy at the mercy of space insects. Prepare to be exterminated[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: No podemos abandonar la galaxia a la merced de insectos espaciales. Prepárense para la exterminación. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: Deep down, you always knew that it would end with us at war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: En el fondo, siempre supiste que culminaríamos en guerra. (Estamos en guerra)

trans-unit.source: We have concluded that there is no future that ends well with a race of malevolent machines running loose. Therefore, we have decided to unplug you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Hemos determinado que con máquinas malévolas sueltas, no hay futuro prometedor. Por ende, te desconectaremos.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We know what you truly are, human. You are, as your kind likes to say, a wolf in sheep's clothing.[BR][BR]Your facade of diplomacy and trade does not fool us. We will grind your bones into a fine powder.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Conocemos tu esencia, humano. Eres, como sueles decir, un lobo con piel de oveja. Tu apariencia de diplomacia y comercio no nos engaña. Moleremos tus huesos en polvo fino. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: We wish there was another way but no other civilization has the wisdom to guide the galaxy as we do.[BR][BR]We will show you mercy once you utterly capitulate to us.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Anhelamos otro camino, pero ninguna civilización posee nuestra sabiduría galáctica. Mostraremos piedad tras vuestra total rendición. (Estamos en guerra)

trans-unit.source: Your kind is an abomination. There was never a scenario where we would allow machines to thrive in our galaxy.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Tu especie es una aberración. Jamás permitiríamos que las máquinas prosperen en nuestra galaxia. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: I hardly believe the day has come to declare war with your faction. Follow the light into the beam of our lasers and the explosions of our rockets.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Apenas creo que el día ha llegado para declarar guerra a tu facción. Sigue la luz hacia el haz de nuestros láseres y las explosiones de nuestros cohetes. (Estamos en guerra)

trans-unit.source: You've benefited from our developments long enough.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Has gozado de nuestros avances por mucho tiempo.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: The time has come to cleanse the galaxy of your filth. This war will not repeat our previous conflict; we come prepared.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Ha llegado la hora de purificar la galaxia de tu inmundicia. Esta guerra no repetirá nuestros antiguos conflictos; venimos preparados. (Estamos en guerra)

trans-unit.source: We've given every chance and benefit of the doubt. We can no longer ignore your threat to life across the universe. I'm sorry, it's come time to burn.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Hemos brindado todas las oportunidades. No podemos ignorar tu amenaza universal. Lamentablemente, es hora de quemar.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We've observed enough and have concluded that you are a tumor. Life is to be valued, but you only survive as others perish.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Hemos mirado suficiente para concluir que eres un tumor. Valoramos la vida, pero tú solo sobrevives a costa de otros. Estamos en guerra.

trans-unit.source: We declare war. We don't need you anymore.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Declaramos guerra. Ya no te necesitamos. (Estamos en guerra)

trans-unit.source: [I]The squirming lifeform throws something at the screen, maintaining an intense glower.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: [I]La forma de vida retorcida lanza algo a la pantalla, manteniendo una mirada intensa.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You will regret this. Whatever you are.
trans-unit.target: Lamentarás esto. Sea lo que seas.

trans-unit.source: You have made a fatal mistake.
We shall make you suffer for this.
You will be our slaves when this is over.
trans-unit.target: Seréis nuestros esclavos al concluir esto.

trans-unit.source: We are going to crush you.
Your worlds will soon be our property
trans-unit.target: Pronto, vuestros mundos serán nuestra propiedad.

trans-unit.source: You will not be spared the full extent of our armament and telepathic tactics.
trans-unit.target: No serás eximido de la totalidad de nuestro armamento y tácticas telepáticas.

trans-unit.source: We will convert your organs into fuel.
The only good bug is a dead bug.
trans-unit.target: El único insecto bueno es el insecto muerto.

trans-unit.source: This will be the last error your kind makes.
trans-unit.target: Será el último error de tu especie.

trans-unit.source: It's amazing something so cute can be soo foolish.
trans-unit.target: Es asombroso que algo tan encantador pueda ser tan necio.

trans-unit.source: You have made a fatal error.
You are a dying race. We will speed your passing.
trans-unit.target: Son una raza agonizante. Aceleraremos su despedida.

trans-unit.source: You will soon discover that we are very, very good at war.
trans-unit.target: Pronto descubrirás nuestra asombrosa maestría en el arte de la guerra.

trans-unit.source: I think you overestimate your wisdom and military might.
trans-unit.target: Creo que sobredimensionas tu sabiduría y poderío militar.

trans-unit.source: When we are done with you there will be no trace of your species left.
trans-unit.target: Cuando acabemos contigo, no quedará rastro de tu especie.

trans-unit.source: We will use what's left of you for spare parts.
trans-unit.target: Usaremos lo que queda de ti para repuestos.

trans-unit.source: You will find we are even worse than the Drengin.
trans-unit.target: Descubrirás que somos peores que los Drengin.

trans-unit.source: We will boil you for dinner.
You will lose more than your homeworld when we're done.
trans-unit.target: Perderás más que tu mundo cuando acabemos.

trans-unit.source: It appears we must slay another beast.
We will loot what's left of your worlds.
trans-unit.target: Saquearemos lo que resta de tus mundos.

trans-unit.source: You will be kindling for a bonfire when we are done with you.
trans-unit.target: Serás leña para una hoguera cuando terminemos contigo.

trans-unit.source: Today, we find this choice immensely regrettable. Tomorrow so will you.
trans-unit.target: Hoy, lamentamos profundamente esta elección. Mañana, tú también.

trans-unit.source: I see you've learned to be ungrateful. So be it.
trans-unit.target: Veo que has aprendido la ingratitud. Así sea.

trans-unit.source: This conflict will not end until we purge you from the universe.
trans-unit.target: Este conflicto no cesará hasta que seamos purgados del universo.

trans-unit.source: You will rue the day you declared war.
trans-unit.target: Lamentarás el día en que proclamaste la guerra.

trans-unit.source: I wish we had found a way to do business together.
trans-unit.target: Ojalá hubiésemos hallado forma de entrelazar nuestros negocios.

trans-unit.source: We knew we should never have expanded.
I've seen your mind. I'm not surprised.
trans-unit.target: He vislumbrado tu mente, no me asombra.

trans-unit.source: Your opinions are irrelevant. Soon, your entire species will be irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: Tus opiniones son intrascendentes. Pronto, tu especie entera será intrascendente.

trans-unit.source: You will wish you had never been hatched.
trans-unit.target: Desearás no haber jamás visto la luz.

trans-unit.source: We are saddened that you have chosen death.
trans-unit.target: Lamentamos tu elección de la muerte.

trans-unit.source: You have made a terrible mistake.
You have fallen away from logic.
trans-unit.target: Has perdido el rumbo de la lógica.

trans-unit.source: So the slave now wants to be a slaver?
trans-unit.target: ¿Así que el esclavo ahora anhela ser esclavista?

trans-unit.source: So the true nature of The Way is revealed.
trans-unit.target: Se revela así, la auténtica esencia del Camino.

trans-unit.source: We had hoped we could work together. Alas.
This will not be a profitable venture for you.
trans-unit.target: Esta empresa no te será lucrativa.

trans-unit.source: How much effort you put into paranoid warmongering is a pity.
trans-unit.target: Qué lástima que inviertas tanto en belicosidad paranoica.

trans-unit.source: And you think you're informed enough to make that decision?
trans-unit.target: ¿Y crees tener suficiente información para tomar esa decisión?

trans-unit.source: I had such higher hopes for your kind.
We knew this day would come. Already I mourn the dead this conflict will leave in its wake.
trans-unit.target: Sabíamos que llegaría este día. Ya lloro a los muertos que esta contienda dejará tras de sí.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](Necesita investigar el Traductor Universal)

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, this war has not necessarily gone in the direction we had intended. We would have peace.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, la guerra no ha seguido necesariamente nuestro rumbo deseado. Buscábamos paz.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we are weary of the conflict and the toll it has taken. Could we not establish tranquility between us?
trans-unit.target: {FACTORÍAJUGADOR:2}, nos encontramos cansados del conflicto y del desgaste que ha causado. ¿No podríamos establecer tranquilidad entre nosotros?

trans-unit.source: We, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, propose to cease hostilities. What say you to a peaceful resolution?
trans-unit.target: Nosotros, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, proponemos cesar las hostilidades. ¿Qué opinas de una resolución pacífica?

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:1} extends an olive branch to you. Will you grasp it and bring an end to this conflict?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:1} te extiende una rama de olivo. ¿La aceptarás y pondrás fin a este conflicto?

trans-unit.source: Enough, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we have seen enough destruction. Shall we put an end to this and live in harmony?
trans-unit.target: Basta ya, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, hemos presenciado suficiente destrucción. ¿Podemos ponerle fin a esto y vivir en armonía?

trans-unit.source: This war, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, has drained us. We wish for serenity. Will you not consider a peaceful coexistence?
trans-unit.target: Esta guerra, {FACTIONJUGADOR:2}, nos ha agotado. Anhelamos serenidad. ¿No considerarías una coexistencia pacífica?

trans-unit.source: Could we, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, not strive for peace rather than continue this endless battle?
trans-unit.target: ¿No podríamos, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, esforzarnos por la paz en lugar de continuar con esta batalla interminable?

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we seek to resolve our differences. Shall we walk the path of peace together?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, buscamos resolver nuestras diferencias. ¿Caminaremos juntos por el sendero de la paz?

trans-unit.source: War has grown old, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We extend our hand in peace. Will you accept?
trans-unit.target: La guerra ha envejecido, {JUGADORFACTION:2}. Extendemos nuestra mano en paz. ¿La aceptarás?

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, let us end the cycle of violence. What do you say to a pact of peace?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, pongamos fin al ciclo de violencia. ¿Qué te parece un pacto de paz?

trans-unit.source: We have battled long and hard, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Now, we offer a proposition of peace. Will you embrace it?
trans-unit.target: Largamente y con dureza hemos luchado, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Ahora, te proponemos una paz. ¿La aceptarás?

trans-unit.source: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: ¡Gahr flab tou metina! (Debes indagar sobre el Traductor Universal)

trans-unit.source: Let us make the peace last for as long as it can.
trans-unit.target: Procuremos que la paz perdure todo lo que pueda.

trans-unit.source: It is far too late now.
Gahr flab tou metina![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: ¡Gahr flab tou metina! (Debes indagar sobre el Traductor Universal)

trans-unit.source: We had hoped to avoid this needless bloodshed. But you have brought this on yourself.
trans-unit.target: Esperábamos eludir este derramamiento de sangre innecesario. Pero tú lo provocaste.

trans-unit.source: Your rejection saddens us, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. The ensuing conflict is a product of your decision.
trans-unit.target: Nos entristece tu rechazo, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. El conflicto subsiguiente es producto de tu decisión.

trans-unit.source: We offered peace, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, but you chose war. The consequences are yours to bear.
trans-unit.target: Ofrecimos paz, {JUGADORFACTION:2}, pero elegiste la guerra. Las consecuencias son tuyas para asumir.

trans-unit.source: Your refusal means more destruction, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Remember, it was your choice.
trans-unit.target: Tu negativa significa más destrucción, {JUGADORFACTION:2}. Recuerda, fue tu elección.

trans-unit.source: We find your decision unfortunate, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. The bloodshed that follows is on your hands.
trans-unit.target: Lamentamos tu decisión, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. La carnicería que sigue será tu responsabilidad.

trans-unit.source: Despite our plea for peace, you persist, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You have chosen this path of conflict.
trans-unit.target: A pesar de nuestra súplica por la paz, persistes, {FACTIONDEJUGADOR:2}. Has elegido este camino de conflicto.

trans-unit.source: We had wished for tranquility, but your decision, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, has determined a different course.
trans-unit.target: Habíamos anhelado tranquilidad, pero tu decisión, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, ha determinado un rumbo diferente.

trans-unit.source: You have made your choice, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, and regrettably, it is one that leads to further strife.
trans-unit.target: Has tomado tu decisión, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, y lamentablemente, es una que conduce a más conflictos.

trans-unit.source: Your refusal invites more chaos, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. This burden of choice is yours.
trans-unit.target: Tu negativa invita a más caos, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Esta carga de elección es tuya.

trans-unit.source: We presented a chance for harmony, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, but you have opted for discord. The repercussions are now yours to deal with.
trans-unit.target: Presentamos una oportunidad para la armonía, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, pero has optado por el desacuerdo. Las repercusiones ahora son tuyas para tratar.

trans-unit.source: Our hopes for peace are dashed by your decision, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You must shoulder the responsibility for the coming conflict.
trans-unit.target: Nuestras esperanzas de paz se ven frustradas por tu decisión, {JUGADORFACTION:2}. Debes asumir la responsabilidad del conflicto venidero.

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Enoreset, rir ho carasal, tek seg. {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec, {PLAYERRACE:2}, ¿ya dieno ces nomi? [BR] (Investigar el Traductor Universal)

trans-unit.source: What brings you this way, alien?
Be quick, our time is valuble.
trans-unit.target: Sé rápido, nuestro tiempo es valioso.

trans-unit.source: Since you already have ships trespassing through our sphere of influence, I guess it makes sense you'd drop by in person.
trans-unit.target: Dado que tus naves ya invaden nuestra esfera de influencia, supongo que es lógico tu visita personal.

trans-unit.source: Now that that whole war business is behind us, let's have a more productive relationship, yes?
trans-unit.target: Tras el conflicto, busquemos una relación más fructífera, ¿verdad?

trans-unit.source: Humanity is united under one banner. We hope that others, including you, might join us.
trans-unit.target: La humanidad se une bajo un estandarte. Esperamos que otros, incluyéndote, se nos unan.

trans-unit.source: Hmm. A being not filled with sacs of our eggs. What a shallow existence for you.
trans-unit.target: Hmm. Un ser sin sacos de nuestros huevos. Qué existencia tan superficial para ti.

trans-unit.source: This war has not gone as we had hoped.
trans-unit.target: Esta guerra no ha transcurrido como habíamos esperado.

trans-unit.source: The time for groveling has arrived.
trans-unit.target: Ha llegado el tiempo de humillarse.

trans-unit.source: I look forward to your pleading.
Greetings, lifeforms! What friendly, peer to peer conversation can we have today?
Hello, other one. What can you do for us today?
trans-unit.target: Hola, otro. ¿Qué puedes hacer por nosotros hoy?

trans-unit.source: Pleasure to see you again, small alien. What can the Arcean Republic do for you?
trans-unit.target: ¿Qué puede hacer la República Arceana por ti, pequeño extraño?, un gusto verte de nuevo.

trans-unit.source: Don't waste my time with meaningless words, scum. Make this worth my time.
trans-unit.target: No malgastes mi tiempo, escoria. Haz que valga la pena.

trans-unit.source: Did you know we pursue art and science with equal devotion? One is meaningless without the other.
trans-unit.target: ¿Sabías que perseguimos el arte y la ciencia con igual fervor? Uno carece de sentido sin el otro.

trans-unit.source: Were you aware that every Altarian can recite the cosmic laws by the age of three? Such basic knowledge, but we understand it might be advanced for others.
trans-unit.target: ¿Sabías que todo Altariano puede recitar las leyes cósmicas a la edad de tres años? Tal conocimiento básico, pero entendemos que podría ser avanzado para otros.

trans-unit.source: Did you know Altarians meditate in binary? It's a simple exercise in cognitive superiority. We're sure you'll get there one day.
trans-unit.target: ¿Sabías que los Altarianos meditan en binario? Es un simple ejercicio de superioridad cognitiva. Estamos seguros de que un día lo conseguirás.

trans-unit.source: Are you aware that our society has eliminated the concept of waste? Every object serves a multitude of purposes in its lifecycle. Such elegance might seem alien to you, quite understandably.
trans-unit.target: ¿Sabías que nuestra sociedad ha eliminado el concepto de residuos? Todo objeto sirve a múltiples propósitos en su ciclo de vida. Tal elegancia podría parecerte ajena, comprensiblemente.

trans-unit.source: Do you know that we Altarians have solved all known paradoxes of quantum physics over our afternoon tea? It is a delightful diversion. Do try it some time, if you can.
trans-unit.target: ¿Sabías que nosotros, los Altarianos, hemos resuelto todos los paradojas conocidas de la física cuántica durante nuestra merienda? Es una distracción encantadora. Pruébalo alguna vez, si puedes.

trans-unit.source: Did you know that every single Altarian composes an original symphony as a rite of passage? We understand if this concept is foreign to you. After all, harmonizing the cosmic vibrations is no trivial task for the uninitiated.
trans-unit.target: ¿Sabías que cada Altariano compone una sinfonía original como rito de paso? Entendemos si este concepto te resulta extraño. Después de todo, armonizar las vibraciones cósmicas no es una tarea trivial para los no iniciados.

trans-unit.source: Oh, good. Exchanging words with a biological lifeform. Flap whatever it is you use to communicate.
trans-unit.target: Oh, qué bien. Intercambiando palabras con un ser vivo. Agita lo que uses para comunicarte.

trans-unit.source: We trust you no more than we have to.
trans-unit.target: Ya no confiamos más de lo necesario en ti.

trans-unit.source: We have not had good experiences with aliens. We hope it will be different with you.
trans-unit.target: No hemos tenido buenos encuentros con extraterrestres. Esperamos que contigo sea diferente.

trans-unit.source: Have you found the way of the Krynn yet, alien? No? Ahh. Alas.
trans-unit.target: ¿Ya descubriste el camino del Krynn, extraterrestre? ¿No? Ay, qué pena.

trans-unit.source: You are young in our eyes. Perhaps not so innocent though. So. What do you have to say for yourself?
trans-unit.target: Eres joven, a nuestros ojos. Quizás no tan inocente. Bien, ¿qué tienes que decir?

trans-unit.source: We have seen betrayal before. We can smell it coming. Don't think you can trick us, alien.
trans-unit.target: Conocemos la traición. La presagiamos. No nos engañas, extraterrestre.

trans-unit.source: We hoard nothing and delight in bringing the goods of the universe to those who desire them. For a reasonable profit, of course.
trans-unit.target: Acumulamos nada, disfrutamos en llevar los bienes del universo a aquellos que los desean. Por un beneficio razonable, claro.

trans-unit.source: How do you live like you do? Do you not understand the beautiful simplicity of life in an asteroid? It is glorious.
trans-unit.target: ¿Cómo vives así? ¿No comprendes la sublime sencillez de la vida en un asteroide? Es gloriosa.

trans-unit.source: It is always a delight for us when we can speak with an animal. You are so clever, sometimes.
trans-unit.target: Siempre nos deleita conversar con un animal. Eres tan astuto, a veces.

trans-unit.source: You will find us loyal friends, and dangerous enemies. Be careful which you choose.
trans-unit.target: Seremos amigos leales, enemigos peligrosos. Elige con cautela.

trans-unit.source: Your communication is a pleasant surprise. What can we discuss today?
trans-unit.target: Tu comunicación es una grata sorpresa. ¿De qué hablamos hoy?

trans-unit.source: We are always hungry. Therefore, speak quickly unless you want to become food.
trans-unit.target: Siempre tenemos hambre. Habla rápido o serás comida.

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to see the humans. What would you like to talk about today?
trans-unit.target: Nos agrada ver a los humanos. ¿Sobre qué desean conversar hoy?

trans-unit.source: Hello human. What sorts of trouble can we get into together today?
trans-unit.target: Hola humano, ¿qué líos podremos causar hoy juntos?

trans-unit.source: What can we do for you today, human?
trans-unit.target: ¿Qué podemos hacer hoy por ti, humano?

trans-unit.source: It is a pleasure to see you, little human.
trans-unit.target: Es un placer verte, pequeño humano.

trans-unit.source: Ah the fleshling humans. It is good to see you up on your hind legs.
trans-unit.target: Ah, humanos de carne y hueso. Es grato veros erguidos sobre vuestras extremidades traseras.

trans-unit.source: Are you ready to become our food again? You made such excellent slaves
trans-unit.target: ¿Preparado para ser nuestro alimento una vez más? Fuiste un esclavo excepcional".

trans-unit.source: We always enjoy talking to the humans. It is like looking into a mirror.
trans-unit.target: Siempre nos deleita charlar con los humanos. Es como mirarse al espejo.

trans-unit.source: What is it you want today, fleshling?
What do the land loving humans want today?
trans-unit.target: ¿Qué desean hoy los humanos amantes de la tierra?

trans-unit.source: No matter what we discuss today, know that this will not end until we have annihilated all of your kind.
trans-unit.target: Discutamos lo que sea hoy, pero debes saber que no acabará hasta que tu especie esté totalmente aniquilada.

trans-unit.source: Have you left our homeworld yet, robot?
Unless you are willing to give us Elemental, we will never truly have peace.
trans-unit.target: A menos que entregues Elemental, la paz auténtica jamás será nuestra.

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Enoreset, nenat y carasal funden en un ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec, {PLAYERRACE:2}, ¿ya dieno ces nomi?! [BR] (Investiga el Traductor Universal)

trans-unit.source: Leave us, we are preoccupied at the moment.
Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Enoreset, nenat y carasal funden en un ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec, {PLAYERRACE:2}, ¿ya dieno ces nomi?! [BR] (Investiga el Traductor Universal)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}! It is by your hand that 'The Everwar' began. And now you wish to talk? Begone.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}! Tú desencadenaste 'La Eterna Guerra'. ¿Y ahora quieres conversar? Desaparece.

trans-unit.source: Ah, {LEADERNAME:2} - the great bringer of 'The Everwar'. Did you light the Flames of War only to come asking for forgiveness? It is far too late for such things.
trans-unit.target: Ah, {LÍDERNOMBRE:2} - el gran portador de 'La Guerra Eterna'. ¿Encendiste las Llamas de la Guerra solo para venir pidiendo perdón? Es demasiado tarde para tales cosas.

trans-unit.source: Your word lights the galaxy ablaze with War and now you come asking to trade? Are all {PLAYERFACTION:2} this foolish?
trans-unit.target: ¿Tu palabra enciende la galaxia con guerra y ahora vienes pidiendo comerciar? ¿Son todos {JUGADORFACTION:2} tan necios?

trans-unit.source: The Everwar' rages by your hand, {LEADERNAME:2}. May it cause your demise.
trans-unit.target: La 'Guerra Eterna' se desata por tu mano, {LEADERNAME:2}. Que sea la causa de tu caída.

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Enoreset, rir ho carasal, tek seg. {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec, {PLAYERRACE:2}, ¿ya dieno ces nomi? [BR] (Investigar el Traductor Universal)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}! The galaxy has turned against you. You will not survive the tide. Begone.
trans-unit.target: ¡{LEADERNAME:2}! La galaxia te repudia. No resistirás la marea. Desaparece.

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Enoreset, nenat y carasal funden en un ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec, {PLAYERRACE:2}, ¿ya dieno ces nomi?! [BR] (Investiga el Traductor Universal)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}! The Apocalypse has begun. The time for diplomacy is past.
trans-unit.target: ¡{LEADERNAME:2}! El Apocalipsis ha iniciado. La diplomacia ya es historia.

trans-unit.source: Erasuto ki nakeduc menurit! {LEADERNAME:2}, lesasa uwetadel ise neforal {PLAYERFACTION:1} babenat adonecie si podotic![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Erasuto ki menurit! {LEADERNAME:2}, uwetadel neforal {PLAYERFACTION:1}, adonecie podotic! [BR] (Investiga el Traductor Universal)

trans-unit.source: We are grateful to your mercy.
You may now live on your knees.
You are fortunate we are feeling merciful today.
trans-unit.target: Tienes suerte de que hoy nos sintamos misericordiosos.

trans-unit.source: You are very persuasive, let's trade.
We accept your offer, but we will remember this next time.
trans-unit.target: Aceptamos su propuesta, mas lo recordaremos en el futuro.

trans-unit.source: Agreed, let us bind the terms in stone.
trans-unit.target: Acordado, grabemos los términos en piedra.

trans-unit.source: This trade proposition may serve to further our dominance.
trans-unit.target: Esta propuesta comercial puede incrementar nuestro dominio.

trans-unit.source: There is high probability of mutual benefit.
{PLAYERFACTION:1}, obis iwiwilam oce geme {LEADERNAME:2}. Oti rini pe roni oten latuher ver inegur![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:1}, obis murmuran en la vastedad oceánica {LEADERNAME:2}. ¡Nuestra palabra se entrelaza con el viento! [BR] (Investiga el Traductor Universal)

trans-unit.source: I wouldn't give you pebbles for this.
trans-unit.target: No te daría ni piedrecillas por esto.

trans-unit.source: This is the kind of offer I'd expect one of my slaves to make.
trans-unit.target: Es una propuesta que anticiparía de uno de mis esclavos.

trans-unit.source: Your offer is what I would expect of an organic.
trans-unit.target: Tu propuesta es típica de un orgánico.

trans-unit.source: Do you take us for fools? Try harder.
A pitiful excuse for an offer.
trans-unit.target: Una excusa patética para una oferta..

trans-unit.source: If you were not across that screen I would kill you where you stand for this offer.
I should gut you for suggesting this proposal.
trans-unit.target: Debería desollarte por sugerir esta propuesta..

trans-unit.source: This offer does not fit our parameters.
trans-unit.target: Esta oferta no se ajusta a nuestros parámetros.
Esta oferta ultraja a nuestros ancestros.

trans-unit.source: You think yourself clever for this offer?
Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Investiga el Traductor Universal, ¡Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril!

trans-unit.source: I'm glad we could come to an agreement.
trans-unit.target: Me complace que hayamos llegado a un consenso.

trans-unit.source: May this prosperous exchange unite our civilizations.
trans-unit.target: Que este próspero intercambio una nuestras civilizaciones.

trans-unit.source: A crystalized agreement brings me content.
trans-unit.target: Un pacto cristalizado me otorga satisfacción.

trans-unit.source: Perfect, I'll have my servants see to it.
Post-execution analysis indicates a successful exchange.
trans-unit.target: El análisis post-ejecución indica un intercambio exitoso.

trans-unit.source: I am glad we could come to an agreement.
trans-unit.target: Me alegra que hayamos alcanzado un consenso.

trans-unit.source: We are pleased with this result.
We toast you for a successful negotiation.
trans-unit.target: Brindamos por ti por una negociación exitosa..

trans-unit.source: This is barely acceptable but I have no more time to waste.
trans-unit.target: Esto es apenas aceptable, pero ya no tengo más tiempo que perder.

trans-unit.source: This will work for us. For now.
trans-unit.target: Esto funcionará para nosotros. Por ahora..

trans-unit.source: We are pleased we could come to an arrangement.
trans-unit.target: Nos complace haber llegado a un acuerdo.

trans-unit.source: We compute that this is an equitable agreement.
It is a pleasure doing business with you.
Thank you for offering us your better deal.
trans-unit.target: Gracias por brindarnos tu mejor oferta.

trans-unit.source: La yol ele po. Sa riras tenalac hasec?[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: ¿La yol ele po? ¿Sa riras tenalac hasec? Investigar el Traductor Universal es necesario.

trans-unit.source: What do you have in mind?
I am interested in seeing your proposal.
trans-unit.target: Estoy interesado en ver tu propuesta.

trans-unit.source: Let us see what you propose.
Our mineral forms remain steadfast and patient, we anticipate the presentation of your trade proposition.
trans-unit.target: Nuestras formas minerales, firmes y pacientes, aguardan vuestra propuesta comercial.

trans-unit.source: Present an offer worthy of our superior civilization.
trans-unit.target: Presenta una oferta digna de nuestra superior civilización.

trans-unit.source: Currently awaiting input of trade proposition parameters.
trans-unit.target: Aguardando la entrada de parámetros de propuesta comercial.

trans-unit.source: We are interested in trading this with you.
You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.
trans-unit.target: Tienes algunas cosas que deseamos y nosotros tenemos algunas cosas que creemos te gustarán.

trans-unit.source: Ahh. My delightful alien counterpart. We have an offer for you.
trans-unit.target: Ahh. Mi encantador contraparte extraterrestre. Tenemos una oferta para ti.

trans-unit.source: We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.
trans-unit.target: Tenemos una oferta provechosa para ambos, carnepresa.

trans-unit.source: Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.
trans-unit.target: ¿Deseas intercambiar sabiduría con nosotros? Ansiábamos hacerlo contigo.

trans-unit.source: We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!
trans-unit.target: Poseemos lo que anhelas y tú lo que nosotros codiciamos. ¡Feliz jornada!

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?
trans-unit.target: Ofrecemos un trato, extraterrestre. Nos beneficia enormemente. ¿Necesitas más explicaciones?

trans-unit.source: Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.
trans-unit.target: Compartamos, como lo hacen las civilizaciones prudentes.

trans-unit.source: We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, arrebatamos lo que queremos de gusanos patéticos como tú. Pero hoy, ofrecemos algo a cambio. Sorprendente.

trans-unit.source: Your pitiful existence has somehow drawn our attention. How intriguing. Let's talk trade, shall we?
trans-unit.target: De alguna manera, tu existencia lamentable ha captado nuestra atención. Qué intrigante. Hablemos de comercio, ¿no te parece?

trans-unit.source: It amuses us to momentarily lower ourselves to your level. Consider this trade a rare act of mercy.
trans-unit.target: Nos divierte momentáneamente rebajarnos a tu nivel. Considera este intercambio un raro acto de misericordia.

trans-unit.source: It's not often that we deign to barter with inferiors. You should consider this a high honor, fleshling.
trans-unit.target: No es frecuente que nos dignemos a negociar con seres inferiores. Deberías considerarlo un alto honor, criatura de carne.

trans-unit.source: Feeling charitable today. We offer you trade, a chance to crawl from the mud. Grab it before we change our minds.
trans-unit.target: Sintiéndonos caritativos hoy. Te ofrecemos un intercambio, una oportunidad para salir del lodo. Aprovéchalo antes de que cambiemos de opinión.

trans-unit.source: We would like to share our great, Altarian wisdom with you. We require only a triviality in exchange.
trans-unit.target: Deseamos impartir nuestra excelsa sabiduría altariana. Sólo pedimos una nimiedad a cambio.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps we can interest you in an aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's?
trans-unit.target: ¿Quizás le interese un orden estéticamente agradable de 0's y 1's?

trans-unit.source: Here is an exchange we propose, alien. It is a good one, fair and true.
trans-unit.target: Proponemos un intercambio, extraterrestre. Es justo y verdadero.

trans-unit.source: We are wary of others. Even of you. We request this trade under cautious terms.
trans-unit.target: Desconfiamos, incluso de ti. Solicitamos este intercambio con cautela.

trans-unit.source: Even if you have not yet found the way of Krynn yourself, that does not mean we cannot share with each other.
trans-unit.target: Aunque aún no descubras el camino de Krynn, ello no impide nuestro compartir.

trans-unit.source: We have forgotten more than you will ever learn, alien. But we have not forgotten this wisdom we wish to trade with you now.
trans-unit.target: Hemos olvidado más de lo que aprenderás, extraterrestre. Pero no olvidamos la sabiduría que ahora deseamos intercambiar contigo.

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you. It is simple and easy to understand on the surface. You should have no misgivings.
trans-unit.target: Te proponemos un trato. Sencillo y claro. Sin resquicios para dudas.

trans-unit.source: We share nothing freely, but the terms we offer you today are mighty close.
trans-unit.target: Nada compartimos sin costo, pero los términos de hoy casi lo son.

trans-unit.source: You have many interesting things we desire, unhived one. Let us trade for them.
trans-unit.target: Posees muchas curiosidades tentadoras, ser sin colmena. Negociemos por ellas.

trans-unit.source: You are clever, for animals. We wish to do trade with you.
trans-unit.target: Sos astuto, para ser animal. Anhelamos comerciar contigo.

trans-unit.source: Remember, we can read your mind. Make sure to deal with us fairly.
trans-unit.target: Recuerda, tus pensamientos nos son perceptibles. Trata con justicia.

trans-unit.source: Let this trade deepen our alliance and benefit us both.
trans-unit.target: Que este comercio profundice nuestra alianza y nos beneficie.

trans-unit.source: We are looking to negotiate a deal.
Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Investiga el Traductor Universal, ¡Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril!

trans-unit.source: We are interested in trading this with you.
You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.
trans-unit.target: Tienes algunas cosas que deseamos y nosotros tenemos algunas cosas que creemos te gustarán.

trans-unit.source: Take a look at this trade opportunity.
trans-unit.target: Echa un vistazo a esta oportunidad de intercambio.

trans-unit.source: We are really excited to make this offer to you. Our gills are literally filled with delight. Or bacteria. It could definitely be bacteria now that I think of it.
trans-unit.target: Proponemos un intercambio, extraterrestre. Es justo y verdadero.

trans-unit.source: We're just bursting with anticipation! Or it's the pressure from being this deep. No, it's definitely anticipation!
trans-unit.target: ¡Estamos repletos de anticipación! O es la presión de estar tan profundo. No, ¡definitivamente es anticipación!

trans-unit.source: We offer you the pearls of our wisdom and trade, encased in oysters of friendship. Just don't ask where the oysters came from.
trans-unit.target: Ofrecemos las perlas de nuestra sabiduría y comercio, encapsuladas en ostras de amistad. Simplemente no preguntes de dónde vinieron las ostras.

trans-unit.source: Welcome to our ocean of possibilities. We hope you don't mind if we dive right into negotiations. Or if we suddenly start singing. It's mating season, you see. You probably didn't need to know that.
trans-unit.target: Bienvenido a nuestro océano de posibilidades. Esperamos que no le importe si nos sumergimos directamente en las negociaciones. O si de repente empezamos a cantar. Es la temporada de apareamiento, ya ves. Probablemente no necesitabas saber eso.

trans-unit.source: We're fresh out of the Drengin pain amplifiers and ready to negotiate a good deal. What do you think of this trade?
trans-unit.target: Estamos recién agotados de los amplificadores de dolor Drengin y listos para negociar un buen trato. ¿Qué piensas de este intercambio?

trans-unit.source: Ahh. My delightful alien counterpart. The Terrans have an offer for you.
trans-unit.target: Ah, mi encantador contraparte extraterrestre. Los terrícolas te proponen algo.

trans-unit.source: We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.
trans-unit.target: Tenemos una oferta provechosa para ambos, carnepresa.

trans-unit.source: Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.
trans-unit.target: ¿Deseas intercambiar sabiduría con nosotros? Ansiábamos hacerlo contigo.

trans-unit.source: We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!
trans-unit.target: Poseemos lo que anhelas y tú lo que nosotros codiciamos. ¡Feliz jornada!

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?
trans-unit.target: Ofrecemos un trato, extraterrestre. Nos beneficia enormemente. ¿Necesitas más explicaciones?

trans-unit.source: Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.
trans-unit.target: Compartamos, como lo hacen las civilizaciones prudentes.

trans-unit.source: We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, arrebatamos lo que queremos de gusanos patéticos como tú. Pero hoy, ofrecemos algo a cambio. Sorprendente.

trans-unit.source: Your pitiful existence has somehow drawn our attention. How intriguing. Let's talk trade, shall we?
trans-unit.target: De alguna manera, tu existencia lamentable ha captado nuestra atención. Qué intrigante. Hablemos de comercio, ¿no te parece?

trans-unit.source: It amuses us to momentarily lower ourselves to your level. Consider this trade a rare act of mercy.
trans-unit.target: Nos divierte momentáneamente rebajarnos a tu nivel. Considera este intercambio un raro acto de misericordia.

trans-unit.source: It's not often that we deign to barter with inferiors. You should consider this a high honor, worm.
trans-unit.target: No es frecuente que nos dignemos a negociar con inferiores. Deberías considerarlo un alto honor, gusano.

trans-unit.source: We've momentarily grown tired of conquest. Let's play this quaint game of trade you seem so fond of.
trans-unit.target: Hemos crecido momentáneamente cansados de la conquista. Juguemos a este pintoresco juego de comercio que parece gustarte tanto.

trans-unit.source: Feeling charitable today. We offer you trade, a chance to crawl from the mud. Grab it before we change our minds.
trans-unit.target: Sintiéndonos caritativos hoy. Te ofrecemos un intercambio, una oportunidad para salir del lodo. Aprovéchalo antes de que cambiemos de opinión.
