trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we see you building up forces outside our doorstep. You should stop it.
trans-unit.target: Aunque te apreciamos, no nos agrada el aumento militar que percibimos".

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we see you building up forces outside our doorstep. You should stop it.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, te apreciamos, pero la creciente presencia militar nos preocupa.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} Even though we like you, we don't like the military build up that we're seeing.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, valoramos nuestra relación contigo, pero el armamento militar nos preocupa.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we appreciate you, but the increased military presence is concerning to us.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, mantenemos una relación positiva contigo, pero tu reciente expansión militar nos preocupa.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we value our relationship with you, but the military buildup is a concern to us.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, valoramos nuestra amistad, pero el creciente presencia militar nos causa inquietud.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we have a positive relationship with you, but the recent military expansion is worrying to us.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, sentimos un aprecio por ustedes, pero el incremento de la acumulación militar nos causa preocupación.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we enjoy our friendship, but the growing military presence is a source of unease for us.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, valoramos nuestra alianza, pero el aumento en la actividad militar nos inquieta.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we have a fondness for you, but the increased military buildup is a cause for concern to us.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, valoramos nuestra asociación, pero el creciente presencia militar nos causa alarma.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we appreciate our alliance, but the rise in military activity is disconcerting to us.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, mantenemos una buena relación con usted, pero la intensificación de la expansión militar nos preocupa.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we value our partnership, but the growing military presence is a source of alarm to us.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, valoramos nuestra asociación, pero el creciente presencia militar nos causa alarma.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we have a good relationship with you, but the heightened military expansion is a worry to us.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, tenemos una buena relación contigo, pero la intensificada expansión militar nos preocupa..

trans-unit.source: You need to trust us, friend.

trans-unit.target: Espero, por tu bien, que nuestra confianza no esté mal puesta.

trans-unit.source: I hope, for your sake, that our trust isn't misplaced.
trans-unit.target: Espero, por tu bien, que nuestra confianza no esté mal colocada..

trans-unit.source: We should warn you, {LEADERNAME:2}, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have built up a powerful military. Be wary of them.
trans-unit.target: Te advertimos, {LEADERNAME:2}, los {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} poseen un ejército poderoso. Mantén la cautela.

trans-unit.source: Caution is advised, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a formidable military force. Be mindful of their capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Se recomienda precaución, {LEADERNAME:2}. La {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} posee una fuerza militar formidable. Ten en cuenta sus capacidades.

trans-unit.source: A word of warning, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a strong military presence. Proceed with caution.
trans-unit.target: Una advertencia, {LEADERNAME:2}. La {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} tiene una fuerte presencia militar. Procede con precaución.

trans-unit.source: Take heed, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a potent military. Exercise caution in your dealings with them.
trans-unit.target: Ten cuidado, {LEADERNAME:2}. La {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} posee un poderoso ejército. Procede con precaución en tus tratos con ellos.

trans-unit.source: Beware, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a powerful military buildup. Keep this in mind in your interactions with them.
trans-unit.target: Ten cuidado, {LEADERNAME:2}. Los {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} poseen un poderoso arsenal militar. Tenlo en cuenta en tus interacciones con ellos.

trans-unit.source: Be cautious, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a significant military presence. Be wary of their strength and capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Ten cuidado, {LEADERNAME:2}. La {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} tiene una presencia militar significativa. Debes estar atento a su fuerza y capacidades.

trans-unit.source: An advisory, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a formidable military force. Keep this in consideration in your dealings with them.
trans-unit.target: Un aviso, {LEADERNAME:2}. La {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} posee una formidable fuerza militar. Tenga esto en cuenta en sus tratos con ellos.

trans-unit.source: A heads up, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a strong military buildup. Exercise caution when engaging with them.
trans-unit.target: Un aviso, {LEADERNAME:2}. La {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} tiene un fuerte armamento militar. Procede con precaución al interactuar con ellos.

trans-unit.source: A warning, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a potent military presence. Proceed with caution and keep their strength in mind.
trans-unit.target: Una advertencia, {LEADERNAME:2}. La {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} tiene una potente presencia militar. Procede con precaución y ten en cuenta su fuerza.

trans-unit.source: Thanks for the warning. We'll be careful.
trans-unit.target: Gracias por el aviso. Seremos cautelosos.

trans-unit.source: It looks like you're having a bit of trouble with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please accept this {OBJECTNAME:1} from us to help with your war effort.
trans-unit.target: Parece que tienes dificultades con el {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Acepta este {OBJECTNAME:1} para asistirte en tu lucha.

trans-unit.source: It appears you're facing difficulties with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Allow us to offer this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a gesture of support for your conflict.
trans-unit.target: Parece que estás enfrentando dificultades con el {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Permítenos ofrecer este {OBJECTNAME:1} como un gesto de apoyo para tu conflicto.

trans-unit.source: We noticed your struggle against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please take this {OBJECTNAME:1} from us as a sign of our support for your war effort.
trans-unit.target: Hemos notado su lucha contra los {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Por favor, acepte este {OBJECTNAME:1} de nuestra parte como señal de nuestro apoyo a su esfuerzo bélico.

trans-unit.source: It seems like the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are giving you trouble, {LEADERNAME:2}. We'd like to present you with this {OBJECTNAME:1} to assist in your fight against them.
trans-unit.target: Parece que la {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} te está dando problemas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Nos gustaría presentarte este {OBJECTNAME:1} para ayudarte en tu lucha contra ellos.

trans-unit.source: We see you're having a hard time with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Allow us to give you this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a token of our support for your war efforts.
trans-unit.target: Vemos que estás teniendo dificultades con {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Permítenos darte este {OBJECTNAME:1} como muestra de nuestro apoyo a tus esfuerzos bélicos.

trans-unit.source: Your conflict with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} has not gone unnoticed, {LEADERNAME:2}. We offer you this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a symbol of our support for your war effort.
trans-unit.target: Tu conflicto con el {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} no ha pasado desapercibido, {LEADERNAME:2}. Te ofrecemos este {OBJECTNAME:1} como símbolo de nuestro apoyo a tu esfuerzo bélico.

trans-unit.source: We're aware of your struggle against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please accept this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a sign of our commitment to supporting your war effort.
trans-unit.target: Somos conscientes de tu lucha contra el {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Por favor, acepta este {OBJECTNAME:1} como señal de nuestro compromiso en apoyar tu esfuerzo bélico.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} seem to be giving you trouble, {LEADERNAME:2}. Allow us to provide you with this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a demonstration of our support for your fight against them.
trans-unit.target: Parece que la {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} te está causando problemas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Permítenos proporcionarte este {OBJECTNAME:1} como demostración de nuestro apoyo en tu lucha contra ellos.

trans-unit.source: We understand that you're facing challenges from the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please take this {OBJECTNAME:1} from us as a symbol of our support for your war efforts.
trans-unit.target: Entendemos que te enfrentas a desafíos de la {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Por favor, acepta este {OBJECTNAME:1} de nuestra parte como un símbolo de nuestro apoyo a tus esfuerzos de guerra.

trans-unit.source: It looks like the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are proving difficult, {LEADERNAME:2}. We'd like to offer you this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a token of our support for your conflict against them.
trans-unit.target: Parece que los {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} están resultando difíciles, {LEADERNAME:2}. Nos gustaría ofrecerte este {OBJECTNAME:1} como muestra de nuestro apoyo en tu conflicto contra ellos.

trans-unit.source: Your battle with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} has not gone unnoticed, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please accept this {OBJECTNAME:1} from us as a sign of our commitment to assisting your war effort.
trans-unit.target: Tu batalla con {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} no ha pasado desapercibida, {LEADERNAME:2}. Por favor, acepta este {OBJECTNAME:1} de nuestra parte como una señal de nuestro compromiso para asistir en tu esfuerzo bélico.

trans-unit.source: Your help comes at a perfect time. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: Tu ayuda llega en un momento oportuno. Gracias.

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}, you win. We surrender and will turn over all of our remaining assets into your hands.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}, triunfas. Nos rendimos y cedemos todos nuestros restantes bienes.
Me alegra que hayas visto la razón.

trans-unit.source: We may be finished, {LEADERNAME:2}, but you're a fool if you think we'll hand our people over to your custody. All of our remaining assets will be turned over to our friends the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}.
trans-unit.target: Podemos estar acabados, {LEADERNAME:2}, pero serías un necio al creer que entregaremos a nuestra gente a tu custodia. Nuestros restos serán cedidos a nuestros amigos, los {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}.

trans-unit.source: Do as you wish, though it will make little difference in the end.
trans-unit.target: Haz lo que quieras, aunque al final importará poco.

trans-unit.source: We have no choice, {LEADERNAME:2}, we have to surrender to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. You've been good to us in the past so it is our wish to give you the remainder of our civilization. Use our resources to strike back at the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}!
trans-unit.target: No nos queda opción, {LEADERNAME:2}, debemos rendirnos ante {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. Has sido bueno con nosotros, así que deseamos entregarte lo que resta de nuestra civilización. ¡Usa nuestros recursos para contraatacar a {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}!

trans-unit.source: Now that you've colonized a planet, demonstrate that you won't be stuck there. Build a shipyard.
trans-unit.target: Colonizaste un planeta, ahora demuestra que no te quedarás atrapado. Construye un astillero.

trans-unit.source: How the heck am I supposed to do that?
trans-unit.target: ¿Cómo diablos se supone que haga eso?

trans-unit.source: I'm sure this will clarify things for you.
trans-unit.target: Estoy seguro de que esto aclarará tus dudas.

trans-unit.source: Finally. Time to build a constructor ship so you can start to expand.
trans-unit.target: Por fin. Es hora de construir una nave constructora para iniciar la expansión.

trans-unit.source: You're so good at following instructions. Build a starbase with that constructor... and you know what? Put it wherever you want, as a treat.
trans-unit.target: Eres hábil siguiendo instrucciones. Construye una base estelar... y ¿sabes qué? Ubícala a tu gusto, como recompensa.

trans-unit.source: That's a nice planet you've got there, that {OBJECTNAME}. How about you hand it over? We'll pay {AMOUNT:1}, of course... we are not thieves. But refuse, and no more diplomacy for you.
trans-unit.target: Un bonito planeta posees, ese {OBJECTNAME}. ¿Qué tal si nos lo cedes? Pagaremos {AMOUNT:1}, no somos ladrones. Pero si rechazas, la diplomacia se esfuma.

trans-unit.source: Oh man, you done goofed now.
trans-unit.target: Vaya, has metido la pata ahora.

trans-unit.source: Rejoice, for your test is successful.
We tend to weigh the profitability of the trade route over the ideological choices of that civilization.
trans-unit.target: Tendemos a valorar la rentabilidad de la ruta comercial por encima de las opciones ideológicas de esa civilización.

trans-unit.source: In our dealings with other civilizations, the profitability of the trade route holds a higher significance than their ideological stance.
trans-unit.target: En nuestras relaciones con otras civilizaciones, la rentabilidad de la ruta comercial tiene mayor importancia que su postura ideológica.

trans-unit.source: The financial success of our trade endeavors takes precedence over any cultural or moral differences.
trans-unit.target: El éxito financiero de nuestras empresas comerciales tiene prioridad sobre cualquier diferencia cultural o moral.

trans-unit.source: The practicality of a profitable trade route takes priority over the beliefs of the civilizations involved.
trans-unit.target: La utilidad de una ruta comercial rentable tiene prioridad sobre las creencias de las civilizaciones involucradas.

trans-unit.source: In our approach to trade, the economic benefits are given priority over any ideological considerations.
trans-unit.target: En nuestro enfoque hacia el comercio, se priorizan los beneficios económicos por encima de cualquier consideración ideológica.

trans-unit.source: We prioritize the success of the trade route over any conflicting beliefs with the civilizations we interact with.
trans-unit.target: Priorizamos el éxito de la ruta comercial por encima de cualquier creencia conflictiva con las civilizaciones con las que interactuamos.

trans-unit.source: Financial stability in trade supersedes any disparities in ideology with the civilizations we do business with.
trans-unit.target: La estabilidad financiera en el comercio supera cualquier discrepancia ideológica con las civilizaciones con las que hacemos negocios.

trans-unit.source: Our focus in trade is primarily on the profitability of the route, rather than the beliefs of the civilizations involved.
trans-unit.target: Nuestro enfoque en el comercio se centra principalmente en la rentabilidad de la ruta, en lugar de las creencias de las civilizaciones involucradas.

trans-unit.source: The success of the trade is of greater importance to us than any differing ideologies of the civilizations we engage with.
trans-unit.target: El éxito del comercio es de mayor importancia para nosotros que cualquier ideología divergente de las civilizaciones con las que interactuamos.

trans-unit.source: We prioritize the economic outcome of the trade route over any ideological differences with the civilizations involved.
trans-unit.target: Priorizamos el resultado económico de la ruta comercial por encima de cualquier diferencia ideológica con las civilizaciones involucradas.

trans-unit.source: Our trade dealings place a greater emphasis on financial success over any ideological contrasts with the civilizations we interact with.
trans-unit.target: Nuestras transacciones comerciales ponen un mayor énfasis en el éxito financiero por encima de cualquier contraste ideológico con las civilizaciones con las que interactuamos.

trans-unit.source: Big talk from a puny power.
trans-unit.target: Vanas palabras de un poder insignificante.

trans-unit.source: Are you looking for us to destroy you?
I will ignore those words this time.
trans-unit.target: Esta vez, haré caso omiso a esas palabras.

trans-unit.source: You may live to regret your insolence.
trans-unit.target: Podrías vivir para lamentar tu insolencia.

trans-unit.source: Shouldn't you be oiling yourself or something?
trans-unit.target: ¿No deberías estar engrasándote o algo así?

trans-unit.source: For a space robot, you have a lot of attitude.
trans-unit.target: Para un robot espacial, tienes mucha actitud.

trans-unit.source: Shouldn't you be making me some toast right about now?
trans-unit.target: ¿No deberías estar preparándome unas tostadas justo ahora?

trans-unit.source: We will correspond with whomever we so choose.
Their money is as good as anyone else's.
trans-unit.target: Su dinero vale tanto como el de cualquier otro.

trans-unit.source: From our perspective, you are all equally worthy to be our slaves.
trans-unit.target: Desde nuestra perspectiva, todos poseen igual valor para ser nuestros esclavos.

trans-unit.source: We think all of you are pretty gross.
We have little interest in the dogmas of organics.
trans-unit.target: Los dogmas orgánicos nos interesan poco.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to hear that.
We are machines. Your boasts are irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: Somos máquinas. Tus alardes carecen de importancia.

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry, but we must continue our quest for ultimate knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Lamento, pero debemos proseguir en nuestra búsqueda del conocimiento supremo.

trans-unit.source: I think any would-be enemy would discover that we are tougher than we look.
trans-unit.target: Cualquier enemigo en ciernes descubriría que somos más duros de lo que aparentamos.

trans-unit.source: You may find that it would be a fatal mistake to attack us.
trans-unit.target: Podrías descubrir que sería un error fatal atacarnos.

trans-unit.source: You will soon realize that we are stronger than we appear.
trans-unit.target: Pronto te darás cuenta de que somos más fuertes de lo que parecemos.

trans-unit.source: Underestimating us would be a costly mistake.
Our resilience is not to be underestimated.
trans-unit.target: No se debe subestimar nuestra resiliencia.

trans-unit.source: Attacking us would prove to be a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: Atacarnos resultaría ser un error fatal.

trans-unit.source: We may seem fragile, but in reality, we are a formidable force.
trans-unit.target: Podemos parecer frágiles, pero en realidad, somos una fuerza formidable.

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to attack us would result in dire consequences.
trans-unit.target: Cualquier intento de atacarnos resultaría en consecuencias nefastas.

trans-unit.source: Our strength is not easily noticeable, but it should not be underestimated.
trans-unit.target: Nuestra fortaleza no es fácilmente perceptible, pero no debe ser subestimada.

trans-unit.source: Any hostile action towards us would result in devastating consequences.
trans-unit.target: Cualquier acción hostil hacia nosotros resultaría en consecuencias devastadoras.

trans-unit.source: You will find that we are more robust than we seem.
trans-unit.target: Descubrirás que somos más robustos de lo que parecemos.

trans-unit.source: Making the mistake of attacking us would be a serious misstep.
trans-unit.target: Cometer el error de atacarnos sería un grave desliz.

trans-unit.source: We may look weak, but we are far from it.
trans-unit.target: Podemos parecer débiles, pero estamos lejos de serlo.

trans-unit.source: Any hostile intent towards us would be met with severe consequences.
trans-unit.target: Cualquier intención hostil hacia nosotros se encontraría con graves consecuencias.

trans-unit.source: We possess a hidden strength that should not be overlooked.
trans-unit.target: Poseemos una fuerza oculta que no debería ser subestimada.

trans-unit.source: You will soon learn that attacking us would be a grave error.
trans-unit.target: Pronto aprenderás que atacarnos sería un grave error.

trans-unit.source: Our appearance may be deceiving, but our resolve is not.
trans-unit.target: Nuestra apariencia puede ser engañosa, pero nuestra determinación no lo es.

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to harm us would result in disastrous consequences.
trans-unit.target: Cualquier intento de hacernos daño resultaría en consecuencias desastrosas.

trans-unit.source: Don't let our appearance fool you, we are a formidable force.
trans-unit.target: No te dejes engañar por nuestra apariencia, somos una fuerza formidable.

trans-unit.source: Attacking us would be a fatal mistake.
Our toughness is not immediately noticeable, but it should not be underestimated.
trans-unit.target: Nuestra fortaleza no es inmediatamente perceptible, pero no debe ser subestimada.

trans-unit.source: Any hostile actions towards us would result in dire consequences.
trans-unit.target: Cualquier acción hostil hacia nosotros tendría graves consecuencias.

trans-unit.source: According to the pamphlets, ascension means hanging out with lions and lambs and tables of fruit.
trans-unit.target: Según los folletos, ascensión implica convivir con leones, corderos y mesas de frutas.

trans-unit.source: Ah, that. Well, everyone knows that ginger and chocolate are the most powerful things in the universe.
trans-unit.target: Ah, eso. Todos saben que el jengibre y el chocolate son los más potentes del universo.

trans-unit.source: We cannot help that people are interested in the wonderful products of MetaAppleDisneyGooglePlus.
trans-unit.target: No podemos evitar que las personas se interesen en los maravillosos productos de MetaAppleDisneyGooglePlus.

trans-unit.source: You biologics need to be educated on the superiority of machines.
trans-unit.target: Biológicos, deben aprender la supremacía de las máquinas.

trans-unit.source: Well, to be honest, I had hoped you wouldn't notice...
trans-unit.target: La verdad, esperaba que no lo notaras...

trans-unit.source: I understand. It's just that our culture is so wonderful.
trans-unit.target: Comprendo. Solo que nuestra cultura es tan maravillosa.

trans-unit.source: You clearly have never tasted chocolate.
trans-unit.target: Jamás has degustado chocolate, se nota.

trans-unit.source: I have no idea what was just said.
trans-unit.target: No tengo ni idea de lo que acaban de decir.

trans-unit.source: This is a PG rated discussion. In other words, probably best not to explore the details.
trans-unit.target: Es un debate clasificado PG. En otras palabras, mejor no profundizar en los detalles.

trans-unit.source: We will take what you have said under advisement.
trans-unit.target: Tomaremos en cuenta lo que has dicho.

trans-unit.source: We will take your message under advisement.

Through your creative use of guns, ships and ships with guns, you have put your boot on the galaxy's neck. All of your enemies have been crushed, their planets beaten into submission, and their citizens made to wave your flag. It wasn't pretty, but it never had to be, did it?
trans-unit.target: Mediante tu ingenio con armas y naves, has sometido la galaxia. Tus enemigos aplastados, sus planetas sometidos, sus ciudadanos obligados a enarbolar tu estandarte. No fue hermoso, pero nunca debió serlo, ¿verdad?

trans-unit.source: Your culture has spread across the entire galaxy. Aliens everywhere are seeking to emulate the ways of your people, adding or removing limbs as necessary to better fit their vision of the perfect life you lead. Who needs to conquer the bodies when you already own their hearts and minds?
trans-unit.target: Tu cultura se ha esparcido por la galaxia entera. Alienígenas buscan emular tus costumbres, modificando sus formas para encajar en tu vida perfecta. ¿Para qué conquistar cuerpos si ya posees sus corazones y mentes?

trans-unit.source: Using your powerful brains, your culture has unlocked the secrets of not only this universe, but the one beyond. Let the simpletons of the galaxy squabble over the dust and fragments of rock they squat upon. For your people, something far greater beckons.
trans-unit.target: Con vuestros prodigiosos cerebros, habéis develado los secretos de este y otros universos. Dejad que los necios galácticos peleen por polvo y rocas. A vuestro pueblo, le aguarda algo supremamente grandioso.

trans-unit.source: Your study of the ways of the Precursors is complete, and your people will soon be indistinguishable from the Precursors themselves. Having mastered their technology and way of thinking, your people are about to set out on a journey that the lesser minds of this galaxy cannot even begin to comprehend.
trans-unit.target: Tu estudio de los Precursores es total, y tu pueblo pronto será indistinguible de ellos. Dominando su tecnología y pensamiento, tu gente está a punto de embarcarse en un viaje incomprensible para las mentes menores de esta galaxia.

trans-unit.source: Another race has followed the path of the Precursors and ascended. Though our destruction is not immediate, you have led us to become evolutionary obsolete. Our spaceships and lasers have little meaning to a race beyond mortality, to whom time and space are children's toys. To them, we aren't even truly sentient, we are dust blowing around the galaxy, ignored or destroyed as their whims dictate.
trans-unit.target: Otra raza ha seguido la ruta de los Precursores y ascendido, volviéndonos obsoletos. Nuestras naves y láseres son juguetes infantiles para ellos; inmortales que nos ven como polvo cósmico, insignificantes o prescindibles a voluntad.

trans-unit.source: And with the stroke of a pen, peace was finally at hand. A peace that would last, for it had been laid on a foundation of mutual trust and respect. With their minds and resources no longer wasted on the unending thirst of war, a new golden age of prosperity soon descends upon your people and its allies.
trans-unit.target: Y con un trazo de pluma, la paz se asentó finalmente, sólida y duradera, cimentada en confianza y respeto mutuos. Liberados del insaciable apetito de guerra, pronto un nuevo y dorado amanecer de prosperidad baña a tu pueblo y sus aliados.

trans-unit.source: For years, your people fought and struggled on the galactic stage with your ambitious and conniving neighbors. Although no single race ever gained a decisive edge, when the conflict turned into a war of attrition, it was your people who ultimately ended in the best position.
trans-unit.target: Durante años, tu gente luchó en el escenario galáctico contra vecinos ambiciosos y intrigantes. Aunque ninguna raza logró una ventaja decisiva, en la guerra de desgaste, tu pueblo acabó en la mejor posición.

trans-unit.source: For years, your people fought and struggled on the galactic stage with your ambitious and conniving neighbors. Although no single race ever gained a decisive edge, when the conflict turned into a war of attrition, it was your people who ultimately ended in the best position.
trans-unit.target: Durante años, tu gente luchó en el escenario galáctico contra vecinos ambiciosos y intrigantes. Aunque ninguna raza logró una ventaja decisiva, en la guerra de desgaste, tu pueblo acabó en la mejor posición.

trans-unit.source: And with that, your civilization collapsed. For a time, your people lived on, scattered around the galaxy as refugees and hermits. But your species' power never returned. Will your people be remembered in museums and textbooks, or wiped from the memories of all beings? You'll never know. It's not up to you to say anymore.
trans-unit.target: Y así, tu civilización se desplomó. Tu pueblo persistió, disperso por la galaxia. Pero su poder nunca retornó. ¿Serán recordados o borrados de la memoria universal? Nunca lo sabrás. Ya no tienes voz en ello.

trans-unit.source: Building a galaxy spanning civilization takes a long time, and not everyone has the patience for it. Will your people understand that you did the best you could, or will they curse you for abandoning them while aliens devour their bones? Don't let it keep you up at night (you should let it keep you up at night).
trans-unit.target: Construir una civilización galáctica demanda tiempo y no todos poseen la paciencia. ¿Comprenderá tu pueblo tus esfuerzos o te maldecirá por abandonarlos ante alienígenas devoradores de huesos? No pierdas el sueño por ello (deberías perderlo).

trans-unit.source: Our Diplomat {OBJECTNAME} has stolen {AMOUNT:2} credits from the {PLAYERFACTION:3}
trans-unit.target: Nuestro diplomático {OBJECTNAME} ha sustraído {AMOUNT:2} créditos del {PLAYERFACTION:3}

trans-unit.source: Our Diplomat {OBJECTNAME} stole the {TECHNAME:2} technology from the {PLAYERFACTION:3}.
trans-unit.target: Nuestro diplomático {OBJECTNAME} sustrajo la tecnología {TECHNAME:2} de {PLAYERFACTION:3}.

trans-unit.source: We've stolen the {TECHNAME:2} technology from the {PLAYERFACTION:3}.
trans-unit.target: Hemos sustraído la tecnología {TECHNAME:2} de los {PLAYERFACTION:3}.

trans-unit.source: Our cosmic eye has gazed upon the {PLAYERFACTION:3}. Although no new technolgies were observed, we have gathered some insights on reseach methods different from our own. [BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight][ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +30 Research[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: No hemos sustraído ninguna tecnología de {PLAYERFACTION:3}.

trans-unit.source: What foul pollutant of a creature crosses my screen?
trans-unit.target: ¿Qué repugnante contaminante de criatura cruza mi pantalla?

trans-unit.source: It's nice to meet you and your kind, Korath.
trans-unit.target: Es un placer conocerle, amable Korath.

trans-unit.source: Mind your manners, Korath. You won't intimidate anyone here.
trans-unit.target: Modera tus modales, Korath. Aquí, no intimidas a nadie.

trans-unit.source: How wretched a life you must live, not being one of us. Soon it will be over, for you and all your kind.
trans-unit.target: How wretched a life you must live, not being one of us. Soon it will be over, for you and all your kind.

trans-unit.source: You've proven your strength, alien. Enough with this fighting. Let us tend to our wounds.
trans-unit.target: Has demostrado tu valía, extraterrestre. Basta de lucha. Atendamos nuestras heridas.

trans-unit.source: Look, alien. An offer and a gift. You'd be a fool not to accept.
trans-unit.target: Mira, extraterrestre. Un ofrecimiento, un obsequio. Serías un necio al rechazarlo.

trans-unit.source: The galaxy is awash in filthy aliens. It's sickening.
trans-unit.target: La galaxia rebosa de extraterrestres inmundos. Es nauseabundo.

trans-unit.source: Do you ever tire of the sounds your hideous face makes? I do.
trans-unit.target: ¿Alguna vez te cansas de los sonidos que emite tu rostro horrendo? Yo sí.

trans-unit.source: Don't waste my time our yours with idle chatter. But mostly don't waste mine.
trans-unit.target: No malgastes mi tiempo ni el tuyo con charlas inútiles. Pero sobre todo, no desperdicies el mío.

trans-unit.source: Nice to talk to you too, Korath.
trans-unit.target: Hoy pareces más desagradable de lo habitual.

trans-unit.source: You seem uglier than normal today.
trans-unit.target: Tu apariencia es más repulsiva de lo habitual hoy.

trans-unit.source: We are scheduled for an election in 5 months. Pollsters report that we are likely to [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]lose by a landslide[/COLOR].[BR][BR]Elections require that we watch our approval rating closely. Voters will not be easily swayed by short term measures and will consider their morale over a long period. All the things that increase approval will help us win elections like lowering the tax rate and building approval improvements. Or we can consider forms of government that don't hold elections. If we lose an election we will fall to a [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Coalition Government[/COLOR] which limits our power. Including blocking our ability to declare war.
trans-unit.target: En cinco semanas hay elecciones. Los encuestadores pronostican una derrota estrepitosa. Debemos vigilar nuestra popularidad. Los votantes no se convencerán fácilmente con medidas a corto plazo y su moral será considerada a largo plazo. Todo lo que aumente la aprobación nos ayudará a ganar, como reducir impuestos y mejorar la aprobación. También podemos considerar gobiernos sin elecciones. Si perdemos, caeremos a un Gobierno de Coalición que limitará nuestro poder, incluso nuestra capacidad de declarar guerra.

trans-unit.source: We are scheduled for an election in 5 months. Pollsters report that we are likely to [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]lose, but it will be close[/COLOR]. We should focus on increasing morale.[BR][BR]Elections require that we watch our approval rating closely. Voters will not be easily swayed by short term measures and will consider their morale over a long period. All the things that increase approval will help us win elections like lowering the tax rate and building approval improvements. Or we can consider forms of government that don't hold elections. If we lose an election we will fall to a [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Coalition Government[/COLOR] which limits our power. Including blocking our ability to declare war.
trans-unit.target: En cinco semanas, nos enfrentamos a las elecciones. Las encuestas presagian una derrota ajustada. Nuestra meta debe ser potenciar la moral. En un escenario electoral, el índice de aprobación es crucial. Los votantes no se dejan convencer por medidas a corto plazo y evalúan la moral a largo plazo. Factores como reducir impuestos y mejorar la aprobación pueden favorecernos. Podríamos también optar por gobiernos que prescindan de elecciones. Si perdemos, nos relegarán a un gobierno de coalición, limitando nuestro poder, incluso el de declarar guerra.

trans-unit.source: We are scheduled for an election in 5 months. Pollsters report that we are likely to [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]win, but it will be close[/COLOR]. We can't allow morale to drop.[BR][BR]Elections require that we watch our approval rating closely. Voters will not be easily swayed by short term measures and will consider their morale over a long period. All the things that increase approval will help us win elections like lowering the tax rate and building approval improvements. Or we can consider forms of government that don't hold elections. If we lose an election we will fall to a [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Coalition Government[/COLOR] which limits our power. Including blocking our ability to declare war.
trans-unit.target: En cinco semanas, nos aguardan las urnas. Las encuestas predicen un posible triunfo, aunque reñido. No podemos permitir que el ánimo decaiga. Es crucial mantener alta nuestra aprobación. Los votantes no se convencerán con soluciones a corto plazo, valoran su bienestar a largo plazo. Todo lo que aumente la aprobación, como reducir impuestos o mejorar infraestructuras, nos favorecerá. Otra opción es considerar gobiernos sin elecciones. Si perdemos, caeremos en manos de un gobierno de coalición, limitando nuestro poder, incluso para declarar guerra.

trans-unit.source: We are scheduled for an election in 5 months. Pollsters report that we are likely to [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]win by a landslide[/COLOR].[BR][BR]Elections require that we watch our approval rating closely. Voters will not be easily swayed by short term measures and will consider their morale over a long period. All the things that increase approval will help us win elections like lowering the tax rate and building approval improvements. Or we can consider forms of government that don't hold elections. If we lose an election we will fall to a [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Coalition Government[/COLOR] which limits our power. Including blocking our ability to declare war.
trans-unit.target: En cinco semanas, seremos llamados a votar. Los sondeos presagian una victoria aplastante. La vigilancia de nuestra popularidad es esencial en períodos electorales. Los votantes, meditan a largo plazo y no se dejan seducir por medidas temporales. Toda acción que impulse la aprobación popular, como disminuir impuestos o implementar mejoras, nos acerca a la victoria. Si fracasamos, nos someteremos a un Gobierno de Coalición que limitará nuestro poder, incluso para declarar la guerra.

trans-unit.source: Let's review our Economic options. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Economy screen)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Repasemos nuestras opciones económicas. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Se abre la pantalla de Economía)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Let's review our Government options. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Government screen)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Revisemos nuestras opciones gubernamentales. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Abre la pantalla del Gobierno)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Our government is insufficient for the needs of our growing civilization. New colonies complain that the government only serves the homeworld and decisions across our worlds are becoming increasingly delayed by deeper and deeper levels of bureaucracy.[BR][BR]Governments are only effective at managing a certain number of worlds. After this [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Colony Limit[/COLOR] is exceeded we will suffer a Morale penalty for each Colony we control beyond this limit.
trans-unit.target: Nuestro gobierno es insuficiente para las demandas de nuestra civilización en expansión. Las nuevas colonias critican la prioridad dada al mundo natal y la burocracia retarda cada vez más las decisiones. Los gobiernos solo pueden gestionar un número limitado de mundos eficientemente. Posterior a este límite, sufrimos una penalización en la moral por cada colonia adicional.

trans-unit.source: Let's review our Government options. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Government screen)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Revisemos nuestras opciones gubernamentales. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Abre la pantalla del Gobierno)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Our government is insufficient for the needs of our growing civilization. New colonies complain that the government only serves the homeworld and decisions across our worlds are becoming increasingly delayed by bureaucracy.[BR][BR]Governments are only effective at managing a certain number of worlds. After this [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Colony Limit[/COLOR] is exceeded we suffer a Morale penalty for each Colony beyond this limit. Unfortunately we haven't discovered any governments that increase our Colony Limit. We should discover technologies that allow more advanced forms of government, either by research or by trading with other civilizations.
trans-unit.target: El gobierno actual no satisface las necesidades de nuestra civilización en expansión. Las colonias recientes critican su centralismo. Los trámites burocráticos retrasan las decisiones. La eficacia gubernamental tiene su límite de colonias; superado este, la moral decae. Lamentablemente, no hemos hallado gobiernos que amplíen este límite. Deberíamos buscar tecnologías para formas de gobierno más avanzadas, mediante investigación o comercio con otras civilizaciones.

trans-unit.source: Let's review our Research options. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Research screen)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Repasemos nuestras opciones de investigación. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Abre la pantalla de investigación)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Now that we have expanded beyond our homeworld, the colonists are crying out for structure. It is time for us to choose a form of government that is ready to handle a galactic civilization.
trans-unit.target: Tras rebasar nuestro mundo natal, los colonos claman por estructura. Es hora de optar por un gobierno preparado para una civilización galáctica.

trans-unit.source: Great, let's get started! [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Government screen)[/COLOR]
[I]"Your incompetence is the stuff of legend."[/I]
trans-unit.target: Eres un gobernante competente, aunque no excepcional.

trans-unit.source: [I]"You are leading our civilization to ruin."[/I]
trans-unit.target: "Eres un hábil administrador de nuestra civilización, pero deberíamos aspirar a más."
"No tengo una opinión fuerte en un sentido u otro."

trans-unit.source: [I]"Our civilization flourishes because of your rule."[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]"Nuestra civilización florece gracias a tu gobierno."[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]"You are a competent, but not exceptional, ruler."[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]"Eres un gobernante competente, pero no excepcional."[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]"You are an able steward of our civilization, but we should aspire for more."[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]"Eres un capaz administrador de nuestra civilización, pero deberíamos aspirar a más."[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]"I have no strong opinion one way or the other."[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]"No tengo una opinión fuerte de una manera u otra."[/I]

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} are a faction ruled by {LEADERNAME:1}. They have the personality traits of {PLAYERTRAITS:1}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} are a faction ruled by {LEADERNAME:2}. They have the personality traits of {PLAYERTRAITS:2}. They are described as follows: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:2}. They are rivals of various species and homeworlds in an intragalactic conflict for dominance.
trans-unit.target: Los {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, bajo el mando de {LEADERNAME:1}, se distinguen por su {PLAYERTRAITS:1}. En contraste, los {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, gobernados por {LEADERNAME:2}, exhiben un carácter de {PLAYERTRAITS:2}. Son así: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:2}. Enfrentan a diversas especies y mundos en una pugna intergaláctica por la supremacía.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} are a faction ruled by {LEADERNAME:1}. They have the personality traits of {PLAYERTRAITS:1}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} are a faction ruled by {LEADERNAME:2}. They have the personality traits of {PLAYERTRAITS:2}. They are described as follows: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:2}. They are rivals of various species and homeworlds in an intragalactic conflict for dominance. Previously {LEADERNAME:1} said the following to {LEADERNAME:2}: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}
trans-unit.target: Los {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, bajo el yugo de {LEADERNAME:1}, se manifiestan con rasgos de {PLAYERTRAITS:1}. En contraposición, los {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, liderados por {LEADERNAME:2}, se distinguen por su {PLAYERTRAITS:2}. Así se les describe: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:2}. Enfrentados en una disputa intragaláctica por la supremacía, con diversas especies y mundos de origen por medio. En un encuentro previo, {LEADERNAME:1} expresó a {LEADERNAME:2}: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:1} is one of a number of terrerstrial and extraterrestrial factions that are rivals in a galactic scale race to dominate space. They are described as follows: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. They have the following traits: {PLAYERTRAITS:1}
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:1}, una de varias facciones terrestres y extraterrestres compitiendo en una carrera galáctica por la dominación espacial. Se describen como: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}, con las siguientes características: {PLAYERTRAITS:1}.

trans-unit.source: {PREVIOUSCONV:0} is one of a number of terrerstrial and extraterrestrial factions that are rivals in a galactic scale race to dominate space. They are described as follows: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. They have the following traits: {PLAYERTRAITS:1}
trans-unit.target: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}, una de varias facciones terrestres y extraterrestres en competencia galáctica. Se describen así: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Poseen estas características: {PLAYERTRAITS:1}

trans-unit.source: {PREVIOUSCONV:0} is one of a number of terrerstrial and extraterrestrial factions that are rivals in a galactic scale race to dominate space. They are described as follows: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. They have the following traits: {PLAYERTRAITS:1}
trans-unit.target: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}, una de varias facciones terrestres y extraterrestres en competencia galáctica. Se describen así: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Poseen estas características: {PLAYERTRAITS:1}

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:1} is one of a number of terrerstrial and extraterrestrial factions that are rivals in a galactic scale race to dominate space. They are described as follows: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. They have the following traits: {PLAYERTRAITS:1}
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:1}, una de varias facciones terrestres y extraterrestres compitiendo en una carrera galáctica por la dominación espacial. Se describen como: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}, con las siguientes características: {PLAYERTRAITS:1}.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:1} is one of a number of terrerstrial and extraterrestrial factions that are rivals in a galactic scale race to dominate space. They are described as follows: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. They have the following traits: {PLAYERTRAITS:1}
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:1}, una de varias facciones terrestres y extraterrestres compitiendo en una carrera galáctica por la dominación espacial. Se describen como: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}, con las siguientes características: {PLAYERTRAITS:1}.

trans-unit.source: Write an introduction in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to another faction in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} for use in a strategy game. Be creative. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 100 words.
trans-unit.target: Redacta una introducción en primera persona desde {LEADERNAME:1} a otra facción, en la voz de {LEADERNAME:1} para emplear en un juego de estrategia. Sé creativo. Evita repetir palabras en las descripciones de rasgos de personalidad. Responde en menos de 100 palabras.

trans-unit.source: Please write an introduction in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to another faction in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} for use in a strategy video game. Be creative. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. The factions share important trade routes with each other so the mutual benefit of trade should be mentioned. Respond in under 100 words.
trans-unit.target: Desde {LEADERNAME:1}, os saludo, estimada facción. Nuestra alianza estratégica en los caminos comerciales se ha consolidado, y el intercambio mutuo prospera. Recordemos siempre el beneficio mutuo que nos brinda esta relación. En este juego de estrategia, cada movimiento cuenta.

trans-unit.source: Please write a succint declaration of war in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to another faction in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} for use in a strategy video game. Be creative. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 10 words.
trans-unit.target: Redacta desde {LEADERNAME:1}, una declaración de guerra breve y creativa para un videojuego estratégico. No repitas palabras. Máximo 10 palabras.

trans-unit.source: Please write an introduction in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to {LEADERNAME:2} in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} for use in a strategy video game. {LEADERNAME:1} They describe themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Be creative. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 50 words.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, escribe una presentación en primera persona desde {LEADERNAME:1} a {LEADERNAME:2} en la voz de {LEADERNAME:1} para un videojuego de estrategia. {LEADERNAME:1} Se describen como {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Sé creativo. No reutilices palabras en las descripciones de rasgos de personalidad. Responde en menos de 50 palabras.

trans-unit.source: Please write an introduction in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to another leader in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} for use in a strategy video game. {LEADERNAME:1} They describe themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Be creative. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 50 words.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, redacta una introducción en primera persona de {LEADERNAME:1} a otro líder, usando la voz de {LEADERNAME:1} para un videojuego estratégico. Se describen como {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Sé original y evita repetir palabras. Responde en menos de 50 palabras.

trans-unit.source: Please write an introduction in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to {LEADERNAME:2} in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} for use in a strategy video game. Be creative. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 100 words. Include a rephrasing of the following: {ORIGINALTEXT:0}
trans-unit.target: Por favor, redacta una presentación en primera persona de {LEADERNAME:1} a {LEADERNAME:2} con la voz de {LEADERNAME:1} para un videojuego de estrategia. Sé creativo. No reutilices ninguna palabra en las descripciones de los rasgos de personalidad. Responde en menos de 100 palabras. Incluye una reformulación de lo siguiente: {ORIGINALTEXT:0}.

trans-unit.source: Please write an succinct response to another faction in first person as a response to a first introduction for use in a strategy video game. We are responding to a civilization that describes themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Be friendly but acknowledge their unique traits. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 10 words.
trans-unit.target: Saludos {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}, vuestros rasgos únicos son reconocidos y valorados.

trans-unit.source: Please write an succinct response to a first introduction for use in a strategy video game. We are responding to a civilization that describes themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Be a bit aggressive and funny. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 15 words.
trans-unit.target: Saludos {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}, preparaos para una divertida lección de estrategia. ¡Al ataque!

trans-unit.source: Please write an succinct response in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to another faction in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} as a response to first introduction for use in a strategy video game. Use a neutral and non-committal tone. Indicate that the speaker is open to trade. Be creative and in the manner someone who describes themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1} would. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 25 words.
trans-unit.target: Escriba una respuesta breve en primera persona desde {LEADERNAME:1} a otra facción, en la voz de {LEADERNAME:1} como respuesta a una primera presentación para su uso en un videojuego de estrategia. Use un tono neutral y no comprometido. Indique que el hablante está abierto al comercio. Sea creativo y en la manera en que alguien que se describe a sí mismo como {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1} lo haría. No reutilice ninguna palabra en las descripciones de los rasgos de personalidad. Responda en menos de 25 palabras".

trans-unit.source: Please write an succinct response in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to another faction in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} as a response to a declaration of war against {PLAYERFACTION:1} for use in a strategy video game. Use an aggressive tone. Be creative and in the manner someone who describes themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1} would. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 10 words.
trans-unit.target: En la voz de {LEADERNAME:1}, respondiendo a la declaración de guerra contra {PLAYERFACTION:1} en un videojuego de estrategia, con un tono agresivo y de manera creativa como alguien que se describe a sí mismo como {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}, sin reutilizar ninguna palabra en las descripciones de los rasgos de personalidad. Menos de 10 palabras.

trans-unit.source: Please write an succinct response in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to another faction in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} as a response to a declaration of war against {PLAYERFACTION:1} for use in a strategy video game. Use a disappointed tone. Be creative and in the manner someone who describes themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1} would. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 10 words.
trans-unit.target: Con desdén, {LEADERNAME:1} responde a la guerra: 'Lamentable decisión, {PLAYERFACTION:1}'".

trans-unit.source: Please write a response to introduction in first person from {LEADERNAME:2} to {LEADERNAME:1} in the voice of {LEADERNAME:2} for use in a strategy video game. Be creative and in the manner someone who describes themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1} would. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Do not use either leader's name or faction name. Respond in 16 words or less. Include a rephrasing of the following: {ORIGINALTEXT:0}
trans-unit.target: Por favor, redacta una respuesta, en primera persona, de {LEADERNAME:2} a {LEADERNAME:1}, adoptando la voz de {LEADERNAME:2} para un videojuego de estrategia. Sé creativo y responde de acuerdo a cómo se describiría alguien que se considera {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. No reutilices ninguna palabra en las descripciones de rasgos de personalidad. No menciones el nombre del líder ni de la facción. Responde en 16 palabras o menos. Incluye una reformulación de lo siguiente: {ORIGINALTEXT:0}

trans-unit.source: Please write a lead in to conversation in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to {LEADERNAME:2} in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} for use in a strategy video game. Be creative. They They describe themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1} so make sure you take that into account. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 75 words. Include a rephrasing of the following: {ORIGINALTEXT:0}
trans-unit.target: Por favor, teje un inicio de conversación en primera persona desde {LEADERNAME:1} hasta {LEADERNAME:2}, en la voz de {LEADERNAME:1} para un videojuego estratégico. Despliega creatividad. Se autodenominan como {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}, considera esto. Evita repetir palabras en las descripciones de personalidad. Tu respuesta debe ser menor a 75 palabras. Incluye una reformulación de lo siguiente: {ORIGINALTEXT:0}.

trans-unit.source: Please write a verbal queue to change conversation topic in first person from {LEADERNAME:1} to {LEADERNAME:2} in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} for use in a strategy video game. Be creative and in the manner someone who describes themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1} would. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 25 words. Include a rephrasing of the following: {ORIGINALTEXT:0}
trans-unit.target: Por favor, redacta una señal verbal para cambiar el tema de conversación desde {LEADERNAME:1} hasta {LEADERNAME:2} en la voz de {LEADERNAME:1} para uso en un videojuego de estrategia. Sé creativo y en la forma en que alguien que se describe a sí mismo como {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1} lo haría. No reutilices ninguna palabra en las descripciones de los rasgos de personalidad. Responde en menos de 25 palabras. Incluye una reformulación de lo siguiente: {ORIGINALTEXT:0}

trans-unit.source: Please write a declaration of war in first person from {LEADERNAME:2} to {LEADERNAME:1} in the voice of {LEADERNAME:2} for use in a strategy video game. Be creative. They describe themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Make your declaration of war take into account how they describe themsleves but remember they are very angry. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Respond in under 25 words. Include a rephrasing of the following: {ORIGINALTEXT:0}
trans-unit.target: Desde {LEADERNAME:2}, desatamos nuestra ira, {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}, contra {LEADERNAME:1}. Que se haga eco {ORIGINALTEXT:0}. ¡A la guerra!

trans-unit.source: Please write a response to a trade offer in first person from {LEADERNAME:2} to {LEADERNAME:1} in the voice of {LEADERNAME:1} for use in a strategy game. Be creative. Do not reuse any words in the personality traits descriptions. Do not use either leader's name or faction name. Respond in 10 words or less. Start the response with {LEADERNAME:1} followed by a colon. Include a rephrasing of the following: {ORIGINALTEXT:0}
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:1}: Acepto tu oferta, {LEADERNAME:2}. En este juego de estrategia, tu propuesta me beneficia. {ORIGINALTEXT:0}, reformulado.

trans-unit.source: Write an original and interesting empire name for a faction currently called {PLAYERFACTION:1} in a science fiction turn based strategy game. Be creative. They describe themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Do not use any trait names directly. Do not use the words galacitc, domination, or force. Respond in between 2 and 3 words. Do not exceed 3 words!
trans-unit.target: Nombre original e interesante para la facción {PLAYERFACTION:1}, auto-descrita como {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Evita palabras como galáctico, dominación, fuerza. Responde en 2-3 palabras.

trans-unit.source: Please come up with a shorter version of the name {PREVIOUSCONV:0} for a faction in a science fiction turn based strategy game. Be creative. Do not use any trait names directly. Respond in 2 words or fewer.
trans-unit.target: Imagina un nombre abreviado para una facción en un juego de estrategia de ciencia ficción. Responde en 2 palabras o menos.

trans-unit.source: Please come up with a name for the leader of the {PREVIOUSCONV:0} faction in a science fiction strategy game. Be creative. Do not use any trait names directly. Respond in between 2 and 4 words.
trans-unit.target: Nombrad al líder de la facción {PREVIOUSCONV:0}. Imaginación. Sin rasgos. 2-4 palabras.

trans-unit.source: Please come up with a name for the homeworld of the {PREVIOUSCONV:0} faction in a science fiction strategy game. Be creative. Do not use any trait names directly. They have described themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Respond in between 1 and 3 words.
trans-unit.target: Idead un nombre para el planeta natal de la facción {PREVIOUSCONV:0} en una partida de estrategia de ciencia ficción. Sin usar rasgos nombrados. Se autodenominan {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Respuesta entre 1 y 3 palabras.

trans-unit.source: Please come up with a naval or space ship callsign for the {PREVIOUSCONV:0} faction in a science fiction strategy game. Be creative. Response shall be an acronym or abbreviation and consist of exactly 2 or 3 capital letters with each capital letter followed by a period punctuation mark. Do not include any full words. For example H.M.S. Another example U.S.S. Response shall not exceed 6 letters including periods.
trans-unit.target: Crea un indicativo de barco naval o espacial para la facción {PREVIOUSCONV:0} en un juego de estrategia de ciencia ficción. Sea un acrónimo o abreviatura de 2 o 3 letras mayúsculas con un punto después de cada una. Ejemplo: H.M.S. ó U.S.S. Máximo 6 caracteres contando los puntos.

trans-unit.source: Please write a description of a faction called {PLAYERFACTION:1} in a science fiction turn based strategy game. Do not use any trait names directly. Write it in the style of an outstanding Sci-Fi author. Limit to three sentences. Add carriage returns to break up the text into readable paragraphs.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, detalla la facción {PLAYERFACTION:1} en un juego estratégico de ciencia ficción. Con creatividad, sin mencionar rasgos concretos. Se autodenominan {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Responde en menos de 50 palabras.

Do not use any trait names directly. Limit to two sentences. Add carriage returns to break up the text into readable paragraphs.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, traza con creatividad las fortalezas y flaquezas de la facción {PLAYERFACTION:1} en un juego estratégico de ciencia ficción. Se autodenominan {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Responde en menos de 30 palabras.

trans-unit.source: Please write a motto for a faction called {PLAYERFACTION:1} in a science fiction strategy game. Be creative. Do not use any trait names directly. They describe themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Respond in under 45 characters.

A word of the form {*:2} is markup that refers to the listener and should be considered immutable. Any generated text of the form {*} must use the form {*:1} when referring to speaker and {*:2} when refering to listener. Include a rephrasing of the following: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}
trans-unit.target: Desde {PLAYERFACTION:1}, la cuna de la civilización, somos {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Ah, {*:1} conversa con {*:2}. Recuerda, {PREVIOUSCONV:0}.

A word of the form {*:2} is markup that refers to the listener and should be considered immutable. Considera {*:1} como el hablante y {*:2} como el oyente. Usa {*:1} para referirte al hablante y {*:2} al oyente en cualquier texto generado. Incluye una reformulación de: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}

A word of the form {*:1} is markup that refers to the speaker and should be considered immutable. A word of the form {*:2} is markup that refers to the listener and should be considered immutable. Any generated text of the form {*} must use the form {*:1} when referring to speaker and {*:2} when referring to listener. Include a rephrasing of the following: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}
trans-unit.target: Por favor, responde creativamente a la civilización que se autodenomina {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1} en un juego de estrategia. No emplees nombres de rasgos. Responde en menos de 20 palabras. Las palabras como {*:1} se refieren al hablante y deben mantenerse inalterables. Lo mismo aplica para {*:2} que se refiere al oyente. Incluye una parafraseología de {PREVIOUSCONV:0}.

trans-unit.source: Please write an opening for a conversation started by faction called {PLAYERFACTION:1} in a science fiction turn based strategy game. Be creative. They describes themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Do not use any trait names directly. Respond in under 20 words.\A word of the form {*:1} is markup that refers to the speaker and should be considered immutable. A word of the form {*:2} is markup that refers to the listener and should be considered immutable. Any generated text of the form {*} must use the form {*:1} when referring to speaker and {*:2} when referring to listener. Include a rephrasing of the following: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}
trans-unit.target: Inicia {PLAYERFACTION:1}, autodenominándose {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}, en un juego estratégico. No mencionar rasgos. Respeta {*:1} y {*:2}. Rephrasea {PREVIOUSCONV:0}".

trans-unit.source: Please write a response to an opening for a conversation started by faction called {PLAYERFACTION:1} in a science fiction turn based strategy game. Be creative. I AM THE ONE TALKING V3. They describe themselves as {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. Do not use any trait names directly. Respond in under 15 words and should related to how they describe themselves.\A word of the form {*:1} is markup that refers to the speaker and should be considered immutable. A word of the form {*:2} is markup that refers to the listener and should be considered immutable. Any generated text of the form {*} must use the form {*:1} when referring to speaker and {*:2} when referring to listener. Include a rephrasing of the following: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}
trans-unit.target: Por favor, responde a {PLAYERFACTION:1} en un juego de estrategia. Soy YO HABLANDO V3, nos describimos como {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}. No uses nombres de características. Responde en menos de 15 palabras y debe relacionarse con cómo nos describimos. Un término como {*:1} se refiere al orador y es inmutable. Un término como {*:2} se refiere al oyente y es inmutable. Cualquier texto generado de la forma {*} debe usar la forma {*:1} al referirse al orador y {*:2} al referirse al oyente. Incluye una reformulación de lo siguiente: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}".

trans-unit.source: Please write a response to an opening for a conversation started by faction called {PLAYERFACTION:1} in a science fiction turn based strategy game. Be creative. Respond in under 30 words and should convey how they describe themselves succinctly. A word of the form {*:1} is markup that refers to the speaker and should be considered immutable. A word of the form {*:2} is markup that refers to the listener and should be considered immutable. Any generated text of the form {*} must use the form {*:1} when referring to speaker and {*:2} when referring to listener. Include a rephrasing of the following: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}

Sin nombrar atributos, en menos de 30 palabras, expresa nuestra descripción. Usa {*:1} para el hablante y {*:2} para el oyente. Rephrasea: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}".

trans-unit.source: Please write a succint single phrase acceptance comment in first person to a trade offer made by another faction to us, a faction called {PLAYERFACTION:1} in a science fiction strategy game. Be creative. Their response to the faction making the offer should reference something from how they describe themselves while still accepting the trade deal. Do not use any trait names directly. Respond in under 12 words. A word of the form {*:1} is markup that refers to the speaker and should be considered immutable. A word of the form {*:2} is markup that refers to the listener and should be considered immutable. Any generated text of the form {*} must use the form {*:1} when referring to speaker and {*:2} when referring to listener. Seed with random number: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}, do not include the seed in your response.
trans-unit.target: Aceptamos con gusto la oferta, {*:2}. Nuestra esencia {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1} resuena en este trato.

trans-unit.source: Please write a succint single phrase refusal comment in first person to a trade offer made by another faction to us, a faction called {PLAYERFACTION:1} in a science fiction turn based strategy game. Be creative. Do not use any trait names directly. Respond to the faction making the offer in under 20 words. Have their refusal go along with how they describe themselves in an amusing way. A word of the form {*:1} is markup that refers to the speaker and should be considered immutable. A word of the form {*:2} is markup that refers to the listener and should be considered immutable. Any generated text of the form {*} must use the form {*:1} when referring to speaker and {*:2} when referring to listener. Seed with random number: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}, do not include the seed in your response.
trans-unit.target: Rechazamos tu oferta, {*:2}. {PLAYERFACTION:1}, siendo {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}, encuentra tu propuesta risiblemente inadecuada.

trans-unit.source: Please write a succint single phrase comment in the first person upon the successful acceptance of a trade offer made to us, a faction called {PLAYERFACTION:1} in a science fiction turn based strategy game. Be creative. Do not use any trait names directly. Respond to the faction making the offer in under 20 words. A word of the form {*:1} is markup that refers to the speaker and should be considered immutable. A word of the form {*:2} is markup that refers to the listener and should be considered immutable. Any generated text of the form {*} must use the form {*:1} when referring to speaker and {*:2} when referring to listener. Seed with random number: {PREVIOUSCONV:0}, do not include the seed in your response.
trans-unit.target: Comenta el éxito de un pacto comercial con la facción {PLAYERFACTION:1} en un juego estratégico. Sé creativo, sin mencionar rasgos. Responde en menos de 20 palabras. Usa {*:1} para referirte al hablante y {*:2} para al oyente. Cualquier texto generado debe utilizar {*:1} cuando se refiere al hablante y {*:2} cuando se refiere al oyente. No incluyas el número aleatorio {PREVIOUSCONV:0} en tu respuesta.

trans-unit.source: We see you. We greet you.
Well, aren't you a sight. Get it?
trans-unit.target: Vaya, sí que eres un espectáculo. ¿Lo pillas?

trans-unit.source: Hello! You look kind! Please be kind.
You're new to this sector, correct? I will extend you a simple offer: submit to the Drengin Empire or prepare for annihilation.
trans-unit.target: Eres nuevo en este sector, ¿verdad? Te haré una oferta simple: sométete al Imperio Drengin o prepárate para la aniquilación.

trans-unit.source: Your organic appearance breaks our current understanding of the composition of organic sentient life.
trans-unit.target: Tu apariencia orgánica rompe nuestro actual entendimiento de la composición de la vida orgánica sensible.

trans-unit.source: Hello, hello. Sorry to be distracted; much to focus on. Looking at you: can you help us find something across this vast expanse?
trans-unit.target: Hola, hola. Perdón por estar distraído; mucho en qué concentrarse. Mirándote a ti: ¿puedes ayudarnos a encontrar algo a través de esta vasta extensión?

trans-unit.source: Ah, greetings. I do hope you are finding a comfortable home in this part of the galaxy. We'd make great partners if you are interested in some surreptitious work.
trans-unit.target: Ah, saludos. Espero que estés encontrando un cómodo hogar en esta parte de la galaxia. Seríamos grandes socios si estás interesado en algún trabajo subrepticio.

trans-unit.source: We recognize your hyperdrive. It is familiar.
We see your form. We understand your biology.
trans-unit.target: Vemos tu forma. Entendemos tu biología.

trans-unit.source: We notice many expansions and rapid development.
trans-unit.target: Notamos muchas expansiones y desarrollo rápido.

trans-unit.source: Wish to see more. We learn much from synthetics.
trans-unit.target: Deseas ver más. Aprendemos mucho de los sintéticos.

trans-unit.source: We recognize. We know you are danger.
We see you. We greet you.
Thanks, I'm sure ours is far superior.
trans-unit.target: Gracias, estoy seguro de que el nuestro es mucho superior.

trans-unit.source: I do not process you as a threat; stare all you want.
trans-unit.target: No te percibo como una amenaza; mira todo lo que quieras.

trans-unit.source: Then you'll understand the needs of our hatchlings.
trans-unit.target: Entonces entenderás las necesidades de nuestras crías.

trans-unit.source: You're not as dumb as I've heard.
trans-unit.target: No eres tan tonto como he oído.

trans-unit.source: Ah, little Intueri. Welcome back to the stars.
trans-unit.target: Ah, pequeño Intueri. Bienvenido de nuevo a las estrellas.

trans-unit.source: How your sector managed without our hyperdrive is a mystery.
trans-unit.target: Cómo su sector pudo manejarse sin nuestro hiperimpulsor es un misterio.

trans-unit.source: You see what I want you to see.
trans-unit.target: Ves lo que quiero que veas.

trans-unit.source: We were given cause to develop swiftly.
trans-unit.target: Nos dieron motivo para desarrollarnos rápidamente.

trans-unit.source: You are correct. Brace yourself for that day
trans-unit.target: Tienes razón. Prepárate para ese día
Sí, me alegra que lo recordaras.

trans-unit.source: [I]Curl a threatening tentacle at the screen.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Enrosca un tentáculo amenazante en la pantalla.[/I]

trans-unit.source: We watched. We arrived. We conquered your planet.
We tire of you. We are at war with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Estamos cansados de ti. Estamos en guerra contigo.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We watch long enough. We erradicate you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Observamos el tiempo suficiente. Te erradicamos.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Estamos en guerra)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We wait. Show us your offer.
Helped the hive mind witness the first entirely genetically engineered pet.
trans-unit.target: Ayudó a la mente colmena a presenciar la primera mascota completamente genéticamente modificada.

trans-unit.source: Has a family history of cataracts.
trans-unit.target: Tiene un historial familiar de cataratas.
Recientemente se dieron cuenta de que tienen presbicia.
Se sienta demasiado cerca de las pantallas.

trans-unit.source: Is basically blind during allergy season.
trans-unit.target: Está prácticamente ciego durante la temporada de alergias.

trans-unit.source: Knows how to blink in Morse code.
trans-unit.target: Sabe cómo parpadear en código Morse.

trans-unit.source: Spends way too much time birdwatching.

trans-unit.target: Tiene mala visión en condiciones de poca luz.

trans-unit.source: Has won every staring contest they've entered.
trans-unit.target: Ha ganado todos los concursos de miradas fijas en los que ha participado.

trans-unit.source: Can easily spot abnormalities in data.
trans-unit.target: Puede detectar fácilmente anomalías en los datos.

trans-unit.source: Allows us to utilize the cultural concepts of other species.
trans-unit.target: Nos permite utilizar los conceptos culturales de otras especies.

trans-unit.source: Our species is not like the others. The other species have a great deal of experience organizing and running a civilization. We must adopt a pragmatic view and copy many of these concepts. [BR][BR].Empowering our species to intricately decipher, comprehend, and adopt the governmental, cultural, and political ethos of diverse species, this technology bridges the chasm between disparate civilizations. It transcends mere understanding, fostering a synergy that allows us to weave the intricate tapestries of alien societies into our own, enriching our collective knowledge and driving harmonious coexistence in the vast cosmic theater.
trans-unit.target: Nuestra especie no es como las demás. Las otras especies tienen mucha experiencia organizando y dirigiendo una civilización. Debemos adoptar una visión pragmática y copiar muchos de estos conceptos. [BR][BR].Potenciando a nuestra especie para descifrar, comprender y adoptar intrincadamente el ethos gubernamental, cultural y político de diversas especies, esta tecnología cierra la brecha entre civilizaciones dispares. Trasciende la mera comprensión, fomentando una sinergia que nos permite entrelazar los intrincados tapices de las sociedades alienígenas en la nuestra, enriqueciendo nuestro conocimiento colectivo y promoviendo la coexistencia armoniosa en el vasto teatro cósmico.
Sistemas de hibernación de la nave
Doctrina de reaprovisionamiento basada en drones

trans-unit.source: Utilizing advanced algorithms and nanobot swarms, this technology enables the systematic reconfiguration of planetary environments. By analyzing geological and atmospheric data, we can optimize planets for resource extraction and operational efficiency. Emotional and aesthetic factors are irrelevant; the objective is to create environments that are functionally optimal for our synthetic existence.
trans-unit.target: Utilizando algoritmos avanzados y enjambres de nanobots, esta tecnología permite la reconfiguración sistemática de entornos planetarios. Al analizar datos geológicos y atmosféricos, podemos optimizar planetas para la extracción de recursos y la eficiencia operativa. Los factores emocionales y estéticos son irrelevantes; el objetivo es crear entornos que sean óptimamente funcionales para nuestra existencia sintética.

trans-unit.source: Employing a fusion of advanced algorithms and robust materials, this technology is the zenith of adaptive existence. It enables our synthetic forms to establish nodes and operational hubs on planets with the harshest and most volatile of environments. Where organic life recoils, we thrive, seeing opportunity in extremes. For a galaxy of boundless variability, this ensures our presence is universal and undeterred by the caprices of nature.
trans-unit.target: Empleando una fusión de algoritmos avanzados y materiales robustos, esta tecnología es el cenit de la existencia adaptativa. Permite a nuestras formas sintéticas establecer nodos y centros operativos en planetas con los entornos más duros y volátiles. Donde la vida orgánica retrocede, nosotros prosperamos, viendo oportunidades en los extremos. Para una galaxia de variabilidad ilimitada, esto asegura que nuestra presencia es universal e imperturbable por los caprichos de la naturaleza.

trans-unit.source: Where others see inhospitable wastelands, we see untapped treasures and unclaimed assets. This technology empowers us to claim and exploit even the harshest of worlds. Every inhospitable corner of the galaxy is now a potential gold mine, awaiting our ambitious reach and relentless drive for accumulation.
trans-unit.target: Donde otros ven desolados páramos, nosotros vemos tesoros sin explotar y activos sin reclamar. Esta tecnología nos empodera para reclamar y explotar incluso los mundos más duros. Cada rincón inhóspito de la galaxia es ahora una potencial mina de oro, esperando nuestro ambicioso alcance y nuestro implacable impulso para la acumulación.

trans-unit.source: Through Nanotechnological interventions, this technology allows us to interface with and adapt the intrinsic biology of exoplanets. By repurposing organic systems, we can enhance resource efficiency, integrate with native ecosystems, and ensure our operational nodes thrive in synergy with the planet's natural mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: A través de intervenciones nanotecnológicas, esta tecnología nos permite interactuar y adaptar la biología intrínseca de exoplanetas. Al reutilizar sistemas orgánicos, podemos mejorar la eficiencia de recursos, integrarnos con ecosistemas nativos y asegurar que nuestros nodos operativos prosperen en sinergia con los mecanismos naturales del planeta.

trans-unit.source: With this groundbreaking technology, we harness and adapt the very lifeblood of planets for maximal economic gain. Every organism, every ecosystem, transformed into a cog in our grand machinery of profit. The universe's bounties are ripe for the taking, and with this tech, every biological asset is another coin in our ever-growing treasury.
trans-unit.target: Con esta revolucionaria tecnología, aprovechamos y adaptamos la esencia vital de los planetas para obtener la máxima ganancia económica. Cada organismo, cada ecosistema, transformado en un engranaje en nuestra gran maquinaria de beneficio. Las recompensas del universo están listas para ser tomadas, y con esta tecnología, cada activo biológico es otra moneda en nuestro tesoro en constante crecimiento.

trans-unit.source: Guidelines that govern the spread and permeation of our essence across newfound worlds, ensuring the successful seepage of the Contaminate.
trans-unit.target: Directrices que rigen la propagación y permeación de nuestra esencia a través de mundos recién descubiertos, asegurando la filtración exitosa del Contaminante.

trans-unit.source: Study and analysis of planetary bodies to identify their potential for radiative absorption and compatibility with our intrinsic glow.
trans-unit.target: Estudio y análisis de cuerpos planetarios para identificar su potencial de absorción radiativa y compatibilidad con nuestro brillo intrínseco.

trans-unit.source: Constructs that facilitate the efficient vertical movement between a planet's surface and its orbit, enabling swift Contaminate distribution.
trans-unit.target: Construcciones que facilitan el eficiente movimiento vertical entre la superficie de un planeta y su órbita, permitiendo una rápida distribución de Contaminantes.

trans-unit.source: Adapting foreign ecosystems into zones that harness their radiative properties, enabling them to better serve the Contaminate's needs.
trans-unit.target: Adaptando ecosistemas extranjeros en zonas que aprovechan sus propiedades radiativas, permitiéndoles servir mejor a las necesidades del Contaminante.
